hero.headline: Adeegyada dhijitaalka si fudud.
hero.subheadline: NAV, canshuur, caafimaad, bangiga iyo wax badan. Waxaan kugu caawinnaa wax kasta oo dhijitaal ah. Tallaabo tallaabo.

organizations.metaDescription: Ku caawi muwaadiniintaada adeegyada dhijitaalka. LettDigital waxay bixisaa hageyaal bilaash ah, oo la heli karo ee NAV, canshuur, caafimaad iyo wax kale.
organizations.heroSubtitle: Ku caawi muwaadiniintaada adeegyada dhijitaalka ee dawladda. LettDigital waxay bixisaa hageyaal bilaash ah oo la heli karo oo ay isticmaali karaan maktabadaha, xafiisyada NAV, degmooyinka iyo ururada tabarucaadka.

organizations.benefit2Desc: Isticmaalayaashu waxay noqdaan madax-banaan oo waxay u baahan yihiin caawimaad yar waqti ka dib.
organizations.benefit3Desc: Naqshad la heli karo iyo 6 luuqadood waxay ku daraan muwaadiin badan.

organizations.librariesDesc: Isticmaal hageyaasha hagitaanka dhijitaalka, daabac martida, ama ku muuji shaashadaha.
organizations.navDesc: Ku caawi isticmaalayaasha gelitaanka, kaararka warbixinta iyo codsiyada xafiiska.

organizations.volunteersDesc: Sii tabaruceyaasha qalab ay ku caawiyaan waayeelka iyo kuwa kale caqabadaha dhijitaalka.
organizations.feature3: 6 luuqadood oo ay ku jiraan Yukreeniyaan iyo Carabi
organizations.ctaDesc: Nala soo xiriir si aad u ogaato sida LettDigital ay ugu caawin karto ururtaada.

items.quote: Waxaan soo maray niyad-jab aad u badan MAR KASTA markii aan u baahnaa inaan wax ogaado. Mahadsanid wax kasta oo fududeeya arrimaha.
Tani waxay noqon doontaa kulan la soo dhaweynayo oo fududeynaya macluumaadka halkaas ku jira.
Shaqo wanaagsan ayaad qabataan, mahadsanid kuwa u baahan!

home.heroSubtitle: Waxaan ku sharaxaynaa NAV, Hey'adda Canshuurta iyo Caafimaadka Norway si fudud. Tallaabo tallaabo, oo leh qoraal weyn iyo luuqad cad.
home.elderlyDesc: Kuwaas oo u arka adeegyada dhijitaalka inay adag yihiin in la fahmo
home.newToNorwayDesc: Kuwaas oo u baahan caawin luuqadda iyo nidaamyada
home.helpersDesc: Kuwaas oo ka caawiya dadka kale adeegyada dhijitaalka
home.chooseServiceDesc: Guji adeegga aad u baahan tahay caawin, waxaanan ku tusin doonaa tallaabo tallaabo waxa aad sameyso.
home.simpleLanguageDesc: Wax walba waxaan ku sharaxaynaa erayo caadi ah, oo aan lahayn luuqad dawladeed adag.
home.largeFontsDesc: Waxaad hagaajin kartaa cabbirka qoraalka si ay u fududaato akhrinta.
home.stepByStepDesc: Raac tallaabooyinka fudud oo calaamadee markaad dhamaystid.
home.freeDesc: Adeeggeena wax lacag ah ma qaado.
home.ctaTitle: Diyaar ma u tahay inaad bilowdo?
home.ctaSubtitle: Dooro adeegga aad u baahan tahay caawin, waxaanan ku hagi doonaa habka.
home.howItWorksStep1Desc: Dooro adeegga aad u baahan tahay caawin, tusaale ahaan NAV ama Hey'adda Canshuurta.
home.howItWorksStep2Desc: Hagaha kasta wuxuu ku tusayaa si sax ah waxa aad sameyn lahayd, tallaabo tallaabo.
home.howItWorksStep3Desc: Waxaad baratay adeegga dhijitaalka. Sidaas ayay fududeyd!
home.whatIsText: LettDigital waa websaydh bilaash ah oo madax-bannaan oo kaa caawiya inaad isticmaasho adeegyada dhijitaalka ee dawladda Norway. Waxaan ku sharaxnaa waxyaabaha adag si fudud, si qof walba u gacan qaadi karo dhijitaalka.
home.forWho: Dadka waayeelka ah · Kuwa cusub Norway · Caawiyayaasha
home.disclaimerText: LettDigital kama mid aha NAV, Hey'adda Canshuurta, Caafimaadka Norway ama hay'adaha dawladda kale. Waxaan nahay adeeg caawin oo madax-bannaan oo sharaxaya sida adeegyadu u shaqeeyaan. Dhammaan macluumaadka rasmiga ah waxaad ka heli kartaa bogagga hay'adaha. Hagayaasheenu waa tilmaam oo ma beddeli karaan macluumaadka rasmiga ah.
home.mostUsed: Adeegyada ugu badan ee la isticmaalo
home.selectService: Dooro adeeg si aad u bilowdo
home.mostUsedDesc: Halkan ka bilow haddii aadan hubin. Kuwani waa adeegyada dadka badanaa u baahan yihiin caawin.
home.forHelpersDesc: Ma caawinaysaa qof adeegyada dhijitaalka? Waa kuwan talooyin kaa fududeeya.
home.helperTip1Desc: Dhammaan hagayaasheena waa la daabici karaa. Riix badhanka daabacaadda ee ku yaal sare hagaha.
home.helperTip2Title: Raadi waxa aad u baahan tahay
home.helperTip2Desc: Isticmaal sanduuqa raadinta ee sare si aad si degdeg ah u hesho hagayaasha. Ku raadi erayada muhiimka ah sida 'BankID' ama 'warbixinta canshuurta'.
home.helperTip3Desc: Calaamadee hagayaasha kuwa aad jeceshahay si aad mar kale u hesho. Waa ku habboon hagayaasha aad badanaa isticmaasho.
home.citiesDesc: Xafiisyada NAV ee maxalliga ah, dhakhtarrada degdega iyo adeegyada dadweynaha

nav.title: NAV
nav.description: Codso kaalmada shaqo la'aanta, lacagta xanuunka, kaalmada waalidnimada, kaalmada naafada iyo taageerooyin kale.
nav.didYouKnowText: NAV waa hay'adda dawladda ee ugu weyn Norway waxayna maamusaa in ka badan saddex meelood meel miisaaniyada dawladda. Waxay kaa caawiyaan wax kasta oo laga bilaabo shaqo la'aanta ilaa howlgabka.
nav.selectGuide: Dooro waxa aad u baahan tahay caawin
nav.needMoreHelp: Ma u baahan tahay caawin dheeraad ah?
nav.needMoreHelpText: Haddii aadan helin waxa aad raadinayso, waxaad si toos ah ula xiriiri kartaa NAV:
nav.findOffice: Ka hel xafiiskaaga maxalliga ah nav.no
nav.introText: waxa ay bixisaa adeegyo badan oo dhijitaal ah oo aad gurigaaga ka isticmaali karto. Halkan waxaad ka heli doontaa hagayaal fudud oo kuu tusaya tallaabo-tallaabo sida loo galo NAV, loo diro meldekort, loo codsado kaalmada shaqo la'aanta iyo faa'iidooyinka kale.
nav.faqTitle: Su'aalaha Inta Badan La Isweydiiyo ee NAV

faq.a1: Ku gal nav.no adoo isticmaalaya BankID, BankID app, ama MinID. Tag nav.no, guji 'Gal' oo dooro qaabka gelitaanka.
faq.q2: Sideen ugu diri karaa meldekort NAV?
faq.a2: Dir meldekort adoo ku galaya nav.no BankID. Tag 'Meldekort' menu-ga, buuxi macluumaadka shaqada iyo hawlaha 14-kii maalmood ee la soo dhaafay.
faq.q3: Sideen u codsadaa kaalmada shaqo la'aanta?
faq.a3: Codso kaalmada shaqo la'aanta nav.no. Ku gal BankID, tag 'Codsiyada', dooro 'Kaalmada shaqo la'aanta' oo buuxi foomka.
faq.a4: Lambar taleefanka NAV waa 55 55 33 33. Waxay diyaar yihiin Isniinta ilaa Jimcaha 09:00-15:00.
faq.q5: Sideen u helaa xafiiska NAV ee degaankayga?
faq.a5: Ka hel xafiiskaaga NAV nav.no/sok-nav-kontor adoo gelinaya koodhka boostada ama degmada.
faq.q6: Ma heli karaa caawimaad xafiiska NAV ballan la'aan?
faq.a6: Inta badan xafiisyada NAV waxay bixiyaan saacado ballan la'aan, laakiin way kala duwan tahay. Hubi saacadaha xafiiskaaga nav.no.

nav.relatedText: Ma u baahan tahay caawimaad adeegyo kale oo dawladeed?
nav.metaTitle: Hagayaasha NAV - Caawimaad buuxa adeegyada dhijitaalka NAV
nav.metaDescription: Baro sida loo galo NAV, loo diro meldekort, loo codsado kaalmada shaqo la'aanta.

skatt.title: Hey'adda Canshuurta
skatt.description: Gudbi warbixinta canshuurta, hubi dhimista, hel xisaabinta canshuurta iyo su'aalaha canshuurta kale.
skatt.didYouKnowText: Dadka intooda badan waxay helaan warbixinta canshuurta Maarso/Abriil. Waxaad leedahay ilaa 30-ka Abriil si aad u hubiso oo aad u sameyso isbeddello.
skatt.selectGuide: Dooro waxa aad u baahan tahay caawin
skatt.datesMarchDesc: Warbixintaada canshuurta waxay diyaar ku noqon doontaa skatteetaten.no
skatt.datesAprilDesc: Maalinta ugu dambeysa ee la hubiyo lana gudbiyo isbeddelada
skatt.datesJuneDesc: Waxaad arkaysaa haddii aad lacag dib u helayso ama aad bixineyso canshuur dheeraad ah
skatt.needMoreHelp: Ma u baahan tahay caawin dheeraad ah?
skatt.needMoreHelpText: Haddii aadan helin waxa aad raadinayso, la xiriir Hey'adda Canshuurta:
skatt.introText: waxay maamushaa canshuuraha Norway. Halkan waxaad ka heli doontaa hagayaal fudud.

faq.a1: Gal skatteetaten.no adiga oo isticmaalaya BankID.
faq.a2: Badiyaa Maarso. Wakhtiga ugu dambeeya waa 30 Abriil.
faq.q3: Sideen u beddeli karaa kaadhka canshuurta?
faq.a4: Waxay muujisaa haddii aad bixisay canshuur badan ama yar.

helse.title: Caafimaadka Norway
helse.description: Samee ballan dhakhtar, arag dawooyinka, beddel dhakhtarkaaga caadiga ah oo akhri diiwaankaaga caafimaad.
helse.didYouKnowText: Helsenorge waxaad ku samayn kartaa wax badan adiga, sida ballan dhakhtar, cusbooneysinta dawooyinka, iyo akhrinta diiwaankaaga caafimaad - oo dhan oo la'aantii wac.
helse.selectGuide: Dooro waxa aad u baahan tahay caawin
helse.emergencyNotice: FIIRO GAAR AH! Xanuun ama dhaawac degdeg ah, had iyo jeer wac 113 (ambulaanka) ama 116 117 (caawin degdeg). Helsenorge waxaa loogu talagalay su'aalaha aan degdega ahayn.
helse.ambulanceDesc: Xanuun ama dhaawac naf halis ah oo degdeg ah
helse.legevaktDesc: Markaad u baahan tahay caawin degdeg oo aan degdeg ahayn
helse.canDoTitle: Waxa aad ku samayn karto Helsenorge
helse.canDoBookingDesc: Samee ballan dhakhtarkaaga caadiga ah 24 saac
helse.canDoMessageDesc: La xiriir si badbaado leh adeegyada caafimaadka
helse.canDoChangeGPDesc: Hel oo u beddel dhakhtar cusub si fudud
helse.needMoreHelp: Ma u baahan tahay caawin dheeraad ah?
helse.needMoreHelpText: Haddii aad qabto su'aalo ku saabsan adeegyada caafimaadka:
helse.introText: waa albaabkaaga macluumaadka caafimaadka iyo adeegyada caafimaadka dhijitaalka ee Norway. Halkan waxaad ka ballansali kartaa dhakhtarka, arki kartaa dawooyinka, bedeli kartaa dhakhtarkaaga oo akhri kartaa diiwaankaaga caafimaad.
helse.faqTitle: Su'aalaha Inta Badan La Isweydiiyo ee Helsenorge

faq.a1: Ku gal helsenorge.no adoo isticmaalaya BankID ama BankID app. MinID waxay bixisaa gelitaan xaddidan oo keliya (adeegyada caafimaadka dugsiga). Tag helsenorge.no, guji 'Gal' oo dooro qaabka gelitaanka.
faq.a2: Ku gal helsenorge.no, tag 'Ballannada' oo dooro 'Ballanso'. Waxaad la ballansali kartaa dhakhtarkaaga ama takhasuslaha.
faq.a3: Ku gal helsenorge.no oo tag 'Dawooyinka'. Halkaas waxaad ka arki doontaa dhammaan dawooyinka firfircoon waxaadna cusbooneysiin kartaa.
faq.a4: Ku gal helsenorge.no oo tag 'Dhakhtarka'. Guji 'Beddel dhakhtarka' oo raadi dhakhtarro la heli karo aagaaga.
faq.q5: Sideen u akhrin karaa diiwaankayga caafimaad?
faq.a5: Ku gal helsenorge.no oo tag 'Diiwaanka caafimaadka'. Halkaas waxaad ka akhrin kartaa waxa dhakhtarku ku saabsan kuu qoray.
faq.q6: Maxaan sameeyaa haddii xanuun degdeg ah i hayo?
faq.a6: Xanuun degdeg ah wac 113 (ambulaas) ama 116 117 (degdegga). Helsenorge waa uun arrimaha aan degdegga ahayn.

helse.relatedText: Ma u baahan tahay caawimaad adeegyo kale oo dawladeed?
helse.metaTitle: Hagayaasha Helsenorge - Caawimaad buuxa adeegyada caafimaadka onlaynka
helse.metaDescription: Baro sida loo isticmaalo Helsenorge si aad u ballansato, u aragto dawooyinka, u beddesho dhakhtarka.

sikkerhet.title: Amniga Dhijitaalka
sikkerhet.description: Baro sida aad uga ilaaliso khiyaanada, phishing iyo halisaha dhijitaalka kale.
sikkerhet.hubSubtitle: Iska ilaali khiyaanada iyo halisaha internetka
sikkerhet.introText: wuxuu ku saabsan yahay ilaalinta naftaada iyo macluumaadkaaga internetka. Halkan waxaad ka heli doontaa hagayaal ku saabsan sida loo isticmaalo BankID si ammaan ah, loo aqoonsado khiyaanada iyo phishing-ka, iyo sida loo sameeyo furaha sirta ee ammaan ah.
sikkerhet.didYouKnowText: Maalin kasta, Norwayjiinta waxaa lagu khiyaaneyaa malaayiin kroono internetka. Inta badan isku dayayaasha khiyaanada waa fudud in la ogaado haddii aad ogtahay waxa aad fiiriso.
sikkerhet.selectGuide: Dooro waxa aad rabto inaad ka barato

warningSigns.personalInfo: Waxay kaa weydiinayaan macluumaad shakhsi ah (furaha sirta, BankID, lambarka shakhsiga)
warningSigns.urgent: Aad ayey u degdeg tahay waa inaad HADDA wax yeeshaa
warningSigns.tooGood: Wax soo jeedin oo u muuqda inay aad u wanaagsan yihiin inay run noqdaan
warningSigns.spelling: Khaladaad qoraal iyo af xun fariimaha
warningSigns.strangeLinks: Xidhiidhyada u muuqda kuwo yaab leh

sikkerhet.beenScammedText: Haddii aad u malaynayso in laguu khiyaamay, samee tan isla markiiba:

beenScammedSteps.password: Beddel furaha sirta dhammaan koontoyinkaaga muhiimka ah
beenScammedSteps.idTheft: La xiriir NorSIS talo xadista aqoonsiga 40 00 58 99

sikkerhet.metaTitle: Amniga Dhijitaalka - Iska ilaali khiyaanada iyo phishing-ka
sikkerhet.metaDescription: Baro sida aad isaga ilaalin karto khiyaanada, phishing-ka iyo xatooyo aqoonsiga internetka.
sikkerhet.faqTitle: Su'aalaha inta badan la isweydiiyo ee amniga

faq.q1: Waa maxay BankID sidee bay u shaqeysaa?
faq.a1: BankID waa aqoonsi elektaroonig ah oo loo isticmaalo si loo galo adeegyada dawladda iyo bangiyada internetka Norway.
faq.a2: Fariimaha khiyaanada waxay ku tilmaaman yihiin weydiin macluumaad shakhsi, abuurista degdegnaan, khaladaad qoraal iyo xiriirinno yaab leh.
faq.a3: Phishing-ka waa khiyaano ay dambiileyaal iska dhigaan shirkado sharci ah si ay kuu khiyaaneeyaan inaad bixiso macluumaadkaaga.
faq.q4: Sideen u abuuraa furaha sirta ee ammaan ah?
faq.a4: Furaha sirta ee ammaan ah waa in ugu yaraan 12 xaraf leh oo leh xarfo waaweyn iyo yaryar, tiro iyo calaamado gaar ah.
faq.q5: Maxaan sameeyaa haddii la i khiyaaneeyay?
faq.a5: Wac bangigaaga, u sheeg booliska, beddel furaha sirta oo la xiriir caawimaada xatooyada aqoonsiga.
faq.q6: Ma ammaan baa in la isticmaalo WiFi-ga dadweynaha?
faq.a6: Ka fogow bangiyada WiFi-ga dadweynaha. Isticmaal xogta mobilka hawlaha xasaasiga ah.

sikkerhet.relatedText: Adeegyo kale oo u baahan gelitaan ammaan ah
sikkerhet.lastUpdated: Markii ugu dambeysay la cusbooneysiiyay: Febraayo 2026

bank.title: Bangiga iyo Maaliyadda
bank.description: Isticmaal bangiga internetka, bixi biilasha oo hel caawin dhaqaalaha shakhsiyeed.
bank.hubSubtitle: Baro sida loo isticmaalo bangiga internetka iyo xalalaha lacag bixinta dhijitaalka
bank.didYouKnowText: In ka badan 90% Norwayjiinta waxay isticmaalaan bangiga internetka. Waa badbaado oo fudud marka aad ogtahay sida!
bank.selectGuide: Dooro waxa aad u baahan tahay caawin
bank.securityTipsTitle: Talooyinka isticmaalka badbaadada ah ee bangiga internetka
bank.securityTip1: Had iyo jeer ka bax bangiga internetka markaad dhameyso
bank.securityTip2: Waligaa ha isticmaalin bangiga internetka WiFi-ga dadweynaha (kafeega, garoonka diyaaradaha)
bank.securityTip3: Waligaa ha la wadaagin furayaasha BankID qofna - xitaa bangiga!
bank.securityTip4: Si joogta ah u hubi bayaanka koontada wax kala soocida shaki leh
bank.needHelpText: Inta badan baangiyadda waxay bixiyaan caawin kuwa ay ku adagtahay bangiga internetka:
bank.helpPhoneDesc: inta badan baangiyadda waxay leeyihiin telefoon dad waaweyn
bank.helpVideoDesc: baangiyadda qaarkood waxay bixiyaan hagid fiidiyow
bank.introText: wuxuu kuu ogolaanayaa inaad maamusho dhaqaalahaaga gurigaaga. Halkan waxaad ka heli doontaa hagayaal fudud oo kuu tusaya tallaabo-tallaabo sida loo galo, loo bixiyo biilasha, loo isticmaalo Vipps, oo loo ilaaliyo dhaqaalahaaga.
bank.faqTitle: Su'aalaha Inta Badan La Isweydiiyo ee Bangiga Onlaynka

faq.q1: Sideen ugu geli karaa bangiga onlaynka?
faq.a1: Ku gal websaydhka bangiga ama app-ka adoo isticmaalaya BankID. Tag websaydhka bangiga, guji 'Gal' oo ku xaqiiji BankID app.
faq.a2: Ku gal bangiga onlaynka, dooro 'Bixinta' ama 'Wareejinta', geli lambar KID, lambar koonto iyo qadarka biilka.
faq.q3: Waa maxay Vipps sideen u isticmaalaa?
faq.a3: Vipps waa app loo isticmaalo in lacag loo diro dadka kale. Soo dejiso app-ka, ku xir koontadaada bangiga, oo dir lacagta lambar taleefan.
faq.a4: Ku gal bangiga onlaynka ama app-ka. Haraagga badanaa waxaa lagu muujiyaa bogga hore ka dib markii la galo.
faq.q5: Sideen u dejiyaa bixinta tooska ah?
faq.a5: Ku gal bangiga onlaynka, tag 'Bixinta tooska ah' ama 'Amarrada joogtada ah' oo raac tilmaamaha.
faq.q6: Maxaan sameeyaa haddii aan lumiyay kaardhkayga?
faq.a6: Si degdeg ah ugu wac khadka xirida bangiga. Lambarku wuxuu ku yaalaa websaydhka bangiga ama kaardhkaaga dhabarka.

bolig.description: Codso taageerada kireynta, amaahda bilawga ee Husbanken iyo guriga degmada.
bolig.hubSubtitle: Caawimo aad ku hesho oo aad ku hayso guri
bolig.didYouKnowText: Husbanken iyo degmada waxay leeyihiin barnaamijyo kala duwan oo kaa caawin kara inaad hesho ama aad hayso guri.
bolig.selectGuide: Dooro waxa aad u baahan tahay caawimo
bolig.bostotteDesc: Qofka dakhligiisu yar yahay iyo kharashaadka gurigiisuna sarreeyo.
bolig.startlanDesc: Qofka aan ka heli karin amah bangiga caadiga ah.
bolig.kommunalBoligDesc: Qofka aan awoodi karin inuu keligii helo guri.
bolig.linkHusbankenDesc: Codso taageerada kireynta iyo amaahda bilawga

utdanning.title: Waxbarasho iyo Lånekassen
utdanning.description: Codso amaahda waxbarasho, deeqda iyo maaree dib u bixinta Lånekassen.
utdanning.hubSubtitle: Amaahda waxbarasho, deeqda iyo dib u bixinta
utdanning.didYouKnowText: Lånekassen wuxuu siiyaa amaahdii iyo deeqaha kuwa waxbarashada qaata. Qeyb ka mid ah amaahda waxaa loo beddeli karaa deeq.
utdanning.selectGuide: Dooro waxa aad u baahan tahay caawimo
utdanning.stipendInfoDesc: Qeyb ka mid ah amaahda waxaa loo beddeli karaa deeq haddii aad dhammeyso waxbarashadaada.
utdanning.utsettelsInfoDesc: Dhibaato ma ku haysaa bixinta? Waxaad codsan kartaa dib u dhigis.

id.title: ID iyo dukumeentiyada
id.description: Dalbo baasaboor, cusbooneysii shatiga darawalnimada iyo hel kaadhka ID-ga qaranka.
id.hubSubtitle: Baasaboor, shatiga darawalnimada iyo kaadhka ID-ga
id.didYouKnowText: Waxaad u baahan tahay aqoonsi sax ah oo waxyaabo badan Norway - laga bilaabo gelitaanka adeegyada dawladda ilaa safarka. Halkan waxaan kaa caawin doonaa dalbashada iyo cusbooneysiinta dukumeentiyadaada.
id.selectGuide: Dooro waxa aad caawimo u baahan tahay
id.passInfoDesc: Safarka ka baxsan Scandinavia. Waxaa shaqaynaya 10 sano (5 sano carruurta). Sidoo kale waxaa loo isticmaali karaa ID Norway.
id.forerkortInfoDesc: In aad waddo gaariga. Waxaa u shaqeeya aqoonsi Norway. Waa in la cusbooneysiiyo 15 sano kasta.
id.idKortInfoDesc: Bedel baasaboorka. Xaqa safarka waxaad ku safri kartaa EEA. Cabbirka waa ku habboon jeebaaga.

grunnleggende.title: Tiknoolajiyada aasaasiga ah
grunnleggende.description: Baro isticmaalka aasaasiga ah ee telefoonka casriga ah, browserka, wicitaanka fiidiyowga iyo wax ka badan.
grunnleggende.introText: waxay kaa caawiyaan inaad ku hagaagto tignoolajiyada maalinlaha. Halkan waxaad ka heli doontaa hagayaal fudud oo tallaabo-tallaabo ah oo muujinaya sida loo isticmaalo taleefanka casriga, browserka, wicitaanka fiidiyowga iyo qalab kale oo dhijitaal ah.
grunnleggende.faqTitle: Su'aalaha badanaa la isweydiiyo ee bilaabayaasha

faq.a1: Smartphone waa taleefan casri ah oo ku jira computer yar. Waxaa loo isticmaali karaa iimaylka, raadinta, wicitaanka fiidiyowga iyo adeegyo badan. Ka bilow buugin boggaaga hore oo daqdaq-daqdaq.
faq.a2: App waa barnaamij yar oo ku shaqeeyaa smartphone. Waxaad helaan karaa apps oo u talagalay wax kasta - laga bilaabo laaluudha ilaa dhar iyo casri.
faq.a3: WiFi waa internet oo binaadiri ah. Dooro SSID (magaca WiFi) oo dhamaan maqan, buuxi password-ka, oo ku dheeq 'Ku xidhidh'. Markaa waxaad internet ka isticmaali karaa bilan bilaan.
faq.a4: Video call waxaa lagu isticmaali karaa apps sida WhatsApp ama Google Meet. Fur app-ka, dooro qofka aad la hadli doonto, oo guji video call icon-ka. Eeg camera oo isticmaal microphone-ka si loo is yaqaan.
faq.q5: Waa maxay password iyo sida loogu iska daadiyo?
faq.a5: Password waa eray sirta ah oo ah doorashada ku ahaan doona akoon. Samee passwords leh tiro iyo xaraf badan si ay u adag tahay. Kaydi malinkood ama noote qaba oo amni leh.
faq.q6: Halkan waan walaal bixiya si aad u hesho caawin?
faq.a6: Ma u baahan tahay caawin? Waxaad la xiriiri kartaa maktabado, ururado samafalayaal, ama saaxiibada oo lagu yidhaahdaa 'tech-savvy'. Hadda joog adag oo baro. Hadda baa qofku barana!

grunnleggende.nextStepsText: Marka aad barato aasaaska, waxaad bilaabi kartaa isticmaalka adeegyada dhijitaalka dawladda:
grunnleggende.metaDescription: Bilaw dhijitaalka: telefoon, browser, video iyo wax badan oo kale
grunnleggende.didYouKnowText: Marnaba uma dambeyso in la barto dhijitaalka! Halkan waxaad ka heli kartaa hagayaal fudud oo sharaxaya wax kasta laga bilaabo bilawga - oo aan lahayn erayyo adag.
grunnleggende.selectGuide: Dooro waxa aad rabto inaad barato
grunnleggende.needMoreHelp: Ma u baahan tahay caawin shakhsi ah?
grunnleggende.needMoreHelpText: Maktabado badan iyo ururado samafalayaal ah ayaa bixiya caawin kombiyuutar oo bilaash ah:
grunnleggende.seniornettDesc: Waxay bixiyaan koorsooyin iyo caawin waayeelka oo dhan dalka oo dhan
grunnleggende.libraryDesc: Maktabado badan ayaa leh caawin kombiyuutar iyo koorsooyin oo bilaash ah
grunnleggende.dataHjelpenDesc: Weydii qoyska, asxaabta ama jiiraanka caawin

nyINorge.title: Cusub Norway
nyINorge.description: Wax walba oo aad u baahan tahay inaad ogaato si aad u bilowdo markaad cusub tahay Norway - diiwaangelinta, lambarka telefoonka, akoonka bangiga iyo wax ka badan.
nyINorge.welcomeText: U guuritaanka waddan cusub waxay noqon kartaa mid adag. Halkan waxaan soo ururinay waxyaabaha ugu muhiimsan ee aad u baahan tahay inaad sameyso markaad timaaddo Norway, oo loo sharaxay si fudud.
nyINorge.guidesTitle: Maxaad u baahan tahay inaad sameyso marka hore?
nyINorge.tipText: Kala soocida way muhiim tahay! Inta badan waxaad u baahan tahay lambar shakhsi ka hor intaadan furin karin akoon bangi, iyo akoon bangi ka hor intaadan helin karin rukhsad telefoon. Ka bilow Diiwaanka Dadweynaha.

folkeregisteret.title: Iska diiwaan geli Diiwaanka Dadweynaha
folkeregisteret.description: Hel lambar shakhsi Norweyjiyaan ama lambar D - waxa ugu horreeya ee aad u baahan tahay inaad sameyso

mobilnummer.title: Hel lambar telefoon Norweyjiyaan
mobilnummer.description: Iibso kaadhka SIM oo dooro rukhsadda telefoonka

epost.title: Dejji email
epost.description: Samee akoon email bilaash ah si aad u isticmaasho adeegyada Norweyjiyan

byer.hubSubtitle: Ka hel xafiisyada NAV ee degaankaaga, adeegyada caafimaadka iyo wax badan
byer.introText: Dooro magaaladaada si aad u hesho xafiisyada NAV, isbitaallada degdegga iyo adeegyada kale ee dawladda oo leh cinwaanno, saacadaha shaqada iyo macluumaadka xiriirka.
byer.osloDesc: Magaalada madaxda oo leh inta badan dadweyne. Halkan waxaad ka heli kartaa xafiis badan oo NAV, isbitaal degdeg iyo adeegyo kale oo dawladda.
byer.bergenDesc: Magaalada labaad ee weyn ee Norwey, oo ku taal Vestlandet. Adeegyo caafimaad iyo bulsheed oo wanaagsan.
byer.trondheimDesc: Xarunta Trondelag oo leh helitaan wanaagsan oo adeegyada dawladda iyo daryeelka caafimaadka.
byer.stavangerDesc: Magaalada ugu weyn ee Rogaland oo leh bixinta adeegyo dawladda oo casri.
byer.kristiansandDesc: Xarunta ugu weyn ee Sørlandet oo leh adeegyo dawladda buuxa.
byer.didYouKnowText: Waxaad u codsadaa wax badan oo nav.no lala isticmaali karaa bilaan ka xafiiska. Laakiin haddii aad u baahantahay caawin wajaha ku jira, halkan waxaad ka heli kartaa cinwaan ee xafiiska NAV oo kuu dhawayn.
byer.nationalServicesText: Adeegyadan waxay u shaqeeyaan si isku mid ah meel kasta oo aad ku nooshahay:
byer.metaTitle: Adeegyada dawladda magaaladaada - Xafiisyada NAV iyo adeegyada caafimaadka
byer.metaDescription: Ka hel xafiisyada NAV, isbitaallada degdegga, iyo adeegyada kale ee dawladda magaaladaada oo leh cinwaanno iyo saacadaha shaqada.

loggInn.title: Gal NAV
loggInn.description: Baro sida loo galo nav.no oo la isticmaalo BankID ama MinID
loggInn.longDescription: Baro sida loo galo nav.no si aad u aragto kiisaskaaga, u codsato dheefaha oo u dirto fariimo.
loggInn.beforeYouStartText: Waxaad u baahan tahay BankID (telefoonka ama qalabka koodhka) ama MinID si aad u gasho. Haddii aadan haysan, waa inaad marka hore mid ka heshaa.
loggInn.problemsText: Haddii aad dhibaato ku qabto galitaanka, waxaad isku dayi kartaa kuwan soo socda:
problemsList: Hubi inaad si sax ah u gelisay lambarka aqoonsiga
Isku day inaad cusbooneysiiso bogga (riix F5 ama Ctrl+R)
Wac NAV 55 55 33 33 si aad caawin u hesho

steps.title: Tag nav.no
steps.description: Fur browserkaaga (tusaale Google Chrome, Safari ama Edge). Ku qor "nav.no" xariiqda ciwaanka ee sare oo riix Enter.
steps.tip: Waxaad sidoo kale ka raadin kartaa "NAV" Google oo gujisaa natiijada koowaad.

steps.title: Ka hel badhanka "Logg inn"
steps.description: Bogga hore ee nav.no waxaad arki doontaa badhan buluug ah oo ku yaal geeska midig ee sare oo leh "Logg inn". Guji badhankaan.
steps.tip: Badhanka wuxuu sidoo kale la odhan karaa "Min side" ama "Ditt NAV".

steps.title: Dooro habka galitaanka
steps.description: Hadda waxaad heshaa doorasho u dhaxaysa dhowr hab oo aad ku geli karto. Kuwa ugu caadisan waa BankID telefoonka, BankID qalabka koodhka, ama MinID. Dooro midka aad gelitaan u leedahay.
steps.warning: Haddii aadan haysan BankID ama MinID, waa inaad la xiriirtaa bangigaaga ama aad booqataa xafiiska NAV si aad caawin u hesho.

steps.title: Haddii aad doorato BankID telefoonka
steps.description: Geli lambarka aqoonsigaaga (11 lambar) iyo lambarka telefoonkaaga. Waxaad heli doontaa fariin telefoonkaaga. Fur app-ka BankID oo xaqiiji galitaanka adigoo isticmaalaya faraha ama koodhka.
steps.tip: Hubi in app-ka BankID lagu rakibay telefoonkaaga ka hor intaadan bilaabin.

steps.title: Haddii aad doorato BankID qalabka koodhka
steps.description: Geli lambarka aqoonsigaaga. Shid qalabka koodhka oo geli koodhka ku muuqda shaashada. Ka dib geli koodhkaaga shakhsiga ah qalabka koodhka oo geli koodhka cusub ee soo muuqda.
steps.warning: Qalabka koodhku wuxuu u baahan yahay batari. Haddii shaashadu madhan tahay, wuxuu u baahan yahay batari cusub ama waa inaad la xiriirtaa bangigaaga.

steps.title: Hadda waad gashay!
steps.description: Hambalyo! Hadda waad gashay NAV. Waxaad arki kartaa sanduuqaaga, codsigaaga, oo u diri kartaa fariimo NAV. Liiska geeska bidix wuxuu muujinayaa dhammaan adeegyada aad gelitaan u leedahay.
steps.tip: Xusuusnow inaad ka baxdo markaad dhamaysato, gaar ahaan haddii aad isticmaalayso kombuyuutar wadaag ah.

loggInn.helpText: Wac NAV lambarka 55 55 33 33 (maalmaha shaqada 09:00-15:00) ama booqo xafiiska NAV ee deegaankaaga.

dagpenger.title: Codso kaalmada shaqo la'aanta
dagpenger.description: Hage tallaabo tallaabo ah si loo codsado kaalmada shaqo la'aanta haddii aad lumisay shaqadaada
dagpenger.longDescription: Kaalmada shaqo la'aanta (dagpenger) waa lacag aad ka heli karto NAV haddii aad lumisay shaqadaada ama lagaa joojiyay. Halkan waxaan kugu tusin doonaa tallaabo tallaabo sida loo codsado.
dagpenger.whoCanGet: Yaa heli kara kaalmada shaqo la'aanta?
dagpenger.whoCanGetIntro: Si aad u hesho kaalmada shaqo la'aanta waa inaad caadi ahaan:
requirements: Ka shaqeysay ugu yaraan 186,042 NOK 12-kii bilood ee ugu dambeeyay, ama 372,084 NOK 36-dii bilood ee ugu dambeeyay (qiimaha 2026)
Saacadaha shaqadaada lagu dhimay ugu yaraan 50%
Tahay diiwaan gashan oo shaqo raadiye ah oo si firfircoon shaqo u raadinayso
Ku noolaatid Norway oo aad xaq u leedahay inaad halkan ka shaqeyso
documents: Warqadda joojinta ama ogeysiinta joojinta shaqada ee loo shaqeeyaha
Lambarka akoonka bangiga ee aad rabto lacagta lagugu siiyo
dagpenger.stepsTitle: Sida loo codsado kaalmada shaqo la'aanta
dagpenger.importantMeldekortText: Waa inaad gudbisaa foomka xaalada shaqada 14-kii maalmood si aad u sii hesho kaalmada. Tan ka samee nav.no.
dagpenger.importantJobsearchText: Waa inaad si firfircoon shaqo u raadinaysaa oo aad diiwaangelin. NAV waxay ku weydiin karaan inaad tusiso codsigaaga shaqada.
dagpenger.importantAmountText: Kaalmada shaqo la'aanta waa qiyaastii 62.4% dakhliga hore, ilaa 6G (qiyaastii 780,960 NOK). Lacagta waxaa caadi ahaan la bixiyaa dambe.

steps.title: Marka hore iska diiwaan geli shaqo raadiye
steps.description: Ka hor intaadan codsanin kaalmada shaqo la'aanta, waa inaad iska diiwaan gelisaa shaqo raadiye NAV. Tag nav.no, gal, oo dooro "Iska diiwaan geli shaqo raadiye". Buuxi macluumaadka waxbarashadaada iyo khibradda shaqada.
steps.tip: Waxaad iska diiwaan gelin kartaa shaqo raadiye maalinta la mid ah ee aad codsaneyso kaalmada.
steps.warning: Waa inaad iska diiwaan gelisaa shaqo raadiye KA HOR codsiga kaalmada shaqo la'aanta, haddii kale codsigaaga waa la diidi doonaa.

steps.title: Gal nav.no
steps.description: Tag nav.no oo ku gal BankID ama MinID. Guji "Gal" geeska midig ee sare ee bogga.
steps.tip: Arag hagaheena "Gal NAV" haddii aad u baahan tahay caawin galitaanka.

steps.title: Ka hel codsiga kaalmada shaqo la'aanta
steps.description: Ka dib markii aad gasho, tag "Ditt NAV" ama "Adeegyadeyda". Ka dib guji "Codsiyada" ama ka raadi "dagpenger" goobta raadinta. Dooro "Codsiga kaalmada shaqo la'aanta".
steps.tip: Waxaad sidoo kale ku qori kartaa "dagpenger" goobta raadinta nav.no si aad si toos ah u hesho codsiga.

steps.title: Buuxi macluumaadka shakhsiga
steps.description: Codsiga wuxuu ku bilaabmayaa muujinta macluumaadkaaga shakhsiga (magaca, cinwaanka, iwm). Hubi in tani sax tahay. Haddii wax khaldan yihiin, waa inaad ka beddeshaa Diiwaanka Dadweynaha ka hor intaadan sii wadin.
steps.warning: Hubi in lambarka akoonkaaga bangiga sax yahay! Halkaas ayaa lacagta lagu siin doonaa.

steps.title: Sheeg sababta codsigaaga
steps.description: Dooro sababta aad u codsaneyso kaalmada shaqo la'aanta: ma lumisay shaqadaadii, miyaa lagaa joojiyay, mise saacadaha shaqadaada ayaa la dhimay? Si daacad ah uga jawaab dhammaan su'aalaha.
steps.tip: Haddii aadan hubin waxa aad ku jawaabto, waxaad dooran kartaa "Ma aqaan" oo ku sharaxdo xaaladaada qeybta faallooyinka.

steps.title: Soo rar dukumeentiga
steps.description: Waa inaad soo rartaa dukumeentiyo xaqiijinaya xaaladaada. Tani waxay noqon kartaa warqadda joojinta, ogeysiinta joojinta shaqada, ama heshiiska shaqada. Guji "Soo rar fayl" oo ka dooro dukumeentiga kombuyuutarkaaga.
steps.warning: Qaababka faylka la aqbalo waa PDF, JPG iyo PNG. Cabbirka faylka ugu badan waa caadi ahaan 10 MB.
steps.tip: Ka sawir dukumeentiyada warqadda ah telefoonkaaga oo soo rar sawirka haddii aadan haysan scanner.

steps.title: Geli dakhliga hore
steps.description: NAV ayaa si toos ah u soo qaadanaya macluumaadka dakhligaaga hore ee Hey'adda Canshuurta. Hubi in tani sax u eg tahay. Haddii aad lahayd dakhli aan soo muuqanin, waa inaad gacanta ku dartaa.
steps.tip: Kaalmada shaqo la'aanta waxaa lagu xisaabiyaa dakhligaaga 12-kii ama 36-dii bilood ee ugu dambeeyay, iyadoo ku xiran midka bixiya qaddarka ugu sarreeya.

steps.title: Ka jawaab su'aalaha dheeraadka ah
steps.description: Codsiga wuxuu ka kooban yahay su'aalo badan oo ku saabsan xaaladaada, sida haddii aad leedahay dakhli kale, aad dugsiga dhigatid, ama aad qabto dhibaatooyiin caafimaad oo saameeya raadinta shaqada. Dhammaan si daacad ah uga jawaab.

steps.title: Dib u eeg oo gudbi
steps.description: Ka hor gudbinta, waxaad helaysaa soo koobid codsiga. Dhammaan si taxadar leh u akhri. Haddii wax khaldan yihiin, dib ugu noqo oo saxo. Marka wax walba sax yihiin, guji "Gudbi codsiga".
steps.warning: Ka dib gudbinta, ma beddeli kartid codsiga. Waxaad u baahan doontaa inaad la xiriirto NAV.

steps.title: Xaqiijinta iyo tallaabooyinka xiga
steps.description: Waxaad helaysaa xaqiijin shaashada iyo iimayl/SMS ah in codsiga la helay. NAV caadi ahaan waxay baadhi codsiyada 4 toddobaad gudahooda. Xusuusnow inaad gudbiso foomka xaalada shaqada 14-kii maalmood!
steps.tip: Waxaad la socon kartaa xaalada codsigaaga "Kiisaskeeyga" nav.no.

sykepenger.title: Codso lacagta xanuunka
sykepenger.description: Sida loo gudbiyo fasaxa xanuunka oo loo codsado lacagta xanuunka
sykepenger.longDescription: Lacagta xanuunka waxay beddelaysaa dakhligaaga markaad jirantahay oo aadan shaqeyn karin. Halkan waxaan kugu tusin doonaa tallaabo tallaabo sida loo codsado.
requirements: Shaqo ku jirtay ugu yaraan 4 toddobaad ka hor intaadan jiranin
Waxaad ka shaqeysaa ugu yaraan 65,080 NOK sanadkii (badh kiisadda aasaasiga)
Waxaad leedahay warqad xanuun oo dhakhtar
Waxaad lumisay dakhli sababtoo ah xanuun
sykepenger.importantToKnow: Muhiim in la ogaado lacagta xanuunka
sykepenger.employerPeriodText: 16-ka maalmood ee ugu horeeya, loo shaqeeyahaaga ayaa bixiya lacagta xanuunka. Uma baahna inaad NAV codsato.
sykepenger.navPeriodText: Maalinta 17 ka dib, NAV ayaa la wareegta. Ka dib waa inaad codsad.
sykepenger.howMuchText: Waxaad helaysaa 100% dakhligaaga, ilaa 6G (qiyaastii 780,960 NOK). Loo shaqeeyahaagu wuxuu daboolaan karaa wax ka badan.
sykepenger.howLongText: Waxaad heli kartaa lacagta xanuunka ilaa 52 toddobaad (1 sano). Ka dib, waxaa laga yaabaa inaad xaq u leedahay AAP.
sykepenger.gradedTitle: Waa maxay fasaxa xanuunka qayb ahaan?
sykepenger.gradedIntro: Fasaxa xanuunka qayb ahaan macnaheedu waa inaad shaqeyso qaar, laakiin maaha waqti buuxa. Tusaale:
sykepenger.graded50: 50% fasax xanuun: Waxaad shaqeysaa badh maalin oo waxaad helaysaa lacagta xanuunka inta kale
sykepenger.graded80: 80% fasax xanuun: Waxaad shaqeysaa hal maalin toddobaadkii oo waxaad helaysaa lacagta xanuunka 4 maalmood
sykepenger.gradedBenefit: Fasaxa xanuunka qayb ahaan waa wanaagsan badanaa sababtoo ah waxaad la xiriirtaa shaqadaada oo si dhakhso ah u soo noqotaa.

steps.title: Ka hel warqad xanuun dhakhtarka
steps.description: Marka hore, waxaad u baahan tahay inaad ka hesho warqad xanuun dhakhtarkaaga. Dhakhtarku wuxuu u diraa warqadda xanuunka si elektaroonig ah NAV iyo loo shaqeeyahaaga. Uma baahna inaad wax ku sameyso warqadda xanuunka lafteeda.
steps.tip: Warqadda xanuunka waxay kuu soo diri karaan dhakhtarkaaga caadiga ah, caawin degdeg, ama takhasuus. Dhakhtarada ilkaha iyo kiropraktoraduna warqado xanuun ayay soo diri karaan qaar ka mid ah kiisaska.

steps.title: Gal nav.no
steps.description: Tag nav.no oo ku gal BankID ama MinID. Guji "Gal" geeska midig ee sare.
steps.tip: Warqaddaada xanuunka caadi ahaan waxay ka soo muuqataa nav.no 1-2 maalmood gudahooda ka dib booqashada dhakhtarka.

steps.title: Ka hel warqaddaada xanuunka
steps.description: Ka dib markii aad gasho, tag "Ditt sykefravær" (Fasaxaaga xanuunka) ama raadi ogeysiis warqad xanuun cusub oo ku taal bogga hore. Guji warqadda xanuunka si aad u furto.

steps.title: U dir warqadda xanuunka loo shaqeeyahaaga
steps.description: Waa inaad xaqiijisaa warqadda xanuunka oo aad u dirtaa loo shaqeeyahaaga. Ka dooro loo shaqeeyaha saxda ah liiska (haddii aad leedahay shaqooyin badan) oo guji "Dir".
steps.warning: Waa inaad soo gudbisaa warqadda xanuunka 3 bilood gudahooda, haddii kale waxaa laga yaabaa inaad lumiso xaqa lacagta xanuunka.

steps.title: Buuxi codsiga lacagta xanuunka (16 maalmood ka dib)
steps.description: 16-ka maalmood ee ugu horeeya, loo shaqeeyahaaga ayaa bixiya lacagta xanuunka. Ka dib, waa inaad NAV codsataa. Waxaad heli doontaa ogeysiis nav.no markaad wakhti u leedahay inaad codsato. Buuxi codsiga oo ku dar macluumaadka shaqada iyo dakhliga.
steps.tip: NAV wuxuu si toos ah u soo qaadanayaa macluumaad badan. Waxaad u baahan tahay oo keliya inaad xaqiijiso inay sax yihiin.

steps.title: Ka jawaab su'aalaha hawlaha
steps.description: Codsiga, waxaa lagu weydiinayaa haddii aad shaqeysay muddada xanuunka, haddii aad safartay, iyo haddii aad heshay dakhli kale. Ka jawaab su'aalaha oo dhan si daacad ah.
steps.warning: Haddii aad shaqeysay, waa inaad sheegta saacadaha. Tani waxay saamayn ku leedahay lacagta xanuunka ee aad helayso.

steps.title: Gudbi codsiga
steps.description: Markaad wax walba buuxiso, guji "Gudbi codsiga". Waxaad heli doontaa xaqiijin in codsiga la helay.

steps.title: Sug jawaabta
steps.description: NAV waxay baadhi codsigaaga, caadi ahaan 4 toddobaad gudahooda. Waxaad arki kartaa xaalada codsigaaga "Kiisaskeeyga" nav.no. Lacagta waxaa la bixiyaa dambe.
steps.tip: Lacagta xanuunka caadi ahaan waxaa la bixiyaa 25-ka bishii bishii hore.

foreldrepenger.title: Codso kaalmada waalidnimada
foreldrepenger.description: Wax kasta oo aad u baahan tahay inaad ogaato kaalmada waalidnimada iyo sida loo codsado
foreldrepenger.longDescription: Kaalmada waalidnimada waxay ku siinaysaa dakhli markaad guriga la joogto ilmahaaga. Halkan waxaan ku sharaxaynaa wax kasta oo aad u baahan tahay inaad ogaato si aad u codsato.
foreldrepenger.remainingWeeks: Toddobaadyada soo haray waxaa si xor ah loo qaybsan karaa waalidiinta dhexdooda.
foreldrepenger.youHaveRight: Waxaad xaq u leedahay kaalmada waalidnimada haddii:
rightConditions: Dakhli aad lahayd ugu yaraan 6 ka mid ah 10-ka bilood ee ugu dambeeyay
Waxaad ka shaqeysaa ugu yaraan 65,080 NOK sanadkii (0.5G)
Dakhligu wuxuu ka yimaadaa shaqo, shaqo xor ah, ama shaqo gaar
foreldrepenger.noRightText: Markaas waxaa laga yaabaa inaad xaq u leedahay lacag hal mar ah (qiyaastii 92,648 NOK) beddelkiisa. Tan ka codso si isku mid ah nav.no.
foreldrepenger.importantDates: Taariikhaha muhiimka ah ee la xusuusto
foreldrepenger.date4WeeksBefore: Ugu horreyn ee aad codsan karto kaalmada waalidnimada
foreldrepenger.calculatorTitle: Isticmaal xisaabiyaha kaalmada waalidnimada ee NAV!
foreldrepenger.calculatorText: Nav.no waxaad isticmaali kartaa xisaabiye ku tusinaya sida saxda ah waxa aad heli karto kaalmada waalidnimada. Ka raadi "foreldrepengekalkulator" nav.no.

steps.title: Hubi inaad xaq u leedahay kaalmada waalidnimada
steps.description: Waa inaad shaqeysay oo aad lahayd dakhli ugu yaraan 6 ka mid ah 10-ka bilood ee ugu dambeeyay ka hor inta aan fasaxa bilaabin. Waa inaad sidoo kale ka shaqeysaa ugu yaraan 65,080 NOK sanadkii.
steps.tip: Ma hubtid? Isticmaal xisaabiyaha nav.no si aad u aragto waxa aad heli karto.

steps.title: Gal nav.no
steps.description: Tag nav.no oo ku gal BankID. Guji "Gal" geeska midig ee sare.

steps.title: Ka hel codsiga kaalmada waalidnimada
steps.description: Ka raadi "foreldrepenger" goobta raadinta, ama tag "Qoyska iyo carruurta" oo dooro "Codsiga kaalmada waalidnimada". Waxaad codsan kartaa ugu horreyn 4 toddobaad ka hor taariikhda dhalashada.
steps.warning: Codso ugu danbayn maalinta ka horeysa fasaxa si aadan lacag u lumin!

steps.title: Buuxi macluumaadka naftaada
steps.description: Xaqiiji macluumaadkaaga shakhsiga: magaca, cinwaanka, iyo lambarka akoonka bangiga. Hubi in lambarka akoonku sax yahay - halkaas ayaa lacagta tagaysa.

steps.title: Bixi macluumaadka ilmaha
steps.description: Geli taariikhda la filayo ee dhalashada ama taariikhda dhalashada. Haddii ilmuhu dhashay, sidoo kale bixi magaca ilmaha iyo lambarka aqoonsiga. Korriinka, bixi taariikhda wareejinta daryeelka.

steps.title: Dooro heerka daboolida
steps.description: Waxaad ka dooran kartaa 100% daboolid 49 toddobaad ama 80% daboolid 59 toddobaad. Wadarta guud waa isku mid, laakiin qaybinta way kala duwan tahay.
steps.tip: 100% waxay siisaa lacago bil bil ah oo sare laakiin fasax gaaban. 80% waxay siisaa lacago bil bil ah oo hooseeya laakiin fasax dheer.

steps.title: Qorshe fasaxa
steps.description: U qaybi toddobaadyada hooyada iyo aabaha/hooyada kale. Xusuusnow in toddobaadyo qaar loo kaydsaday hooyada (3 toddobaad ka hor dhalashada) iyo qaar loo kaydsaday aabaha (qeybta aabaha 15 toddobaad).
steps.warning: Qeybta aabaha waa in la isticmaalaa, haddii kale way lumaysaa! Looma wareeji karo hooyada.

steps.title: Soo rar dukumeentiyada
steps.description: Waxaa laga yaabaa in lagaa codsado inaad soo rarto xaqiijinta taariikhda dhalashada oo ka timid dhakhtarka/umuliisada, ama dukumeentiyada dakhliga shaqada haddii NAV aan haysan.
steps.tip: Xaqiijinta taariikhda dhalashada waxaad helaysaa baaritaanka uurka ee kowaad, caadi ahaan qiyaastii toddobaadka 8-aad.

steps.title: Gudbi codsiga
steps.description: Dib u eeg macluumaadka oo dhan. Marka wax walba sax yihiin, guji "Gudbi codsiga". Waxaad heli doontaa xaqiijin iimayl ahaan.
steps.tip: Wakhtiga baadhistu waa caadi ahaan 4-6 toddobaad. Codso wakhti hore!

arbeidsledig.title: Iska diiwaan geli shaqo la'aan
arbeidsledig.description: Iska diiwaan geli shaqo raadiye NAV
arbeidsledig.longDescription: Markaad lumiso shaqada, waa inaad iska diiwaan gelisaa shaqo raadiye NAV. Tani waa tallaabada koowaad ee helitaanka kaalmada shaqo la'aanta iyo caawin helitaanka shaqo cusub.
arbeidsledig.whyRegister: Maxaa tahay inaad iska diiwaan geliso?

whyReasons.title: Hel kaalmada shaqo la'aanta
whyReasons.text: Waa inaad diiwaan gasho si aad u codsato kaalmada shaqo la'aanta

whyReasons.title: Hel shaqooyin
whyReasons.text: Loo shaqeeyayaashu waxay ku heli karaan arbeidsplassen.nav.no

whyReasons.title: Hel koorsooyin iyo tababarro
whyReasons.text: NAV waxay kuu soo bandhigi karaan koorsooyin, tababbar ama caawin kale

whyReasons.title: Hel la socodka
whyReasons.text: Waxaad helaysaa hage ku caawiya raadinta shaqada

arbeidsledig.warningTitle: Iska diiwaan geli sida ugu dhaqsiyaha badan!
arbeidsledig.warningText: Kaalmada shaqo la'aanta waxaa laga bilaabaa maalinta aad iska diiwaan geliso. Haddii aad sugto, waxaad lumi kartaa lacag. Iska diiwaan geli maalinta koowaad oo aadan shaqo lahayn.
arbeidsledig.prepareTitle: Diyaari tan ka hor intaadan bilaabin
prepareItems: Dulmar shaqooyinkii hore (loo shaqeeyaha, muddada, jagada)
CV (waa wanaagsan in la hayo, laakiin looma baahna)
arbeidsledig.stepsTitle: Sida loo iska diiwaan galiyo shaqo raadiye

afterSteps.title: Waxaad noqotaa mid loo shaqeeyayaashu arkaan
afterSteps.text: CV-gaaga waxay arag karaan shirkadaha raadinaya shaqaalaha

afterSteps.title: NAV waxay qiimeynayaan xaaladaada
afterSteps.text: Waxaad heli doontaa ogeysiis la socodka aad u baahan tahay

afterSteps.title: Waxaad codsan kartaa kaalmada shaqo la'aanta
afterSteps.text: Haddii aad xaq u leedahay kaalmada shaqo la'aanta, waxaad codsan kartaa isla markaas

afterSteps.title: Hayso profile-kaaga oo cusbooneysiin
afterSteps.text: Cusbooneysii CV-gaaga si joogto ah oo raadi shaqooyin si firfircoon

steps.title: Tag nav.no
steps.description: Fur browserkaaga oo tag nav.no. Guji "Gal" geeska midig ee sare oo ku gal BankID ama MinID.

steps.title: Ka hel "Iska diiwaan geli shaqo raadiye"
steps.description: Ka dib galitaanka, ka raadi "Shaqada" liiska ama raadi "diiwaan geli shaqo raadiye". Guji "Iska diiwaan geli shaqo raadiye".
steps.tip: Waxaad sidoo kale si toos ah u tagi kartaa arbeidsplassen.nav.no.

steps.title: Xaqiiji macluumaadka shakhsiga
steps.description: Hubi in magaca, cinwaanka iyo macluumaadka xiriirka sax yihiin. Haddii wax khaldan yihiin, waa inaad ka beddeshaa Diiwaanka Dadweynaha ama la xiriirto NAV.

steps.title: Bixi waxbarasho
steps.description: Buuxi waxbarashadaada ugu sarreysa ee la dhammeeyay. Dooro heerka (dugsiga hoose, dugsiga sare, shahaadada xirfadaha, jaamacadda iwm.) oo ku sharax nooca waxbarashadaada.
steps.tip: Sida aad u faahfaahiso, saas ayey NAV si fiican kuugu caawin karaan helitaanka shaqooyin ku habboon.

steps.title: Ku dar khibradda shaqada
steps.description: Liis gareey shaqooyinkii aad haysatay. Shaqo kasta, ku sheeg loo shaqeeyaha, jagada, iyo inta aad ku shaqeysay. Ka bilow shaqada ugu dambeysay.
steps.tip: Ku dar dhammaan shaqooyinka, sidoo kale shaqooyinka wakhti-qayb iyo shaqooyinka xagaaga. Wax walba waa muhiim!

steps.title: Bixi aqoonta iyo xirfadaha
steps.description: Ku dar xirfadaha aad leedahay: luqadaha, aqoonta kombiyuutarka, shahaadooyinka, shatiga darawalnimada iwm. Tani waxay ka caawisaa loo shaqeeyayaasha inay ku helaan.

steps.title: Dooro nooca shaqada aad raadinayso
steps.description: Dooro qaybaha shaqada iyo warshadaha aad xiisaynayso. Waxaad dooran kartaa kuwo badan. Sidoo kale sheeg halka aad diyaar u tahay inaad ka shaqeyso juqraafi ahaan.
steps.tip: U furan fursadaha kala duwan - taas waxay kordhisaa fursadaha helitaanka shaqo si dhaqso ah.

steps.title: Xaqiiji inaad tahay shaqo raadiye run ah
steps.description: Waa inaad xaqiijisaa inaad diyaar u tahay inaad qaadato shaqo, ka qaybgasho tababarrada iyo kullamada, oo aad si firfircoon shaqo u raadiso. Calaamadee inaad buuxiso shuruudaha.
steps.warning: Haddii aadan buuxin shuruudaha firfircoonida, waxaad lumi kartaa xaqa kaalmada shaqo la'aanta.

steps.title: Dhammee diiwaangelinta
steps.description: Dib u eeg dhammaan macluumaadka. Guji "Dhammee diiwaangelinta" marka wax walba sax yihiin. Hadda waad ka diiwaan gashan tahay shaqo raadiye!

steps.title: Codso kaalmada shaqo la'aanta (haddii ay khuseyso)
steps.description: Ka dib diiwaangelinta waxaa lagu weydiinayaa haddii aad rabto inaad codsato kaalmada shaqo la'aanta. Haddii aad xaq u leedahay kaalmada shaqo la'aanta, guji "Codso hadda" si aad u bilowdo codsiga.
steps.tip: Arag hagaheena "Codsiga kaalmada shaqo la'aanta" caawin faahfaahsan oo ku saabsan codsiga kaalmada.

meldekort.title: Gudbi foomka xaalada shaqada
meldekort.description: Sida loo buuxiyo oo loo gudbiyo foomka xaalada shaqada 14-kii maalmood
meldekort.longDescription: Foomka xaalada shaqada waa warbixin aad u dirto NAV 14-kii maalmood si aad u hesho lacagta kaalmada shaqo la'aanta. Waxay qaadataa oo keliya dhowr daqiiqo!
meldekort.deadlineText: Waa inaad soo dirtaa foomka xaalada shaqada wakhtigeeda si aad u hesho lacagta. Haddii aad soo dirto wakhti dambe, waxaad lumi kartaa lacag. Wakhtiga ugu dambeeya waa Isniin saacadda 23:00 ka dib marka muddada 14-maalmood ee dhammeyso.
meldekort.calendarTitle: Sida jadwalka foomka xaalada shaqadu u shaqeeyo

calendarSteps.label: Toddobaadka 1-2
calendarSteps.text: Waxaad shaqeysaa/raadinaysaa shaqo waxaadna la socdaa hawlahaaga

calendarSteps.label: Isniin
calendarSteps.text: Foomka xaalada shaqada ayaa diyaar noqonaya (ka dib marka muddadu dhammeyso)

calendarSteps.label: Gudaha 7 maalmood
calendarSteps.text: Waa inaad soo dirtaa foomka xaalada shaqada

calendarSteps.label: Lacag bixinta
calendarSteps.text: Caadi ahaan 2-3 maalmood shaqo ka dib markaad soo dirto

meldekort.stepsTitle: Sida loo buuxiyo foomka xaalada shaqada
meldekort.faqTitle: Su'aalaha caadiga ah ee ku saabsan foomka xaalada shaqada

faq.question: Maxaa dhaca haddii aan ilaabo inaan soo diro foomka xaalada shaqada?
faq.answer: Ma helaysid lacag bixin muddadaas. Soo dir foomka xaalada shaqada sida ugu dhaqsiyaha badan ee aad xasuusato - weli waxaad soo diri kartaa ilaa 8 maalmood oo dambe, laakiin waxaa lagaa jaraa lacag bixinta.

faq.question: Miyaan u baahan nahay inaan soo diro foomka xaalada shaqada markaan jiranyahay?
faq.answer: Haa, weli waa inaad soo dirtaa foomka xaalada shaqada. Calaamadee inaad jirantahay maalmaha ay khuseyso.

faq.question: Miyaan beddeli karaa foomka xaalada shaqada aan soo diray?
faq.answer: Maya, laakiin waxaad la xiriiri kartaa NAV haddii aad qalad samaysay. Wac 55 55 33 33.

faq.question: Waan helay shaqo - weli miyaan u baahan nahay inaan soo diro foomka xaalada shaqada?
faq.answer: Haa, soo dir foomka xaalada shaqada muddada ilaa aad bilowday shaqada. Sheeg saacadaha aad shaqeysay.

steps.title: Gal nav.no
steps.description: Tag nav.no oo ku gal BankID ama MinID. Waxaad sidoo kale isticmaali kartaa app-ka NAV ee telefoonka.
steps.tip: Soo dejiso app-ka NAV si aad u hesho xusuusin foomka xaalada shaqada!

steps.title: Ka hel foomka xaalada shaqada
steps.description: Ka dib galitaanka, ka raadi "Meldekort" bogga hore ama liiska. Guji "Soo dir meldekort" ama "Meldekort cusub".
steps.warning: Foomka xaalada shaqada wuxuu diyaar noqdaa maalinta aad soo diri karto, maaha ka hor.

steps.title: Hubi in muddadu sax tahay
steps.description: Foomka xaalada shaqada wuxuu khuseeyo 14-kii maalmood ee ugu dambeeyay. Hubi in taariikhaha sare ee kaadhka ku waafaqsan yihiin muddada aad warbixin ka bixineyso.

steps.title: Ka jawaab su'aalaha shaqada
steps.description: Waxaa lagu weydiinayaa haddii aad shaqeysay muddada. Ka jawaab "Haa" ama "Maya" toddobaad kasta. Haddii aad shaqeysay, waa inaad sheegto saacadaha intee le'eg.
steps.tip: Si sax ah u sheeg saacadaha. Tani waxay saamaysaa inta aad helayso lacag ahaan.
steps.warning: Sheegista saacadaha khaldan waxay horseedaysaa inaad dib u bixiso lacag.

steps.title: Ka jawaab su'aalaha xanuunka
steps.description: Haddii aad jirantahay oo aadan shaqeyn karin ama raadin karin shaqo, calaamadee tan. Haddii aad jirantahay in ka badan 3 maalmood, waxaa laga yaabaa inaad xaq u leedahay lacagta xanuunka.

steps.title: Ka jawaab su'aalaha fasaxa/maqnaanshaha
steps.description: Ma qaadatay fasax, ma joogtay dibadda, ama ma lahayd maqnaansho kale? Sheeg tan maalmaha ay khuseyso. Ma helaysid kaalmada shaqo la'aanta maalmaha fasaxa.

steps.title: Ka jawaab su'aalaha koorsadaha/waxbarasho
steps.description: Haddii aad tagtay koorsado ama qaadatay waxbarasho, sheeg tan. Koorsooyin qaar ayaa siinaya xaq kaalmada shaqo la'aanta, kuwo kalena maya.

steps.title: Xaqiiji inaad tahay shaqo raadiye
steps.description: Waa inaad xaqiijisaa inaad weli raadinayso shaqo oo aad diyaar u tahay inaad qaadato shaqo. Calaamadee inaad buuxiso shuruudaha.

steps.title: Hubi oo soo dir
steps.description: Dib u eeg dhammaan jawaabaha. Haddii wax walba sax yihiin, guji "Soo dir meldekort". Waxaad helaysaa xaqiijin in foomka xaalada shaqada la diray.
steps.tip: Ka qaad sawir shaashada xaqiijinta dukumentiga shakhsiga ahaaneed.

pensjon.title: Codso hawlgabka da'da
pensjon.description: Hage tallaabo-tallaabo ah si loo codsado hawlgabka da'da NAV
pensjon.longDescription: Hawlgabka da'da waa lacag aad ka hesho NAV markaad da' waynaato. Halkan waxaan kugu tusin doonaa sida loo hubiyo waxa aad xaq u leedahay iyo sida loo codsado.
pensjon.whoCanGetIntro: Waxaad qaadan kartaa hawlgabka da'da markaad:
requirements: Jirto u dhaxaysa 62 iyo 75 sano (waxaad doorataa goorta aad rabto inaad bilowdo)
Ku nooleyd ama ku shaqeysay Norway ugu yaraan 5 sano ka dib markaad gaadhay 16 sano
Tahay xubin ka mid ah ceymiska dadweynaha
pensjon.importantChoicesTitle: Doorashooyin muhiim ah oo aad samayn lahayd

importantChoices.title: Goorma bilowdaa?
importantChoices.description: Sida aad ugu hore u qaadato hawlgabka, saas ayey u yar tahay lacagta aad hesho bishii. Haddii aad sugto ilaa 67 sano, waxaad helaysaa hawlgab buuxa. Haddii aad qaadato 62 jir, waxaad helaysaa wax yar - laakiin sannado badan.

importantChoices.title: Intee ayaad rabta inaad qaadato?
importantChoices.description: Waxaad qaadan kartaa 20%, 40%, 50%, 60%, 80% ama 100% hawlgabkaaga. Waxaad shaqeyn kartaa dhinac hawlgabka oo aan la dhimin.

importantChoices.title: Ma rabta inaad ku darto shaqo?
importantChoices.description: Waxaad shaqeyn kartaa inta aad rabto dhinaca hawlgabka da'da. Dakhligaagu ma saameeyo hawlgabka.

documents: Lambarka akoonka bangiga halka aad rabto hawlgabka lagugu siiyo
Dulmar ku saabsan joogitaanyo dibadda ah (haddii aad ku nooleyd wadamo kale)

steps.title: Hubi hawlgabkaaga nav.no marka hore
steps.description: Ka hor intaadan codsan, waa inaad hubisaa waxa aad heli karto. Tag nav.no oo gal. Ka raadi "Din pensjon" ama tag "Pensjon" liiska. Halkan waxaad ku arkaysaa inta aad heli karto da'aha kala duwan.
steps.tip: Xisaabiyaha hawlgabka wuxuu kugu tusayaa si sax ah inta aad helaysaa 62, 67 ama da'aha kale. Qaado wakhti si aad tan u fahamto marka hore!

steps.title: Go'aanso goorta iyo intee le'eg
steps.description: Ku salaysan xisaabiyaha, go'aanso goorta aad rabto inaad bilowdo iyo qayb intee le'eg oo aad rabto inaad qaadato. Xusuusnow: waxaad beddeli kartaa heerka qaadashada dambe, laakiin ma ka noqon kartid inaad bilowday qaadashada.
steps.warning: Marka aad mar hore bilowdo qaadashada hawlgabka, ma joojin kartid gebi ahaan. Waxaad oo keliya beddeli kartaa inta aad qaadanayso.

steps.title: Gal nav.no
steps.description: Tag nav.no oo ku gal BankID ama MinID. Guji "Gal" geeska midig ee sare.
steps.tip: Arag hagaheena "Gal NAV" haddii aad u baahan tahay caawin.

steps.title: Ka hel codsiga hawlgabka
steps.description: Ka dib galitaanka, tag "Pensjon" liiska ama raadi "søk alderspensjon". Guji "Codso hawlgabka da'da".
steps.tip: Waxaad sidoo kale wici kartaa NAV 55 55 33 33 oo heli kartaa caawin si aad telefoonka ugu codsato.

steps.title: Buuxi macluumaadka shakhsiga
steps.description: Codsiga wuxuu muujinayaa macluumaadkaaga shakhsiga. Hubi in magaca, cinwaanka iyo lambarka akoonka sax yihiin. Haddii wax khaldan yihiin, waa inaad beddeshaa ka hor intaadan sii wadin.
steps.warning: Si taxadar leh u hubi lambarka akoonka - halkaas ayaa hawlgabku imanayaa!

steps.title: Dooro goorta aad rabto inaad bilowdo qaadashada
steps.description: Dooro bisha aad rabto inaad bilowdo helitaanka hawlgabka. Waxaad ugu horreyn bilaabi kartaa bisha ka dib markaad codsato.
steps.tip: Dadka badankoodu waxay dooranayaan inay ka bilaabaan 1-da bisha fududayn darteed.

steps.title: Dooro heerka qaadashada
steps.description: Dooro qayb intee le'eg oo hawlgabka ah aad rabto inaad qaadato: 20%, 40%, 50%, 60%, 80% ama 100%. Waxaad arkaysaa inta tani u dhiganto kroner bishii.
steps.tip: Dad badan ayaa dooranaya 100% markaay gebi ahaan joojiyaan shaqada, ama heer hooseeya haddii ay sii wadaan shaqo wakhti-qayb ah.

steps.title: Sheeg AFP haddii ay jirto
steps.description: Haddii aad leedahay AFP (hawlgab heshiis) oo ka timid loo shaqeeyahaaga, waa inaad tan sheegto. AFP iyo hawlgabka da'da waa la isku dari karaa.
steps.tip: Ma hubtid haddii aad leedahay AFP? Weydii loo shaqeeyahaaga ama la hubi sanduuqa hawlgabkaaga.

steps.title: Sheeg joogitaanyo dibadda ah
steps.description: Haddii aad ku nooleyd ama ku shaqeysay wadamo kale, waa inaad tan sheegto. Tani waxay saameyni kartaa inta hawlgab ah ee aad ka hesho Norway iyo haddii aad xaq u leedahay hawlgab wadamo kale.
steps.tip: Waddamada EU/EØS iyo waddamada Norway ay heshiisyo ceymis la leedahay waxay ku siin karaan xaq hawlgab halkaas sidoo kale.

steps.title: Akhri oo soo gudbi
steps.description: Hubi dhammaan macluumaadka. Marka wax walba sax yihiin, guji "Gudbi codsiga". Waxaad helaysaa xaqiijin shaashada iyo iimayl.
steps.tip: Kaydi xaqiijinta. NAV caadi ahaan waxay baadhi codsiyada 4 toddobaad gudahooda.

pensjon.importantTitle: Muhiim in la ogaado hawlgabka da'da

importantInfo.title: Jarista canshuurta
importantInfo.description: Canshuur ayaa laga jaraa hawlgabkaaga. Waxaad beddeli kartaa jarista canshuurta skatteetaten.no.

importantInfo.title: Lacag bixinta
importantInfo.description: Hawlgabka caadi ahaan waxaa la bixiyaa qiyaastii 20-ka bisha.

importantInfo.title: Waa la beddeli karaa
importantInfo.description: Waxaad beddeli kartaa heerka qaadashada (inta aad qaadanayso) hal mar sanadkii.

importantInfo.title: Ka shaqeynta dhinaca
importantInfo.description: Waxaad shaqeyn kartaa inta aad rabto iyada oo aan hawlgabka la dhimin. Waxaad sidoo kale sii kasbanaysaa hawlgab dheeraad ah haddii aad shaqeyso.

pensjon.faqTitle: Su'aalaha caadiga ah ee ku saabsan hawlgabka da'da

faq.question: Goorma ayaan qaadan lahaa hawlgabka?
faq.answer: Waxay ku xiran tahay xaaladaada. Haddii aad qaadato hore (62-66), waxaad helaysaa wax yar bishii, laakiin sannado badan. Haddii aad sugto ilaa 67 ama ka dib, waxaad helaysaa wax badan bishii. Isticmaal xisaabiyaha nav.no si aad u aragto waxa kugu habboon.

faq.question: Miyaan shaqeyn karaa iyadoo aan haysto hawlgab isku mar?
faq.answer: Haa! Waxaad shaqeyn kartaa inta aad rabto iyada oo aan hawlgabka la dhimin. Waxaad xitaa sii kasbanaysaa hawlgab badan markaad shaqeyso.

faq.question: Maxay tahay farqiga u dhexeeya hawlgabka da'da iyo AFP?
faq.answer: Hawlgabka da'da waa ka ceymiska dadweynaha (NAV) waxaana qof walba xaq u leeyahay. AFP waa hawlgab dheeraad ah oo ka yimaada loo shaqeeyayaasha leh heshiiska AFP. Waxaad haysan kartaa labadaba isku mar.

faq.question: Miyaan ka noqon karaa haddii aan qaato hawlgab aad u hore?
faq.answer: Maya, ma joojin kartid qaadashada gebi ahaan markaad mar hore bilowday. Laakiin waxaad hoos u dhigi kartaa heerka qaadashada ilaa 20%.

uforetrygd.title: Codso naafada
uforetrygd.description: Hage tallaabo-tallaabo ah si loo codsado naafada marka caafimaadku kaa hor joogsado shaqada
uforetrygd.longDescription: Naafada waa lacag aad ka heli karto NAV haddii aadan shaqeyn karin sababtoo ah xanuun ama dhaawac. Halkan waxaan kugu tusin doonaa sida loo codsado.
uforetrygd.whoCanGetIntro: Si aad u hesho naafada waa inaad caadi ahaan:
requirements: Jirto u dhaxaysa 18 iyo 67 sano
Ka ahayd xubin ceymiska dadweynaha 5-dii sano ee ugu dambeeyay ka hor intaadan jiranin
Leedahay awoodda shaqada oo hoos u dhacday oo joogto ah sababtoo ah xanuun ama dhaawac
Tijaabisay daaweyn iyo tababarro shaqo oo aan ku filnayn
uforetrygd.beforeApplyingText: NAV caadi ahaan waxay u baahan tahay inaad tijaabisay wax kale marka hore:
beforeApplying: Ahayd fasax xanuun oo heshay lacagta xanuunka
Ahayd AAP (lacagta caddaynta shaqada) oo tijaabisay tababarro
Isku dayday in lagu habeeyaa goobta shaqada
documents: Warqadda dhakhtarka ama dukumeentiga caafimaadka (NAV badanaa ayaa tan iska soo qaadanaya)
Dulmar daaweynta iyo tababarrada aad hore u tijaabisay

steps.title: La hadal NAV marka hore
steps.description: Ka hor intaadan codsanin, waa inaad la hadashaa hagahaaga NAV. Waxay qiimeyn karaan haddii aad tijaabisay tababarro ku filan iyo haddii wakhtiga codsiga uu saxsan yahay.
steps.tip: Wac NAV 55 55 33 33 ama codso wadahadal nav.no.

steps.title: Dhakhtarkaaga ka codso dukumeenti
steps.description: Dhakhtarkaaga caadiga ah waa inuu qoraa warqad dhakhtar oo sharaxaysa xanuunkaaga iyo sida uu u saameeyo awoodda shaqada. NAV waxay sidoo kale ka soo qaadan karaan macluumaad si toos ah dhakhtarka.
steps.tip: U sheeg dhakhtarka inaad qorsheynayso inaad codsato naafada, si ay u diyaariyaan dukumeentiga.

steps.title: Gal nav.no
steps.description: Tag nav.no oo ku gal BankID ama MinID.
steps.tip: Waxaad sidoo kale codsiga ku soo gudbin kartaa warqad ama caawin ka heli kartaa xafiiska NAV.

steps.title: Ka hel codsiga naafada
steps.description: Ka raadi "uføretrygd" goobta raadinta ama tag "Codsiyada" oo ka hel "Codsiga naafada".
steps.tip: Codsiga waa dheer - u qaybi wakhti ku filan. Waxaad keydin kartaa oo sii wadi kartaa dambe.

steps.title: Buuxi macluumaadka shakhsiga
steps.description: Hubi in macluumaadkaaga shakhsigu sax yihiin. Bixi lambarka akoonka bangiga lacag bixinta.
steps.warning: Hubi in lambarka akoonku sax yahay - halkaas ayaa naafadu imanaysaa.

steps.title: Sharax xanuunkaaga/dhaawacaaga
steps.description: Waa inaad sharaxdaa waxa kugu dhacay iyo sida ay u saameyso maalinkaaga iyo awoodda shaqadaada. Ahaaw daacad oo faahfaahsan.
steps.tip: Sharax sida maalin caadi ah ay u eg tahay - maxaad awooddo iyo maxaad awoodin?

steps.title: Sheeg daaweynta iyo tababarrada
steps.description: Liis gareey dhammaan daaweynta aad heshay iyo tababarrada aad tijaabisay. Tani waxay ku jirtaa fasaxa xanuunka, AAP, daaweynta caafimaadka, qalliimaha, dib-u-soo-kabashada iwm.
steps.tip: Sida ay dukumeenti badan u tahay, saas ayey u fiican tahay. NAV waxay u baahan tahay inay arkaan inaad isku dayday inaad ladnaato.

steps.title: Sheeg taariikhda shaqada
steps.description: Buuxi macluumaadka ku saabsan shaqooyinkii aad haysatay iyo waxbarashadaada. NAV waxay tan u isticmaali si ay u xisaabiyaan inta aad helayso.
steps.tip: NAV waxay si toos ah u soo qaadanaysaa macluumaad badan, laakiin hubi inay sax yihiin.

steps.title: Gudbi codsiga
steps.description: Dib u eeg dhammaan jawaabaha oo gudbi codsiga. Waxaad helaysaa xaqiijin in la helay.
steps.warning: Wakhtiga baadhistu badanaa waa dheer - 3-6 bilood ayaa caadi ah. Waxaad heli doontaa ogeysiis marka NAV u baahato macluumaad badan.

afterApplying.title: La soco nav.no
afterApplying.description: Soo gal si joogto ah si aad u aragto haddii NAV ay kuu soo direen ogeysiisyo ama u baahan yihiin macluumaad badan.

afterApplying.title: Tag yeerashada
afterApplying.description: NAV waxay kugu yeeran karaan wadahadal ama baaritaan. Waa muhiim inaad soo tago.

afterApplying.title: Ka jawaab codsiyada
afterApplying.description: Haddii NAV ay codsadaan dukumeenti dheeraad ah, ka jawaab sida ugu dhaqsiyaha badan. Tani waxay gaabisaa wakhtiga baadhistu.

uforetrygd.howMuchText: Naafada caadi ahaan waa 66% dakhligaagii ka hor intaadan jiranin, ilaa 6G (qiyaastii 780,960 kr). Ugu yaraan waa qiyaastii 2.5G kuwa keligood ah. Waxaad sidoo kale shaqeyn kartaa wax yar dhinaca oo aadan lumin naafada oo dhan.
important: Waxaad haysan kartaa naafada qayb ah (tusaale 50%) oo ka shaqeysaa wakhti-qayb dhinaca
Naafada waxay ku siinaysaa xaq hawlgabka da'da laga bilaabo 67 sano
Waxaad haysataa naafada haddii aad ka jirantahay, laakiin waa la dhimi karaa haddii aad ladnaato
Waa inaad u sheegtaa NAV haddii xaaladaadu isbeddeshay

skattemelding.title: Hubi warbixinta canshuurta
skattemelding.description: Sida loo helo oo loo hubiyo warbixintaada canshuurta
skattemelding.longDescription: Warbixinta canshuurta waxay muujisaa waxa aad shaqeysay iyo waxa aad ku bixisay canshuur. Halkan waxaad baranaysaa sida loo hubiyo in wax walba sax yihiin.
skattemelding.whatIsText1: Warbixinta canshuurta waa dulmar dhammaan dakhliga iyo dhimisyada sanadkii hore. Hey'adda Canshuurta waxay buuxisaa inta badan si toos ah oo ku saleysan macluumaadka ka yimid loo shaqeeyayaasha, bangiyada iyo kuwo kale.
skattemelding.whatIsText2: Shaqadaadu waa inaad hubiso in wax walba sax yihiin oo aad ku darto dhimisyada maqan.
skattemelding.commonErrorsTitle: Qalado caadi ah oo la eego

commonErrors.title: Dakhli maqan
commonErrors.text: Ma lahayd shaqo dheeraad ah ama iibisay wax aan ku jirin?

commonErrors.title: Safarada shaqada ee khaldan
commonErrors.text: Fogaanta shaqada ma si sax ah ayaa loo xisaabiyay?

commonErrors.title: Amaah maqan
commonErrors.text: Dhammaan amaahyadaada ma ku jiraan si aad u hesho dhimista dheexa?

commonErrors.title: Qiimaha guriga ee khaldan
commonErrors.text: Qiimaha gurigu ma waafaqsanyahay qiimaha suuqa?

skattemelding.deadlineText: Wakhtiga ugu dambeeya ee hubinta iyo gudbinta warbixinta canshuurta waa 30 Abriil. Haddii aadan samaynin isbeddello, waxay si toos ah u noqotaa mid la aqbalay macluumaadkii hore loo buuxiyay.

steps.title: Tag skatteetaten.no
steps.description: Fur browserkaaga oo ku qor "skatteetaten.no" xariiqda cinwaanka. Riix Enter si aad u tagto bogga.
steps.tip: Waxaad sidoo kale ka raadin kartaa "Skatteetaten" Google.

steps.title: Ku gal BankID
steps.description: Guji "Gal" geeska midig ee sare. Dooro BankID (telefoonka ama qalabka koodhka) oo raac tilmaamaha si aad u gasho.
steps.warning: Waa inaad haysataa BankID si aad u aragto warbixintaada canshuurta. MinID halkan kuma shaqeyso.

steps.title: Ka hel warbixinta canshuurta
steps.description: Ka dib galitaanka waxaad imanaysaa "Min side". Guji "Skattemelding" liiska, ama ka raadi sanduuq leh "Warbixintaada canshuurta [sanadka]".
steps.tip: Warbixinta canshuurta caadi ahaan waxay diyaar noqotaa Maarso.

steps.title: Dib u eeg dakhligaaga
steps.description: Warbixinta canshuurta waxay muujisaa dhammaan dakhliga Hey'adda Canshuurta ay kugu diiwaan geliyeen: mushaharka, hawlgabka, dheexa, qeybta faa'iidada iwm. Hubi in lambarada ku waafaqsan yihiin waxa aad shaqeysay.
steps.warning: Haddii wax maqan yihiin ama khaldan yihiin, waa inaad ku dartaa ama beddeshaa. Waxaad mas'uul ka tahay in warbixinta canshuurtu sax tahay.

steps.title: Hubi dhimisyada
steps.description: Dib u eeg dhimisyada la liisiyay. Kuwaani waxay noqon karaan kharashyada dheexa amaahda, lacagta xubnimada ururka, kharashyada safarka shaqada, iwm. Dhimisyo qaar si toos ah ayaa loo daraa, kuwo kalena waa inaad adigu ku dartaa.
steps.tip: Dad badan ayaa illoobaya dhimisyada! Eeg hagaheena ku saabsan dhimisyada si aad u aragto waxa aad dhimi karto.

steps.title: Arag canshuurta la xisaabiyay
steps.description: Meeshee hoose ee warbixinta canshuurta waxaad ku arkaysaa xisaabinta canshuurta. Halkan waxaad ku arkaysaa haddii aad bixisay canshuur badan oo xad dhaaf ah ama in yar sanadka oo dhan.
steps.tip: Lambar cagaar ah = waxaad dib u helaysaa lacag. Lambar cas ah = waa inaad bixisaa canshuur dhaafka ah.

steps.title: Samee isbeddello haddii loo baahdo
steps.description: Haddii wax khaldan yihiin ama maqan yihiin, guji "Beddel" qodobka khuseeya. Buuxi macluumaadka saxda ah oo kaydi. Waxaad samayn kartaa isbeddello badan inta aad rabto ka hor wakhtiga.

steps.title: Gudbi warbixinta canshuurta
steps.description: Haddii wax walba sax yihiin, guji "Gudbi" ama "Soo dir" meeshee hoose ee bogga. Waxaad helaysaa xaqiijin in warbixinta canshuurta la gudbiyay. Haddii aadan samaynin isbeddello, si toos ah ayay u gudbmaysaa wakhtiga.
steps.tip: Waxaad helaysaa rasiid iimayl ahaan ama sanduuqaaga Altinn.

fradrag.title: Ku dar dhimista
fradrag.description: Sida dhimista loogu daro warbixinta canshuurta
fradrag.longDescription: Dhimisyadu waxay yareeyan canshuurta. Dad badan ayaa illoobaya dhimisyada ay xaq u leeyihiin! Halkan waxaan kugu tusin doonaa dhammaan dhimisyada iyo sida loo ku daro.
fradrag.whatIsText: Dhimisyadu waa kharashyo laga jarayo dakhligaaga ka hor inta aan canshuurta la xisaabin. Sida aad dhimisyo badan u leedahay, saas ayey canshuurta aad bixiso u yar tahay.
fradrag.exampleText: Haddii aad shaqeyso 500,000 kr oo aad leedahay 50,000 kr oo dhimis ah, waxaad bixisaa canshuurta 450,000 kr beddelkiis. Boqolleeyaha canshuurta 22%, waxaad badbaadisaa qiyaastii 11,000 kr canshuur ahaan!
fradrag.allDeductionsTitle: Dhammaan dhimisyada aad xaq u leedahay
fradrag.allDeductionsText: Safaari liiska oo hubi haddii wax kugu khuseeyo!
fradrag.tipText: Skatteetaten way codsan kartaa dukumeentiyadda fradragaha kaaga ilaa 10 sano. Qaadi sawir rasiiqdaha oo kaydo digital.

items.name: Safar shaqo
items.description: Haddii aad socdid 37 km ama ka badan sidii hal aag ah, waxaad heli kartaa khasaarad
items.amount: Qiyaastii 1.90 kr km kasta oo 37 km ka badan

items.name: Lacagta xubin urur-shaqaale
items.description: Xusuqaalka urur-shaqaalaha waxa lagu bixiyaa khasaarad si automatic ah

items.name: Xafiiska guriga
items.description: Haddii aad midig guri ka shaqeynaysid, waxaad heli kartaa khasaarad

items.name: Qalabka iyo qalabka
items.description: Qalabka aad u baahan tahay shaqadda oo ay shaqaalaha kama tirtiri

items.name: Kharashyada renta
items.description: Renta amaahda guri, baabuurta, waxbarasho iyo kuwa kale

items.name: BSU (Kaydinta Guri ee ay gaarka u leeyihiin)
items.description: Kaydinta guri ee ay gaarka u leeyihiin dad ka yar 34 jir

items.name: Karaaxida guri oo ay qof kale haysto
items.description: Kharashyo karaaxida hadii aad guri qof kale u haysto

items.name: Hadiyada uurrada isqabaan
items.description: Hadiyada ururrada ansaxmay (Qamaaxa Cas, Hakim Aan Xuduud ah iwm.)

items.name: Khasaarada waalidka
items.amount: Illaa 15,000 kr hal caruur, +10,000 kr caruur kasta oo dheeraad ah (2026)

items.name: Khasaarada gaar ah ee ardayga hal-mid
items.amount: Automatikyada hadii aad ku buufi kartid

items.name: Khasaarada gaar ah ee caabuqyada weyn
items.description: Kharashyo ka badan 9 180 kr caabuq aan la degin

steps.title: Gal skatteetaten.no
steps.description: Tag skatteetaten.no oo gal adiga oo isticmaalaya BankID. Tag warbixinta canshuurta.

steps.title: Hel "Dhimis" ama "Beddel"
steps.description: Warbixinta canshuurta waxaad ku arki kartaa dulmar dhammaan ereyada. Hel qaybta dhimisyada, ama guji "Beddel" ereyga aad rabto inaad dhimis ku daarto.

steps.title: Dooro nooca dhimista
steps.description: Dooro nooca dhimista aad rabto inaad liiska ku daarto. Iyada ugu caasaysa waa kharashyada safarka, rente, kharashyada isku kasbadeeda iyo hadiyada wakaarada volunteers.
steps.tip: Eeg liiska hoos dhammaan dhimisyada aad xaq u leedahay!

steps.title: Buuxi qadarka
steps.description: Gal qadarka aad codsato dhimis. Waxaad awoodi kartaa inaad caddeysdo qadarka haddii Hey'adda Canshuurta su'aasho.
steps.warning: Ha ku qiyaasi qadarka! Waxaad u baahan tahay resiipto ama caddeyn kale.

steps.title: Keydi isbeddellada
steps.description: Guji "Keydi" ama "Ku dar" si aad u keydhiso dhimista. Waxaad si degdeg ah arka sida uu canshuurtu isbeddeli.

steps.title: Duubee dhimisyada kale
steps.description: Safaari liiska hoos oo hubi haddii aad dhimisyada kale aad illoobay. Ku dar dhammaan kuwa aad xaq u leedahay.

steps.title: Arka xisaabinta canshuurta cusub
steps.description: Markaad dhammeyso inaad ku daarto dhimisyada, waxaad hoos bogga ku arki qiyaastii canshuur aad badbaadi karto ama haddii aad lacag dib kuugu soo celinayo.
steps.tip: Lambarka cagaaran = lacag dib kugu soo celinayo. Lambarka cas = waa inaad lacag badan bixisaa.

skattekort.title: Beddel kaadhka canshuurta
skattekort.longDescription: Kaadhka canshuurtu wuxuu go'aamiyaa inta canshuur laga jaro mushaarahaaga bishiiba. Haddii xaaladaada nolol ay isbeddeli, waa inaad cusboonaysiisaa.
skattekort.whatIsText: Kaadhka canshuurtu wuxuu u sheegaa loo shaqeeyahaaga inta canshuur ee laga jari mushaarahaaga. Wuxuu ku salaysan yahay dakhli la filayo iyo jarriidadaha.

cardTypes.desc: Loo isticmaalo jaridda bishiiba ee joogtada ah. Ugu badan shaqaalaha mushaar qaata.
Boqolkiiba go'an ayaa la jaraa iyadoo aan loo eegin qadarka. Caadi u ah shaqooyinka dheeraadka ah.

whenToChangeList: Waxaad heshay shaqo cusub oo mushaar sare ama hoose leh
Waxaad bilaabay ama joojisey shaqo dheeraad ah
Waxaad qaadatay amaah guri (kharashka dulsaarta ah)
Waxaad noqotay waalid kaliya ah ama heshay lammaane
Waxaad bixinaysaa canshuur badan ama yar

steps.title: Gal skatteetaten.no
steps.description: Tag skatteetaten.no oo gal adiga oo isticmaalaya BankID. Guji "Gal" geeska sare ee midig.

steps.title: Hel "Kaadhka Canshuurta"
steps.description: Kadib marka aad gasho, hel "Kaadhka Canshuurta" menu-ga ama bogga hore. Guji si aad u aragto kaadhkaaga canshuurta ee hadda jira.

steps.title: Arag kaadhka canshuurta ee hadda jira
steps.description: Hadda waxaad arki kaadhkaaga canshuurta iyo lambarka shaxda iyo heerka boqolkiiba. Lambarka shaxda ayaa loo shaqeeyahaagu u isticmaali si uu u jaro canshuurta saxda ah.
steps.tip: Lambarka shaxda 7100 ayaa caadi u ah badanaa. Lambar hoose = jarriid canshuur yar.

steps.title: Guji "Beddel kaadhka Canshuurta"
steps.description: Haddii aad rabto inaad beddesho kaadhka canshuurta, guji "Beddel" ama "Ogolow kaadhka canshuurta cusub".

steps.title: Sheeg isbeddelada dakhliga
steps.description: Buuxi inta aad filayso inaad ka hesho sannadkan. Haddii aad heshay shaqo cusub, mushaar sare, ama waaydey dakhli, cusboonaysii.
steps.tip: Aad u saxsax. Qiyaas sarreysa = canshuur badan. Qiyaas hooseysa = dib u bixin.

steps.title: Ku dar jarriidadaha aad taqaano
steps.description: Haddii aad taqaano inaad yeelan jarriidado waaweyn (amaahda guriga, kharashyada safarka), waxaad gelin kartaa hadda si aad u yarayso jarriidda canshuurta.
steps.warning: Ha ku xadjin jarriidadaha - waxaad khatar gelinaysaa dib u bixin sannadka dambe.

steps.title: Arag jarriidda canshuurta ee cusub
steps.description: Xisaabiyaha ayaa ku tusi jarriidda canshuurta ee cusub. Isbarbar dhig tan hadda jirta si aad u aragto isbeddellada.

steps.title: Xaqiiji isbeddelka
steps.description: Haddii aad ku qanacsantahay, guji "Ogolow" ama "Xaqiiji". Kaadhka canshuurta ee cusub ayaa si toos ah loogu diri loo shaqeeyahaaga.
steps.tip: Loo shaqeeyahu wuxuu heli kaadhka canshuurta ee cusub si elektaroonig ah dhowr maalmood gudahooda.

skattekort.tooMuchTaxText: Haddii aad sanadkasta hesho lacag badan oo dib kuu soo celinayo, waxay u badan tahay inaad bixinayso canshuur badan.
skattekort.tooMuchTaxSolution: Beddel kaadhka canshuurta si aad u hesho lacag badan bishiiba halkii aad u sugteen xisaabinta canshuurta.
skattekort.tooLittleTaxText: Haddii aad inta badan yeelanayso canshuur dhaafsiisan, waa inaad kordhisaa jarriidda canshuurta.
skattekort.tooLittleTaxSolution: Beddel kaadhka canshuurta si aad bishiiba uga jarto canshuur badan oo ka fogaato biilal waaweyn Juun.
skattekort.tipText: Kaadhka canshuurta cusub ee sannadka soo socda ayaa si toos ah u imanaya Diseembar. Uma baahnid inaad dalabto adiga qudhaa haddii aanad rabin inaad samayso isbeddelad.

skatteoppgjoer.title: Arag xisaabinta canshuurta
skatteoppgjoer.longDescription: Baro sida aad u heli oo u fahamto xisaabintaada canshuurta. Ogow haddii aad lacag dib kuugu soo celinayo ama aad tahay mid bixin.
skatteoppgjoer.whenNote: Waxaad heli fariinta SMS ama iimeyl markay xisaabintu diyaar tahay.

steps.title: Tag skatteetaten.no
steps.description: Fur browserkaaga oo ku qor "skatteetaten.no" cinwaanka.
steps.tip: Waxa kale oo aad ka raadin kartaa "Hey'adda Canshuurta" Google.

steps.title: Gal BankID
steps.description: Guji "Gal" bogga kor. Dooro BankID oo raac tilmaamaha.

steps.title: Hel "Xisaabinta Canshuurta"
steps.description: Kadib marka aad gasho, hel oo guji "Xisaabinta Canshuurta" ama "Arka xisaabinta canshuurta". Badiyaa waxaad ka heli bogga hore kadib marka aad gasho.
steps.tip: Xisaabinta canshuurtu badiyaa waxay timaadaa Juun-Oktoobar, iyadoo ku xiran goorta aad soo gudbisay warbixinta canshuurta.

steps.title: Dooro sannadka
steps.description: Haddii aad rabto inaad aragto xisaabinno canshuur oo hore, dooro sannadka saxda ah liiska. Tan ugu cusub badiyaa waa kor.

steps.title: Akhri xisaabinta canshuurta
steps.description: Hadda waxaad arki dulmar canshuuraha. Tirooyin muhiimka ah: "Fastsatt skatt" (intaad bixin wadarta), "Innbetalt forskuddsskatt/skattetrekk" (intaad horay u bixisay) iyo "Restskatt/Til gode" (haddii aad leedahay ama dib kuu soo celinayo).
steps.tip: Qadarka cagaaran = lacag dib kuu soo celinayo. Qadarka cas = dib u bixin.

steps.title: Fahom natiijooyinka
steps.description: Haddii aad lacag leedahay oo dib kuu soo celinayo, si toos ah ayaa loo wareejin akoonkaaga. Haddii aad tahay dib u bixin, waxaad heli macluumaad goorta iyo sida loo bixiyo.
steps.warning: Dib u bixinta ka badan 1000 kr ayaa loo qaybiyaa laba xilli. Hubi taariikhaha!

steps.title: Soo deji xisaabinta canshuurta
steps.description: Waxaad soo dejin kartaa xisaabinta canshuurta PDF ahaan adiga oo gujinaya "Soo Dejiso" ama "Daabi". Tani waxay faa'iido u noqon kartaa codsiyada amaahda ama dukumeentiga.

skatteoppgjoer.moneyBackText: Haddii aad lacag leedahay oo dib kuu soo celinayo, si toos ah ayaa loo wareejin akoonka ku diiwaangashan Hey'adda Canshuurta.
moneyBackList: Lacag bixintu badiyaa waxay ku dhacdaa 3 toddobaad gudahooda
Hubi in lambarka akoonkaagu cusboonaysiisan yahay
skatteoppgjoer.additionalTaxText: Haddii aad tahay dib u bixin, waa inaad bixisaa ka hor taariikhda si aad uga fogaato dulsaar.

additionalTaxList.label: Ka sareya 1000 kr
additionalTaxList.text: Loo qaybiyay laba xilli (badiyaa Ogosto iyo Oktoobar)
Waxaad ku bixin kartaa netbankiga - isticmaal lambarka KID ee xisaabinta canshuurta

faq.q: Waxaan u maleynayaa xisaabinta canshuurtu waa khalad
faq.a: Waxaad ka dacwoon kartaa xisaabinta canshuurta 6 toddobaad gudahooda. Tag "Klage på skatteoppgjøret" skatteetaten.no.

faq.q: Ma beddeli karaa lambarka akoonka ee lacag bixinta?
faq.a: Haa, gal skatteetaten.no oo cusboonaysii lambarka akoonka "Min profil" hoostiisa.

faq.q: Ma awoodi karo inaan bixiyo dib u bixinta
faq.a: Waxaad codsan kartaa heshiiska lacag bixinta Hey'adda Canshuurta. La xiriir sida ugu dhakhsaha badan.

skatteattest.title: Dalbo shahaadada canshuurta
skatteattest.longDescription: Baro sida loo dalbo shahaadada canshuurta online. Waxaad heli si degdeg ah, oo lacag la'aan ah.
skatteattest.whatIsText: Shahaadada canshuurtu waa dukumenti caddaynaysa in adiga ama shirkaddaadu aadan ku leheyn deyn canshuur oo dawlada.
skatteattest.whatIsNeededFor: Waxaad u baahan kartaa shahaadada canshuurta:
whatIsNeededForList: Caddaynta xaaladda canshuurta bangiyada ama kuwa kale

steps.title: Tag skatteetaten.no
steps.description: Fur browserkaaga oo ku qor "skatteetaten.no" cinwaanka.

steps.title: Gal BankID
steps.description: Guji "Gal" bogga kor. Dooro BankID oo raac tilmaamaha.

steps.title: Hel "Shahaadada Canshuurta"
steps.description: Kadib marka aad gasho, isticmaal sanduuqa raadinta oo ku qor "shahaadada canshuurta". Guji natiijooyinka "Ogolow shahaadada canshuurta" ama mid la mid ah.
steps.tip: Waxa kale oo aad ka heli kartaa "Ogolowga" ama "Shahaadooyinka iyo xaqiijinta" hoostiisa.

steps.title: Dooro nooca shahaadada canshuurta
steps.description: Waxaa jira noocyo kala duwan oo shahaadada canshuurta ah. Dooro midka ku habboon ujeeddadaada: "Skatteattest for offentlige anskaffelser" ayaa ugu badan.
steps.warning: La xaqiiji qaataha nooca shahaadada ay u baahan yihiin.

steps.title: Buuxi macluumaadka
steps.description: Waxaa lagu weydiin karaa waxa shahaadada loo isticmaali. Buuxi goobaha looga baahan yahay.

steps.title: Dalbo shahaadada
steps.description: Guji "Ogolow" ama "Diri ogolow". Shahaadadu badiyaa waxay si degdeg ah u soo baxdaa.
steps.tip: Inta badan shahaadooyinka canshuurta waxaa la soo dejin karaa PDF ahaan isla markiiba.

steps.title: Soo deji shahaadada
steps.description: Markay shahaadadu diyaar tahay, guji "Soo Dejiso" ama "Fur". Keydi faylka kombiyuutarkaaga.
steps.tip: Shahaadada canshuurtu waxay ansax tahay 6 bilood laga bilaabo taariikhda la soo saaray.

skatteattest.importantTitle: Waxaa muhiim ah in la ogaado

importantList.label: Muddada ansaxnimada
importantList.text: Shahaadada canshuurtu waxay ansax tahay 6 bilood laga bilaabo taariikhda la soo saaray

importantList.label: Lacag la'aan
importantList.text: Dalbashada shahaadada canshuurtu waa lacag la'aan

importantList.label: Deynta canshuurta
importantList.text: Haddii aad leedahay deyn canshuur, shahaadada laguma siinayo ilaa deynta la bixiyo

faq.q: Ma heli karo shahaadada canshuurta sababtoo ah waxaan leeyahay deyn
faq.a: Marka hore waa inaad bixisaa deynta canshuurta. Gal skatteetaten.no si aad u aragto intaad leedahay oo aad u bixiso.

faq.q: Ma dalban karaa shahaadada canshuurta shirkaddayda?
faq.a: Haa, laakiin waa inaad leedahay xuquuqda Altinn shirkadda. Gal BankID oo dooro shirkaddaada.

faq.q: Sidee ayaan u diri shahaadada canshuurta qof?
faq.a: Soo deji faylka PDF oo u dir lifaaq iimeel ahaan, ama daabac oo gacanta u gee.

loggInn.title: Gal Hey'adda Canshuurta
loggInn.longDescription: Baro sida loo galo Hey'adda Canshuurta si aad u aragto warbixintaada canshuurta, xisaabinta canshuurta iyo beddelida kaadhka canshuurta.
loggInn.beforeYouStartText: Waxaad u baahan tahay BankID si aad u gasho Hey'adda Canshuurta. MinID wuxuu siiyaa gelitaan xaddidan adeegyada qaarkood.
services: Arag xisaabinta canshuurta iyo canshuurta dhaafka ah
loggInn.problemsText: Haddii aad dhibaato ku qabto galitaanka:
problemsList: Hubi in app-ka BankID la cusbooneysiiyay

steps.title: Tag skatteetaten.no
steps.description: Fur browserkaaga oo ku qor "skatteetaten.no" xariiqda cinwaanka. Riix Enter.
steps.tip: Waxaad sidoo kale ka raadin kartaa "Skatteetaten" Google.

steps.title: Ka hel badhanka "Gal"
steps.description: Ka raadi "Logg inn" ama "Min side" geeska midig ee sare ee bogga. Guji badhanka.
steps.tip: Badhanka caadi ahaan waa cagaar ama buluug.

steps.title: Dooro BankID
steps.description: Waxaad doorataa u dhaxaysa BankID telefoonka ama BankID qalabka koodhka. Dooro midka aad isticmaasho.
steps.warning: Hey'adda Canshuurta waxay u baahan tahay BankID gelitaan buuxa. MinID wuxuu siiyaa gelitaan xaddidan.

steps.title: BankID telefoonka
steps.description: Geli lambarka aqoonsigaaga (11 lambar). Waxaad heli doontaa fariin telefoonkaaga - fur app-ka BankID oo xaqiiji galitaanka.
steps.tip: Hubi in app-ka BankID la rakibay oo la cusbooneysiiyay.

steps.title: BankID qalabka koodhka
steps.description: Geli lambarka aqoonsigaaga. Shid qalabka koodhka oo geli koodhka ku muuqda shaashada. Geli koodhkaaga shakhsiga ah qalabka koodhka oo isticmaal koodhka cusub ee soo muuqda.
steps.warning: Haddii qalabku batari dhameysey, la xiriir bangigaaga.

steps.title: Hadda waad gashay!
steps.description: Hadda waxaad joogtaa "Min side" Hey'adda Canshuurta. Halkan waxaad ka arki kartaa warbixinta canshuurta, xisaabinta canshuurta, oo beddeli kartaa kaadhka canshuurta.
steps.tip: Xusuusnow inaad ka baxdo markaad dhamaysto, gaar ahaan kombuyuutar wadaag ah.

loggInn.helpText: Wac Hey'adda Canshuuraha lambarka 800 80 000 (maalmaha shaqada 09:00-15:00) ama isticmaal chat-ka skatteetaten.no.

bestilleTime.title: Samee ballan dhakhtar
bestilleTime.description: Sida loo sameeyo ballan dhakhtarkaaga caadiga ah
bestilleTime.longDescription: Baro sida aad u sameyso ballan dhakhtarkaaga caadiga ah Helsenorge. Waxaad sameysan kartaa ballan wakhti kasta - xitaa fiidkii iyo maalmaha fasaxa.
whatYouNeedList: Ogaanshaha qiyaastii maalinta iyo wakhti kugu habboon

steps.title: Gal Helsenorge.no
