steps.description: Tag bogga helsenorge.no oo ku gal BankID ama MinID. Guji "Gal" geeska midig ee sare.
steps.tip: Arag hagayaha "Galitaanka Helsenorge" haddii aad u baahan tahay caawin.

steps.title: Hel "Ballanaha"
steps.description: Ka dib markii aad gasho, waxaad arki doontaa liiska "Caafimaadkayga". Guji "Ballanaha" ama "Samee ballan".
steps.tip: Waxaad sidoo kale ku raadi kartaa "samee ballan" goobta raadinta.

steps.title: Dooro "Samee ballan cusub"
steps.description: Guji badhanka "Samee ballan cusub" ama "Ballan cusub". Waxaad heli doontaa soo koobid kaasoo tusaya meesha aad sameysan karto ballan.

steps.title: Dooro dhakhtarka caadiga ah
steps.description: Guji dhakhtarka caadiga ah liiska. Haddii aad arki waayso dhakhtarka, waxay yeelan karaan inay u baahdo xafiiska dhakhtarka oo xal jab ah.
steps.warning: Diiwaamaha dhakhtarka qaarkood waxay ku shaqeeyaan online. Markaas waa inaad toos u wac xafiiska.

steps.title: Dooro nooca ballan
steps.description: Dooro waxa ballanka ku saabsan. Dooro caadi ahi waa "Ballanka caadi ah", "Warrida telefoonka" ama "Warrida video". Dooro kuwa aad u habboon.
steps.tip: Warrida video waxa ay ku fudud tahay arrimaha fudud sida cusbooneysiin dawo ama la socodka.

steps.title: Dooro taarikh iyo saacad
steps.description: Waxaad arki doontaa kalindar leh wakhtiyada bannaan. Xagga cagaran macnaheedu waa bannan. Guji taarikh, markaas waxaad arki doontaa waqtiyada bannaan. Dooro saacadda aad u habboon.
steps.tip: Haddii saacado bannaan oo kale aan jirin, isku day inaad aragto toddobaadyo xigta.

steps.title: Qor muuqaad gaaban
steps.description: Waxaad ku qori kartaa sababta aad u baahan ballanka. Tani waxa ay ka caawi kartaa dhakhtarka si uu diyaargaroobo. Uma baahna inaad qor dhammaan waxba - keliya sababta weyn.
steps.tip: Tusaale: "Waan lahaa tus toddobaad labeed" ama "Rabaa in la hadlo dawo caaburiga dhiga".

steps.title: Xaqiiji ballanka
steps.description: Eeg macluumaadka oo guji "Xaqiiji" ama "Samee ballan". Waxaad heli doontaa xaqiijin bogga iyo SMS/iimayl.
steps.tip: Ku dar ballanka kalindarkaaga si aad u illoobid!

bestilleTime.cancelTitle: Miyaad u baahan tahay inaad joojiso?
bestilleTime.cancelText: Waad joojin kartaa ama beddeli waqtiga Helsenorge. Tag "Ballanaha waqtiga" oo guji waqtiga aad beddeli rabto. Jooji marka lagu yaalo ay aad 24 saac kahor, si ay kale u isticmaalaan waqtiga.
bestilleTime.cantBookOnlineTitle: Ma baahan tahay inaad buuki kartid online?
bestilleTime.cantBookOnlineText: Qaar ka mid ah xafiisyada wakiilka ay aqbulan karin bookin online. Markaas waa inaad wicisaa xafiiska wakiilka si toos ah. Waad heli kartaa lambarka telefoonka helsenorge.no hoostiisa "Wakiilka Gaarka ah".
benefits: Looma baahna inaad sugto khadka telefoonka
Waxaad aragtaa dhammaan ballanaha diyaarka ah isla markiiba
Waxaad si fudud u beddeli ama joojin kartaa ballanaha

faq.q: ...aan jirin ballamo la heli karo?
faq.a: Wac xafiiska dhakhtarka. Waxay yeelan karaan meel baaqdo ama waxay ku caawin karaan xaalad degdeg ah.

faq.q: ...ay tahay mid degdeg ah?
faq.a: Arrimaha degdega, wac toos xafiiska dhakhtarka ama legevakten (116 117).

faq.q: ...aan u baahdo baadhitaan?
faq.a: Ballan caadi ah oo ku qor fariinta baadhitaanka la sameeyo. Dhakhtarka markaas ayuu u diyaargaroobi.

resepter.title: Arag oo cusbooneysii dawooyinka
resepter.longDescription: Helsenorge waxaad ku arki kartaa dhammaan dawooyinkaaga oo codsan kartaa cusbooneysiin adoon wicin dhakhtarka. Fudud oo dhaqso ah!
resepter.stepsTitle: Sida loo arko oo loo cusbooneysiiyo dawooyinka

steps.title: Gal Helsenorge.no
steps.description: Tag bogga helsenorge.no oo ku gal BankID. Guji "Gal" geeska midig ee sare.
steps.warning: Waa inaad isticmaalto BankID (not MinID) si aad u arkto dawooyinka.

steps.title: Hel "Dawooyinka"
steps.description: Ka dib markii aad gasho, guji "Dawooyinka" liiska ama bogga hore. Waxaad sidoo kale ku raadi kartaa "dawooyinka".

steps.title: Arag dawooyinka shaqeynaya
steps.description: Waxaad arki doontaa liiska dhammaan dawooyinkaaga. Dawooyinka cagara macnaheedu waa ay shaqeynayaan (ansax ah). Kuwa gaduudka ama grey waa ay dhammaaneeyeen. Guji dawo si aad u argto faafisudaha.
steps.tip: Waxaad arki doontaa intee qaadasho oo haray iyo goorta dawadu ay dhammaan dooneyso.

steps.title: Codsada cusbooneysiin dawo
steps.description: Haddii dawo marka hore ay dhammaan doonto ama aad u baahan tahay dawo cusub, guji "Codsa cusbooneysiin". Qor fariim gaaban dhakhtarka ay tusayso sababta aad u baahan cusbooneysiin.
steps.tip: Tusaale: "Waan isticmaalay 2 sano, waxa taba wanaag. Rabaa cusbooneysiin."

steps.title: Sug jawaabta dhakhtarka
steps.description: Dhakhtarku waxa uu sawira codsiga oo cusbooneysii dawo haddii ay tahay wanaagsan. Kaasaa caadi ahaan waxa uu qaadaa 1-3 maalmood shaqo. Waxaad heli doontaa ogeysiis marka dawo ay la cusbooneysiyay.
steps.warning: Dhakhtarku waxay yeelan kartaan inay diidaan cusbooneysiin oo kaa codsaan inaad bal la timaado. Tani waa caadi ah dawooyinka qaar.

steps.title: Qaada dawooyinka farmashiyaha
steps.description: Marka dawo ay la cusbooneysiyay, waxaad qaadan kartaa dawooyinka farmashiye kasta. Waxay arki karaan dawo markaad bixiso lambarka dhalashadaada.
steps.tip: Waxaad sidoo kale ku codsandar kartaa dawooyinka internet farmashiya oo aad ku heshato gurigaaga.

resepter.tipsTitle: Talooyin wanaagsan oo ku saabsan e-reseptu
tips: Codso cusboonaysiin waqti wanaagsan - marka lagu yaalo 1-2 toddobaad kahor medisinka dhamaadka
Sidii marwalba haystaa dawada oo aad egtay markii doktarku ay cusbooneysiiso
Qaar ka mid ah medisinku way u baahan yihiin wakhtiga doktarku kahor cusboonaysiin (tusaale: medisinka qaada dhiga)
E-resepta waxay valid tahay 1 sano laga soo qaatay oo ay qornayd
resepter.whatYouFindTitle: Waxa aad ka heli dulmarada dawada

prescriptionTypes.desc: Dawada casriga ah ee la kaydiyo si dhijitaal ah. Nooca hadda ugu badan.
Nooc hore oo dhakhtaro qaarkood ay weli isticmaalaan. Waa in jidh ahaan loo geeyo farmashiyaha.

faq.q: Maxaan u arki karin dawadayda?
faq.a: Waxay noqon kartaa dawada warqadda ah ama wali kama soo gaarin nidaamka. Sug 1-2 maalmood ama la xiriir dhakhtarka.

faq.q: Ilaa goorma ayay ansax tahay dawadayda?
faq.a: Inta badan dawooyinku waxay ansax yihiin 1 sano. Dawooyinka qaarkood waxay yeelan karaan muddo ansax gaaban.

faq.q: Ma ka qaadan karaa dawooyinka farmashiye kale?
faq.a: Haa, e-dawooyinka waxaad ka qaadan kartaa farmashiye kasta Norway oo dhan.

resepter.tipBoxText: Waxaad dejin kartaa xusuusin telefoonkaaga marka dawadaadu dhammaato. Markaas ma illoobi doontid inaad codsato cusbooneysiin wakhti ku filan.

bytteFastlege.title: Beddel dhakhtarka caadiga ah
bytteFastlege.description: Sida loo beddelo dhakhtar cusub oo caadi ah
bytteFastlege.longDescription: Waxaad xaq u leedahay inaad beddeshao dhakhtarkaaga caadiga ah haddii aad rabto. Waa bilaash waxaadna samayn kartaa adigu internetka.
bytteFastlege.goodToKnow: Wanaagsan in la ogaado ka hor beddelinta
goodToKnowList: Waxaad beddeli kartaa dhakhtarka caadiga ah ilaa 2 jeer sanadkii
Waxaad dooran kartaa dhakhtar kasta oo leh boos bannaan
Waa bilaash gebi ahaan in la beddelo
bytteFastlege.stepsTitle: Sida loo beddelo dhakhtarka caadiga ah

steps.title: Gal Helsenorge.no
steps.description: Tag bogga helsenorge.no oo ku gal BankID ama MinID. Guji "Gal" geeska midig ee sare.

steps.title: Hel "Beddel dhakhtarka caadiga ah"
steps.description: Guji "Dhakhtarkaayga caadiga ah" ama raadi "beddel dhakhtara caadiga ah". Dooro "Beddel dhakhtarka caadiga ah" ama "Hel dhakhtara cusub".

steps.title: Raadi dhakhtar cusub
steps.description: Waxaad ku raadi kartaa magaca dhakhtara, xafiiska dhakhtara ama aagga. Waxaad sidoo kale arki doontaa dhakhtara yeelan kuwa leh boos bannaan.
steps.tip: Lambarka cagara = boos bannaan. Gaduudka ama 0 = buuxan.

steps.title: Hubiso macluumaad ku saabsan dhakhtara
steps.description: Guji dhakhtar si aad u arkto macluumaad dheeraad: saacadaha furanaha, cinwaanka, luuqada, iyo haddii ay bixiyaan ballan online. Akhri qiimeysyada bukaanka kale haddii heli karo.

steps.title: Dooro dhakhtarka oo xaqiiji
steps.description: Marka aad heshay dhakhtara aad raabtaa, guji "Dooro dhakhtarkan" ama "Beddel dhakhtarka". Xaqiiji doorashada qaada.
steps.warning: Beddelka waxa uu bilaabmaa 1-da bisha xigta. Illaa markaas waad weli joog doontaa dhakhtarka duubaad ahaa.

steps.title: Dhammaad!
steps.description: Waxaad heli doontaa xaqiijin beddelka. Bisha xigta, dhakhtarkaaga cusub waa noqon doonaa dhakhtarkaaga caadiga ah. Diiwaanka qaada waxa uu si toos ah loogu wareejiyaa xafiiska cusub.
steps.tip: Xusuusnow inaad joojiso ballan kasta oo ay jirto dhakhtarkaaga duubaad ahaa.

bytteFastlege.noSpaceText: Haddii dhakhtara aad raabtaa ay buuxan tahay, waxaad ku beddeli kartaa liiska sugista. Waxaad heli doontaa ogeysiis marka ay boos bannaan ay gasho. Waxaad sidoo kale isku dayi kartaa inaad toos u wac xafiiska dhakhtarka - mararka qaarkood waxay lahaayaan boos kaasoo aan muuqda internetka.

faq.q: Sidee ayey u dhaqsaysaa beddelka?
faq.a: Beddelku wuxuu bilaabmaa 1-da bisha xigta ee codsigaaga kadib.

faq.q: Diiwaankayga miyaa si toos ah loo wareejinayaa?
faq.a: Haa, diiwaanka bukaanka si toos ah ayaa loogu wareejiyaa xafiiska cusub.

faq.q: Ma beddeli karaa dib?
faq.a: Haa, laakiin waxaad beddeli kartaa dhakhtarka ugu badnaan 2 jeer 12 bilood gudahooda.

journal.title: Akhri diiwaanka bukaanka
journal.longDescription: Waxaad xaq u leedahay inaad aragto waxa laguugu qoray dhakhtarka. Helsenorge waxaad adigu ka akhrin kartaa diiwaankaaga.
journal.whatIsJournalText: Diiwaanku wuxuu ka kooban yahay qoraallada booqashooyinka dhakhtarka, natiijooyinka baaritaanka, baarista xanuunka iyo daaweynta. Wax kasta oo dhakhtarku kugu qoro waxaa halkan lagu ururiyaa.

steps.title: Gal Helsenorge.no
steps.description: Tag bogga helsenorge.no oo ku gal BankID. Guji "Gal" geeska midig ee sare.
steps.warning: Waa inaad isticmaalto BankID (not MinID) si aad u arkto diiwaanka.

steps.title: Hel "Diiwaanka Bukaanka"
steps.description: Guji "Diiwaanka Bukaanka" liiska ama raadi "diiwaanka". Waxaad sidoo kale heli kartaa "Caafimaadkayga" hoosta.

steps.title: Dooro diiwaanka aad raabtaa inaad arkto
steps.description: Waxaad lahaataa diiwaameenka meeleydd badan: dhakhtarka caadiga ah, isbitaalka, takhasuus. Dooro ku ee raabtaa inaad diiwaanka ka arkto.
steps.tip: Diiwaanka aasaasiga ayaa tusaya waxa muhiimka ah meeleydd dhammaan oo isku mid ah.

steps.title: Akhri qoraallada diiwaanka
steps.description: Waxaad arki doontaa liiska qoraallada diiwaanka oo dhammaan, kuwa cusub sare. Guji qoraalkii si aad u akhrisid qoriga oo dhan.
steps.tip: Diiwaanku waxa uu kariba ka kooban yahay caafimaadiyed goboleedka. Isticmaal ereyada waxbarashadda ayaga ama weydiisii dhakhtarka haddii wax daah ah yahay.

steps.title: Arag natiijooyinka baaritaanka
steps.description: Hoos "Natiijooyinka baaritaanka" ama "Natiijooyinka xoolliyaha" waxaad heli doontaa natiijooyin buug iyo imteeyamaha kale. Qiyamaha ka dibna caadiga ah qaarkood waxa ay la calaamadaan.
steps.tip: Weydiisii dhakhtarka haddii aad walaac qabto waxa natiijooyinka baaritaanka la macnaheedu.

journal.delayTitle: Maxaa waxaan u arki karin dhammaan?
journal.delayText: Diiwaameenka qaarkood waxay ku jiraan cillid dhowr maalmood ka hor intaadan arki karto. Tani waa si dhakhtarku u heersiiyo inaad marka hore wax kasta oo muhiimka ah inuu ku kuu sheego. Isbitaalka iyo takhasuusyada waxay kariba karaan cillid dheer.

faq.q: Maxaan u arki karin dhammaan qoraallada?
faq.a: Diiwaamaha qaarkood waxay dib u dhacaan dhowr maalmood. Dhakhtarku marka hore wuxuu rabaa inuu wakhti ku siiyo inuu adiga kuu sheego.

faq.q: Ma codsan karaa in khaladaadka la saxo?
faq.a: Haa, waxaad la xiriiri kartaa dhakhtarka oo codsataa in khaladaadka xaqiiqada diiwaanka laga saxo.

faq.q: Diiwaankaygu ma sirri buu yahay?
faq.a: Haa, kaliya adiga iyo shaqaalaha caafimaadka ee la oggolaaday ayaa heli kara diiwaankaaga.

melding.title: U dir fariin dhakhtarka
melding.description: La xiriir dhakhtarkaaga caadiga ah si dhijitaal ah
melding.longDescription: Waxaad u diri kartaa fariin dhakhtarkaaga caadiga ah Helsenorge. Waa fudud su'aalaha fudud ee aan u baahnayn ballan dhakhtar.
melding.whenToUseTitle: Goorma waa inaad u dirtaa fariin?
whenToUseGoodList: Su'aalaha fudud ee ku saabsan dawooyinka
La socodka ka dib ballanka dhakhtarka
whenToUseBadList: Xanuunno degdeg ah ama daran (wac 116 117 ama 113)
melding.stepsTitle: Sida loo u diro fariin dhakhtarka

steps.title: Gal Helsenorge.no
steps.description: Tag bogga helsenorge.no oo ku gal BankID ama MinID. Guji "Gal" geeska midig ee sare.

steps.title: Hel "Fariimaaha"
steps.description: Guji "Fariimaaha" ama "La xiriir dhakhtara" liiska. Waxaad sidoo kale heli kartaa "Dhakhtarkaayga caadiga ah" hoosta.

steps.title: Bilaabo fariin cusub
steps.description: Guji "Fariin cusub" ama "Qor fariin". Dooro dhakhtarkaaga caadiga ah oo laga aas-aas ah u diro.
steps.warning: Diiwaamaha dhakhtarka qaarkood ay qabaan mamnuucan fariimaha. Markaas waa inaad toos u wac.

steps.title: Qor fariimaha
steps.description: Qor fariin gaaban oo cadaalka ah. Sharaxda waxa uu saabsan. Caadiga ah waxaad heshaa jawaab wanaagsan.
steps.tip: Tusaale: "Salam, waan isticmaalay Paracet 3 maalmood caaburiga madaacda oon sii wanaagsan. Ma waa inaad bal la timaado, mise wax kale ayaan isku dayi karaa?"

steps.title: Dir fariimaha
steps.description: Akhari fariimaha oo guji "Dir". Waxaad heli doontaa xaqiijin in fariimaha lagu diray.

steps.title: Sug jawaabta
steps.description: Dhakhtarku caadi ahaan waxa uu ku jawaabaa 1-3 maalmood shaqo. Waxaad heli doontaa digaag SMS ama iimayl markaas jawaabta ay soo gasho. Ku gal Helsenorge si aad u akhrisid jawaabta.
steps.warning: Xanuunnada degdega, ha sugnaadhin jawaabta - wac xafiiska legevakta (116 117) ama ambulaska (113).

faq.q: Sidee u dhaqsaysaa inaan helo jawaab?
faq.a: Xafiisyada dhakhtarku badiyaa waxay ka jawaabaan 1-3 maalmood shaqo gudahooda. Arrimaha degdega ah, wac.

faq.q: Fariintayda ma sirri bay tahay?
faq.a: Haa, farriimaha waa la sirtay oo kaliya adiga iyo xafiiska dhakhtarka ayaa heli kara.

faq.q: Ma diri karaa sawiro?
faq.a: Haa, waxaad ku dari kartaa sawiro fariinaha, tusaale finiin ama dhaawacyo.

loggInn.title: Gal Caafimaadka Norway
loggInn.longDescription: Baro sida loo galo Caafimaadka Norway si aad u aragto dawooyinka, u sameyso ballan dhakhtar oo u akhriso diiwaanka.
loggInn.beforeYouStartText: Waxaad u baahan tahay BankID ama MinID si aad u gasho Caafimaadka Norway. BankID wuxuu siiyaa gelitaan adeegyada ugu badan.
services: U dir fariin dhakhtarkaaga caadiga ah
loggInn.problemsText: Haddii aad dhibaato ku qabto galitaanka:
problemsList: Hubi in app-ka BankID la cusbooneysiiyay

steps.title: Tag helsenorge.no
steps.description: Fur browserkaaga oo ku qor "helsenorge.no" xariiqda cinwaanka. Riix Enter.
steps.tip: Waxaad sidoo kale ka raadin kartaa "Helsenorge" Google.

steps.title: Ka hel badhanka "Gal"
steps.description: Ka raadi "Gal" geeska midig ee sare ee bogga. Guji badhanka.
steps.tip: Badhanka caadi ahaan waa cas ama madow.

steps.title: Dooro habka galitaanka
steps.description: Waxaad ka dooran kartaa BankID telefoonka, BankID qalabka koodhka, ama MinID. BankID wuxuu siiyaa gelitaan dhammaan adeegyada.
steps.warning: MinID wuxuu siiyaa gelitaan xaddidan Caafimaadka Norway. BankID ayaa lagu talinayaa.

steps.title: BankID telefoonka
steps.description: Geli lambarka aqoonsigaaga (11 lambar). Waxaad heli doontaa fariin telefoonkaaga - fur app-ka BankID oo xaqiiji galitaanka.
steps.tip: Hubi in app-ka BankID la rakibay oo la cusbooneysiiyay.

steps.title: BankID qalabka koodhka
steps.description: Geli lambarka aqoonsigaaga. Shid qalabka koodhka oo geli koodhka ku muuqda shaashada. Geli koodhkaaga shakhsiga ah qalabka koodhka oo isticmaal koodhka cusub ee soo muuqda.
steps.warning: Haddii qalabku batari dhameysey, la xiriir bangigaaga.

steps.title: Hadda waad gashay!
steps.description: Hadda waxaad joogtaa "Caafimaadkayga" Caafimaadka Norway. Halkan waxaad ka arki kartaa dawooyinka, sameysan kartaa ballan dhakhtar, oo akhrin kartaa diiwaanka.
steps.tip: Xusuusnow inaad ka baxdo markaad dhamaysto, gaar ahaan kombuyuutar wadaag ah.

loggInn.helpText: Wac Helsenorge lambarka 23 32 70 00 (maalmaha shaqada 08:00-15:30) ama booqo helsenorge.no/kontakt.

bankid.title: Isticmaalka badbaado leh ee BankID
bankid.description: Baro isticmaalka BankID si badbaado leh iyo ka fogaanshaha khiyaanada
bankid.longDescription: BankID waa aqoonsigaaga dhijitaalka ah. Halkan waxaad baranaysaa sida aad si badbaado leh ugu isticmaasho oo aad uga ilaaliso khiyaameyaasha.
bankid.whatIsText1: BankID waa aqoonsiga dhijitaalka ah kaasoo xaqiija ku caddaya adiga internetka. Waxaa u eg digital passport oo ku oggolaaday inaan ku gasho adeegyada dawlada, banki internetka iyo saxaafitaan warqado.
bankid.whatIsText2: BankID waxa uu bixi banki saada oo la xiriira lambarka shakhsiga. Markaad isticmaalto BankID, waxa aad xaqiijisaa in ay tahay adiga oo gashaya ama saaxaafisaya.
bankid.typeMobileDesc: Nooca ugu caadsan. Waxaad heli doontaa fariim telefoonkaaga oo aad xaqiijiso leh faraha, wejigu ama kooda.
bankid.typeCodeDeviceDesc: Brikke yar kaasoo tusaya koodo hal mar. Waxaa loo isticmaalaa marka lala jiro koodi gaaban.
bankid.typeBiometricDesc: Waxaa loo isticmaalaa faraha ama wejigu aqoonsashada toos browserka.
bankid.stepsTitle: Sida aad si badbaado leh u isticmaasho BankID

steps.title: Akhri marka hore waxa aad xaqiijisaa
steps.description: Markaad heshay codsiga BankID telefoonkaaga, akhari MARKA HORE qoriga kaasoo tusaya waxa aad xaqiijisaa. Waxa ay yaalaan yaa codsiga iyo waxa uu saabsan.
steps.warning: Ha xaqiiji MARNABA codsiga BankID aadoon adigu bilaabinay!

steps.title: Hubiso in boggu tahay run
steps.description: Kahor markaaad isticmaashid BankID, eeg xariiqda cinwaanka browserka. Bogga runta ah leh hangul-lock ikon iyo cinwaan waxay bilaabaan https://. Hubiso hal mar isla laab in domeni ay sax tahay (f.ex nav.no, not nav-login.com).
steps.tip: Marka hore qor cinwaanka adigu aniga halka ku kliklayn lenka iimayl ama SMS.

steps.title: Ha shaariyin koodooyinka
steps.description: BankID koodo, koodi sirta iyo koodi gaaban waa inaad HA SHAARIYIN qofna. Bangiga, labada ama NAV ayaan lagaa codsoon koodo macluumaadkan.
steps.warning: Waxaa lagama hada inuu qofna kaa codsado BankID koodooyinka. Haddii qof kaa codsado, waa LAGU HAH khiyaano!

steps.title: Isticmaal koodi badbaado leh
steps.description: Dooro koodi gaaban oo adag lagu qadina. Ha isticmaalin taariikhda dhalashadaada, 1234 ama kombinaasyo kale fudud. Koodi kaliya adiga ayaa ogaada.
steps.tip: Koodi wanaagsan waxay noqon karaan afar lambarro aqoonsantaa.

steps.title: Iska bedel app-ka
steps.description: Hubi in app-ka BankID marka hore ay la cusbooneysiyay. Cusboonaysiyo waxa ay ka kooban yahay hagaajis amni muhiim.
steps.tip: Ku beddel automatic cusboonaysio App Store ama Google Play.

steps.title: Ka bax markaaad dhamaysato
steps.description: Markaad dhamaysato adeega, marka hore ka bax. Tani waa muhiim gaar ahaan haddii aad isticmaasho kombuyuutar wadaag ama telefoon kale.

steps.title: Hubiso codsiyada aan la filayo
steps.description: Haddii si bigay ah aad heshaa codsiga BankID aanadoon adigu bilaabinay, waa laga yaabaa inay tahay isku day khiyaano. Diidi codsiga oo la xiriir bangigaaga.
steps.warning: Wac banki saada toos haddii aad xaqiijisay waxa aad moodo inaan u baahnayn!

bankid.warningText: Ka bedel-bedel haddii aad dhacdaa mid ka mid ah:
warningSigns: Qof waxay kula xisaabiso inay yihiin bangiga oo u baahan BankID xaqiijin
Aad heshaa codsiga BankID aadoon adigu bilaabinay
Qof kaaga codsaa inaa ku rakibto barnaamijo sida AnyDesk ama TeamViewer
Lagu codsaa inaad bixiso koodo telefoonka
Waxa ay aad u dhaqsaysaa oo aad ma heshid wakhti in la fekeerta
neverShare: Koodo hal mar oo ka timid koodiga brikke
Koodi sir oo BankID oo app
Lambarka shakhsiga kaasoo lala jiro koodo
Fasaxda telefoonkaaga hadii codsiga BankID ay jirto
bankid.ifSuspiciousTitle: Maxaad samaysaa haddii aad shakisatid khiyaano?
bankid.ifSuspiciousText: Haddii aad rumaysato inaad la tilmaama khiyaano isku day, samee tan:
bankid.ifSuspicious1: Diidi dhammaan codsiyada BankID aadoon adigu bilaabinay
bankid.ifSuspicious2: Wac bangi saada toos lambarka ka dhaaftida kaarka bangiga
bankid.ifSuspicious3: Bedel koodo iyo koodi haddii aad shaareeyay waxa

phishing.title: Aqoonsashada phishing
phishing.description: Baro ogaanshaha iimayllada iyo fariimaha beenta ah
phishing.longDescription: Phishing waa isku dayyo khiyaano ah oo isku dayaya inay ku khiyaaneyaan si aad u bixiso macluumaadka shakhsiga. Halkan waxaad baranaysaa sida loo aqoonsado oo looga fogaado.
phishing.whatIsText1: Phishing waa markaad khiyaanayaashu iimaylo beenta ah, SMS ama fariim ay sheegayaan inay yihiin lawgeeya kalsoon sida bangi saada, NAV ama Posten.
phishing.whatIsText2: Hadafka waa inay kaa khiyaaneeyaan inaad klikato lenka, soo dari fayl, ama bixio macluumaad shakhsiga sida koodi iyo macluumaadka bangi.
phishing.examplePostText: "Kaadkaaga way sugaysaa. Bixii 29 kr naaska halka: [lenka]"
phishing.examplePostWarning: Dhaqanka marnaba ma soo diro SMS lacag lacagtii wada linka!
phishing.exampleBankText: "Muhiim: Akoonkaaga waxaa lagu xiray doonaa. Xaqiiji macluumaadkaaga halka: [lenka]"
phishing.exampleBankWarning: Bangiga marnaba looma hammiyaa inay xiris akoonka iimayl wada!
phishing.exampleNavText: "Waxaad lacag leedahay NAV. Ku gal si aad u heshto: [lenka]"
phishing.exampleNavWarning: NAV marnaba ma soo diro lenka shayga iimayl!

steps.title: Hubiso cinwaanka lawgeeya si taxadar leh
steps.description: Eeg cinwaanka iimayl oo dhan, not kaliya magaca. Iimayl run oo NAV waxaa uu ka yimaadaa @nav.no, not @nav-support.com ama mid la mid ah. Khiyaanayaashu waxay isticmaalaan cinaano u eg, laakiin not sax qaab.
steps.tip: Isku dhow inkasta mouseka magaca lawgeeya si aad u argto cinwaanka iimayl run.

steps.title: Raadi qaldan iyo luqad yar
steps.description: Fariimaha phishing waxay ku yeelan karaan qaldan, xayeysiyo daacad ama qamaamiid yar. Fariimaha run oo hay'ado dawlada waxaa loo qoray Somali sax.
steps.tip: Akhari fariimaha cod - miyuu dhegaysteen wanaagsan? Markaas waa laga yaabaa khiyaano.

steps.title: Ka shakiso lenka
steps.description: Ha kliklan lenka iimayl ama SMS aad an filayo. Isku dhow mouseka lenka si aad u arkto meesha ay aad dhacaysaa. Khiyaanayaashu waxay isticmaalaan cinwaan u eg bogag run.
steps.warning: Si toosa tag bogga linka adigu ku qortay cinwaanka browserka.

steps.title: Ha jawabin degdegnaan
steps.description: Fariimaha phishing waxay isku dayayaan inay ku caadeeda: "Samee hadda!", "Akoonkaaga waxaa lagu xiray doonaa 24 saacadood!". Lawgeeya run waxay siinaan jirtaa wakhti fekeerta.
steps.tip: Haddii ay aad u degdeg, kaas waa sababta aad la shakiso.

steps.title: Hubiso hadii aad filayo fariimaha
steps.description: Miyaad weydiisay NAV waxa? Miyaad sugaysan jirtay kaadka? Markaas fariimaha waa laga yaabaa tahay beenta ah. Fekeerta hadii ay macno leedahay inaad arkto fariimaha.
steps.warning: Khiyaanayaashu waxay igu diraayaan milyuun fariim - mararka qaarkood waxa ay taagan karaan hadba.

steps.title: Ha soo dari xirrito
steps.description: Marna ha fur xirrito qofka aan aqoon. Waxay ku kariba karaan fayrras ama barnaamij diidnaan. Kaloo ka bedel-bedel xirrito qofka kaliga ah haddii fariimahu daah tahay.
steps.warning: Gaar ahaan khuy ah waa .exe, .zip iyo .docm faylka.

steps.title: Xaqiiji wada channels resmiyya
steps.description: Miyaad shakisatid haddii fariimahu tahay run? La xiriir lawgeeya toos wada channels resmiyya. Hel lambarka telefoonka bogga resmiyya, not iimayl aad helay.
steps.tip: Wac NAV 55 55 33 33 ama bangi lambarka kaarka dhaaftida.

warningSigns: Salam caadi ah sida "Aqoonsigaada" halka magacaaga
Cinwaanka lawgeeya kaasoo aan tixo shirkadda
Lenka kaasoo dhacayan domains kale oo ann filayo
Waxyaabaha inay sameeya dhakhso ama lumeeyo waxa
Codsiga macluumaad shakhsiga, koodi ama koodo
Qallaajis yar, fonts daacad ama qaab daacad
phishing.ifClickedText: Ha qalafinso, laakiin samee si dhakhso ah:
phishing.ifClicked1: Ha qor macluumaad kasta - xir bogga toos
phishing.ifClicked3: Bedel koodooyinka haddii aad bixisay mid
phishing.ifClicked4: La xiriir bangi hadii ay saabsan macluumaadka bangi

svindel.title: Ka fogaanshaha khiyaanada
svindel.description: Baro sida loo aqoonsado oo looga fogaado isku dayga khiyaanada
svindel.longDescription: Khiyaanayaashu waxay isticmaalaan qaabab badan si ay dadka u khiyaaneeyaan. Halkan waxaad baranaysaa sida loo aqoonsado qaababka khiyaanada ee ugu caadisan iyo sida aad isu difaacdo.
svindel.checklistIntro: Ma heshay wicitaan, SMS ama iimeel aad ka shakisan tahay? Ka jawaab su'aalaha hoose:

checklistItems.question: Miyay ADIGA kugu soo waceen marka hore?
checklistItems.warning: Bangiyada iyo hay'adaha dawlada run ahi siman kuguma soo wacaan iyagoon lagu weydiinin.

checklistItems.question: Miyay ku weydiinayaan furaha sirta, BankID ama lambarka shakhsiga?
checklistItems.warning: MARNABA ha siin - dirayaasha run ahi marnaba ma weydiiyaan!

checklistItems.question: Miyay aad u degdeg badan tahay?
checklistItems.warning: Khiyaanayaashu waxay had iyo jeer sameeyaan degdegnaan. Arrimaha run ahi waxay sugi karaan tan iyo berri.

checklistItems.question: Ma waa inaad bixisaa si aad wax u hesho?
checklistItems.warning: Abaalmarinnada iyo dhaxalka run ahi marnaba ma weydiiyaan in la bixiyo marka hore.

checklistItems.question: Miyuu u muuqdaa mid aad ugu wanaagsan in run noqdo?
checklistItems.warning: Markaas waxay ku dhawaad had iyo jeer tahay mid aad ugu wanaagsan in run noqdo.

checklistItems.question: Miyaad tahay inaad sir u hayssatid?
checklistItems.warning: Khiyaanayaashu ma rabaan inaad la hadasho kuwa kale ee daaha ka qaadi kara.

checklistItems.question: Miyay rabaan lacag caddaan ah ama kaararka hadiyada?
checklistItems.warning: Shirkadaha run ahi marnaba ma qaataan lacag bixin kaararka hadiyada.

svindel.checklistResultSafe: Wuxuu u muuqdaa mid badbaado ah, laakiin had iyo jeer feejignaaw!
svindel.checklistResultCaution: Taxadar! {count} calaamad digniin. La hadal qof aad ku kalsoon tahay ka hor intaadan waxba samayn.
svindel.checklistResultDanger: JOOJI! {count} calaamad digniin. Tani waxay u badan tahay khiyaano. Waxba ha samayn!
svindel.checklistPrintMessage: Isticmaal liiska hubinta ee kor ku qoran si aad u qiimayso haddii khiyaanayaal kula soo xiriireen.
svindel.elderScamIntro: Khiyaanayaashu waxay inta badan beegsadaan waayeelka sababtoo ah waxay noqon karaan kuwa kalsoonida badan oo leh kaydad. Halkan waa noocyada ugu caadisan:

elderScamTypes.title: Khiyaanada ilmaha ilmaha
elderScamTypes.description: Qof ayaa soo wacaya oo iska dhigaya ilmahaaga ilmaha. Waxay sheegayaan inay dhibaato ku jiraan oo ay si degdeg ah u baahan yihiin lacag - inta badan qareen, dammaanad ama biilka isbitaalka.
elderScamTypes.howItWorks: Khiyaanayuhu wuxuu soo wacaa oo yiraahdaa "Salaan ayeeyo/awoowe, waa aniga!" oo wuxuu rajeynayaa inaad sheegtid magaca ilmahaaga ilmaha. Markaas wuxuu iska dhigayaa qofkaas.
redFlags: Waxay ku weydiinayaan inaadan u sheegin waalidkood
Waxay u baahan yihiin lacagta SI AADKA AH u degdeg
Waxay rabaan lacag caddaan ah ama kaararka hadiyada
Codku wuu "kala duwan yahay" - waxay sheegayaan inay hargab leeyihiin
elderScamTypes.whatToDo: Dhig taleefanka oo u wac ilmahaaga ilmaha lambarka aad kaydisay. Weydiiso wax aad keli tihiin og.

elderScamTypes.title: Khiyaanada Microsoft/Apple
elderScamTypes.description: Qof ayaa soo wacaya oo sheegaya inay ka yihiin Microsoft, Apple ama "taageerada farsamada". Waxay sheegayaan in kombiyuutarkaagu uu leeyahay fayrras oo ay u baahan yihiin inay ku caawiyaan meesha ka saarista.
elderScamTypes.howItWorks: Waxay ku yeelan barnaamij aad ku rakibto oo siinaya xakameyn kombiyuutarkaaga. Ka dib waxay "helaan" dhibaatooyin oo dalbadaan lacag bixin.
redFlags: Microsoft iyo Apple MARNABA kuguma soo wacaan iyagoo aan lagu weydiinin
Waxay weydiinayaan gelitaan fog oo kombiyuutarka
Waxay rabaan lacag bixin kaararka hadiyada ama cryptocurrency
Waxay ku hanjabaayaan in kombiyuutarku joogi shaqaynta
elderScamTypes.whatToDo: Isla markiiba dhig taleefanka. Taageerada farsamada run ahi marnaba adiga kuguma soo wacaan marka hore.

elderScamTypes.title: Khiyaanada jacaylka
elderScamTypes.description: Qof aad ku kulan tahay internetka (inta badan Facebook ama bogagga isku qabashada) ayaa sheegaya inay ku jeclaadeen. Waqti ka dib waxay weydiinayaan lacag.
elderScamTypes.howItWorks: Waxay dhisayaan xiriir toddobaadyo ama bilo. Ka dib waxay dhacaysaa "xaalad deg deg ah" - waxay u baahan yihiin lacag tigidh, daaweyn ama kashaf.
redFlags: Marnaba ma kulmaan qof ahaan
Waxay si aad ah u degdeg u sheegayaan jacayl
Waxay had iyo jeer leeyihiin cudur daar si aanay ugu wicin fiidhiyow ahaan
Waxay weydiinayaan lacag - sabab kasta ha noqoto
elderScamTypes.whatToDo: Marnaba ha u dirin lacag qof aad kaliya internetka ka taqaano. La hadal qoyskaaga ama asxaabtaada xiriirka.

elderScamTypes.title: Khiyaanada nasiibka
elderScamTypes.description: Waxaad heli ogeysiis ah inaad ku guulaysatay nasiib aadan marnaba ka qayb galin. Laakiin waa inaad bixisaa "khidmad" ama "canshuur" si aad u hesho abaalmarinnada.
elderScamTypes.howItWorks: Waxay u diraan iimeel ama soo wacaan "war wanaagsan". Si aad u hesho abaalmarinnada milyan, waxaad kaliya u baahan tahay inaad marka hore bixiso qaddar yar.
redFlags: Ma iibsan nasiib ama ka qayb gelin tartanka
Waa inaad bixisaa si aad u hesho abaalmarinnada
Waxay weydiinayaan macluumaadka bangiga "wareejinta abaalmarinnada"
Abaalmarinnadau waxay ku jirtaa lacag shisheeye
elderScamTypes.whatToDo: Iska indho tir. Ma ku guuleysan kartid nasiib aadan ka qayb galin.

elderScamTypes.title: Khiyaanada maalgashiga
elderScamTypes.description: Qof ayaa kugu ballaamaya faa'iido cajiib ah maalgashiga sahaamyada, cryptocurrency ama "fursadaha" kale.
elderScamTypes.howItWorks: Waxay kula soo xiriirayaan "fursad gaar ah". Inta badan waxay tusayaan bogag webseed been ah oo u eg in maalgashigaagu uu korayo.
redFlags: Faa'iidadu way aad u wanaagsan tahay in run noqoto (20-50% ama in ka badan)
Waxay ku cadaadinayaan inaad si degdeg ah u maalgashato
Weligaa ma maqashin shirkadda
Waxay ka soo wacaan dibadda ama waxay leeyihiin lahjad shisheeye
elderScamTypes.whatToDo: La hadal bangigaaga ka hor inta aanad maalgashanin. Hubi liiska digniinta Maamulka Maaliyadda.

elderScamTypes.title: Khiyaanada sanaacadda
elderScamTypes.description: Qof ayaa ku garaacaya albaabka oo ku siinaya si aad u hagaajiso saqafka, wadada gelitaanka ama wax kale oo "ay si nasiib ah u arkeen inay u baahan tahay dayactir".
elderScamTypes.howItWorks: Waxay qabtaan shaqo xun ama aan loo baahnayn oo dalbadaan lacag bixin sare oo caddaan ah. Mararka qaarkood waxay la baxaan lacag bixinta hordhac.
redFlags: "Si nasiib ah" waxay ku joogeen xaafadda
Waxay rabaan lacag bixinta hordhac ama caddaan
Ma haystaan soo jeedin qoran ama qandaraas
Waxay ku cadaadinayaan inaad si degdeg ah go'aan gaariso
elderScamTypes.whatToDo: U dhaaf soo jeedinada aan la dalbanin. Isticmaal sanaacadda aad taqaano ama qof aad ku kalsoon tahay uu ku talinayo.

svindel.otherScamTitle: Noocyada kale ee caadiga ah ee khiyaanada

otherScamTypes.title: Khiyaanada taleefanka
otherScamTypes.description: Qof ayaa soo wacaya oo iska dhigaya mid ka socda bangiga, booliska ama Microsoft. Waxay rabaan gelitaan akoonkaaga.

otherScamTypes.title: Khiyaanada SMS
otherScamTypes.description: "Baakajigaagu wuu sugayaa" ama "Waad guulaysatay!" - farriimaha leh linkyada u horseedaya bogagga websaydhka beenta ah.

otherScamTypes.title: Khiyaanada iimaylka (phishing)
otherScamTypes.description: Iimeelyo u eg kuwo ka imanaya bangiga ama kuwa kale ee aad ku kalsoon tahay, laakiin rabaan inay ku khiyaaneeyaan.

steps.title: Joogso oo ka fiirso
steps.description: Khiyaanayaashu waxay isku dayaan inay ku cadaadinaan inaad si degdeg ah u dhaqaaqdo. Wakhti u qaado. Bangiyada iyo hay'adaha dawlada run ahi had iyo jeer waxay ku siiyaan wakhti aad ka fikirtid.
steps.tip: Haddii qof yiraahdo "waa degdeg!" ama "waa inaad HADDA wax ka qabataa!", waxay ku dhawaad had iyo jeer tahay khiyaano.

steps.title: Hubi cidda kula soo xiriirtay
steps.description: Si taxadar leh u fiiri cidda soo wacaysa ama dirta fariinta. Khiyaanayaashu waxay been abuuri karaan lambarro telefoon iyo cinwaano iimeel, laakiin inta badan waxaa jira qalado yaryar.
steps.warning: Bangigaagu MARNABA kuguma soo wici oo ku weydiin erayga sirta, koodhka BankID ama lambarka shakhsiga!

steps.title: Raadi qalaadaha higaadda
steps.description: Farriimaha run ah ee ka imanaya bangiyada iyo hay'adaha dawlada had iyo jeer waxaa lagu qoraa luqad sax ah. Farriimaha khiyaanadu inta badan waxay leeyihiin qalaado higaad, erayo yaab leh ama nahwi xun.
steps.tip: Cod sare u akhri fariinta. Miyuu yaab u yahay? Markaas waxay u badan tahay khiyaano.

steps.title: Ha gubin linkayaasha farriimaha
steps.description: Khiyaanayaashu inta badan waxay diraan linkayn u eg mid run ah, laakiin u horseedaya bogagga been ah. Toos ugu tag bogga bangiga adiga oo qoraya cinwaanka.
steps.warning: Marnaba ha gelin iimeelka ama SMS linkayadooda. Had iyo jeer cinwaanka aad iskaga qor browserka.

steps.title: Marnaba ha la wadaagin macluumaadka shakhsiga
steps.description: Erayada sirta, koodhyada BankID, lambarka shakhsiga iyo macluumaadka kaadhka MARNABA ha la wadaagin cid kula soo xiriirta. Shirkadaha run ahi marnaba ma weydiiyaan.

steps.title: Ku dib u wac lambarka rasmiga ah
steps.description: Haddii qof soo waco oo sheego inay ka yihiin bangiga, dhig taleefanka oo u wac lambarka rasmiga ee bangiga. Ka hel lambarka bogga websaydhka bangiga ama gadaasha kaadhka bangiga.
steps.tip: Ha u dib u wicin lambarka kuu soo wacay - kaasna waa la been abuuri karaa.

steps.title: La hadal qof aad ku kalsoon tahay
steps.description: Ma hubtid? La hadal qoyskaaga, asxaabtaada ama bangigaaga ka hor intaadan waxba samayn. Way ka fiican tahay inaad hal mar oo dheeraad ah weydiiso halkii aad loo khiyaaneeyo.

svindel.neverAskTitle: Xusuusnow: Dirayaasha run ahi MARNABA kuma weydiin doonaan...

examples.message: Baakajigaagu wuu sugayaa geynta. Bixiso 29 kr kharashka halkan: [link]
examples.warning: Boostada marnaba SMS kuma soo dirtay lacag bixin linkayaal!

examples.message: Salaan, waxaan ka socda qaybta amniga ee bangiga. Waxaan helay dhaqdhaqaaq laga shakiyo oo waa inaan xaqiijinaa BankID-gaaga.
examples.warning: Bangiga MARNABA kuguma soo wici BankID!

examples.message: Macmiil sharafta leh, akoonkaaga waa la xiri si aad macluumaadkaaga u cusboonaysiiso 24 saacadood gudahood.
examples.warning: Bangiyada run ahi marnaba kuma hanjabin akoon xirida iimeel!

examples.message: Salaan ayeeyo, waa aniga! Shil ayaa igu dhacay oo waxaan u baahanahay 50,000 kr qareen. Ma i caawin kartaa? Laakiin ha u sheegin hooyo!
examples.warning: Ilmaha ilmaha run ahi kuma weydiin inay wax sir u hayaan waalidka!

contacts.title: Lambarka degdegga - Booliska
contacts.description: Marka ay jirto khatar degdeg ah ama dambi socda

contacts.title: Lambarka adeegga booliska
contacts.description: Si aad u soo sheegto khiyaano ama u hesho talo

contacts.title: NorSIS
contacts.description: Talo xadista aqoonsiga iyo amniga dhijitaalka

contacts.title: Ka hel gadaasha kaadhka
contacts.description: Si aad u xidhid kaadhka iyo akoonka marka khiyaano

svindel.contactsTip: Qor lambarradaan oo warqadda dhig telefoonka agtiisa!

passord.title: Samaynta furaha sirta wanaagsan
passord.description: Sida loo sameeyo furaha sirta xoog leh oo ku ilaaliya
passord.longDescription: Furaha sirta wanaagsan waa difaacaaga koowaad ee hackerrada. Halkan waxaad baranaysaa samaynta furaha sirta ah ee badbaado leh ee sahlan in la xasuusto.
passord.whyImportantTitle: Maxaa waxaa muhiimka xoog leh furaha sirta?
passord.whyImportantText1: Furaha sirta yar waxa lagu qadi karaa ilbiriqsi. Hackerku waxay isticmaalaan barnaamijo ay tiryaan milyuun isku dubaridh si toos. Haddii furaha sirta ay tahay "123456" ama "passord", waxaad jir kaama hadbayn.
passord.whyImportantText2: Furaha sirta xoog leh waxa uu qaataa sanadkii qadi koontaada, hackerku way u socdaan hadaf fudud.
passord.badPasswordsWarning: Haddii aad isticmaasho mid ka mid ah kuwan, bedel ay SI AADKA AH!
passord.stepsTitle: Sida loo sameeyo furaha sirta wanaagsan

steps.title: Isticmaal ugu yaraan 12 xarfo
steps.description: Haddii ay dheer furaha sirta, haddii ay badbaado leh. Furaha sirta 12 xarfo waxa ay aad u adag tahay inay laga qadi karto mid 8-ta ah. Hadafka waa ugu yaraan 12 xarfo, si fiican kula gab.
steps.tip: Jumla waxa ay fudud tahay in la xasuusto kaysa xarfada iska dubaridh: "MinKattHeterLars2024!" waa 20 xarfo oo fudud in la xasuusto.

steps.title: Ku dar xarfada weyn iyo yar, lambar iyo xarfo kale
steps.description: Furaha sirta wanaagsan waxa ay ku jiraan labada xarfada weyn iyo yar, ugu yaraan lambar mid, iyo ugu yaraan xarfo aasaasi mid (!@#$%&). Tani waxa ay aad u adag tahay inay lagu qadi karto.
steps.tip: Bedel xarfada lamba ama xarfo: "Gurugtii" waxa ay noqotaa "S0mm3r!" (laakiin ha isticmaalin keliya bedel caadi).

steps.title: Isticmaal jumla sirta
steps.description: Halka ereyga, isticmaal jumla dhan. "KaffeErBestOm7Morgen!" waa 21 xarfo, waxa ay ku jiraan wax dhammaan oo loo baahan, oo fudud in la xasuusto.
steps.tip: Dooro jumla ay siday macno leedahay adiga, laakiin ay qof kale lagu qadi karo.

steps.title: Marnaba ha isticmaalin isla furaha sirta
steps.description: Isticmaal furaha sirta gaar ah adeega kasta. Haddii mid bogga ay hacket tahay oo aad isticmaalto isla furaha sirta meel dhammaan, hackerku waxay heli doonaan wax dhammaan.
steps.warning: Bangiga internetka, iimayl iyo adeegyada dawlada WAAN HAY furaha sirta kala duwan!

steps.title: Isticmaal mahadsanaha furaha sirta
steps.description: Mahadsanaha furaha sirta waxa uu kay kaydiyaa furaha sirta dhammaan si badbaado leh, haddii ay keliya furaha sirta aasaasi mid loo xasuusto. Barnaamijo sida Bitwarden, 1Password ama LastPass ay sameyaan tani fudud.
steps.tip: Mahadsanaha furaha sirta waxay sidoo kale ka abuuri karaan furaha sirta iska dubaridh, xoog leh adiga.

steps.title: Bilawa laba-gabadhka xaqiijinta
steps.description: Laba-gabadhka (2FA) macnaheedu waa inaad u baahan tahay labada furaha sirta IYO koodigii telefoonka si aad u gasho. Xitaa haddii qof ay tilmaamo furaha sirta, waxay mid ma galin telefoonkaaga.
steps.tip: Bilaw 2FA adeegyada dhammaan kaasoo bixiya, gaar ahaan bangiga internetka iyo iimayl.

steps.title: Bedel furaha sirta haddii ay noqon karto lagaxydhawacay
steps.description: Haddii adeega aad isticmaasho ay hacket tahay, ama aad shakisatid in qof ay arki karto furaha sirta, bedel toos. Hubiso haveibeenpwned.com si aad u arkto haddii iimayl aad hay jirtay datalekkasiye.

passord.tipsTitle: Talooyinka dheeraad ah ee amniga furaha sirta
tips: Marna ha qor furaha sirta kagga warqadda kombuyuutarka
Marna ha shaariyin furaha sirta qof kale, heersi qof dhashane
Marka hore ka bax kombuyuutar wadaag
Ka bedel-bedel kaydinta furaha sirta browserka kombuyuutarka qof kale
Cusboonaysio furaha sirta ugu yaraan hal jeer sanadkii
passord.toolPasswordManagerDesc: Bitwarden (bilaash), 1Password ama LastPass kaydiyaa furaha sirta si badbaado leh.
passord.toolHaveIBeenPwnedDesc: Hubiso haddii iimayl aad ay jirtay datalekkasiye ee haveibeenpwned.com
passord.toolPasswordGeneratorDesc: Qalabka badan ee mahadsanaha furaha sirta waxay ku jiraan sameyaha bannaan furaha sirta xoog leh.

nettbank.title: Bilaabo bangiga internetka
nettbank.description: Baro isticmaalka bangigaaga internetka si badbaado leh oo fudud
nettbank.longDescription: Bangiga internetku wuxuu kuu ogolaanayaa inaad bixiso biilasha oo aad hubiso akoonkaaga gurigaaga. Halkan waxaad baranaysaa aasaaska.
nettbank.whatIsText1: Banking-ga internetka waa adeega bangiga internetka. Halkaas waad arki kartaa waxa qaddiga aad heysaa, bixi biilasha, sii lacag u dirta akoonka kale, iyo badan oo kale - iyada oo aanad booqin bangiga si jiriyad.
nettbank.whatIsText2: Dhammaan bangigu Norway way siisaan banking-ga internetka, waxaana ku amaan ah inaad isticmaasho marka aad raac simpler security.
beforeYouStartItems: Waa inaad haystaa BankID (telefoonka ama qalabka koodhka)
Waa inaad haystaa internetka kombuyuutarka, tablet ama telefoonka

steps.title: Hel bogga bangiga internetka
steps.description: Fur nettleseren oo gal cinwaanka bangiga. Tusaale: dnb.no, nordea.no, sparebank1.no, ama sbanken.no. Ha guji links e-postkaa - gal cinwaanka iska.
steps.tip: Keydi bogga bangiga oo favorite ahaan si aad si fudud u helo.

steps.title: Guji "Gal" ama "Nettbankiga"
steps.description: Bogga hore ee bangiga waad ka heli kartaa batoon galinta. Badiyaa waxay tirtiri "Gal", "Nettbankiga" ama "Bogagga Gaarka ah". Guji batoonkaan.
steps.tip: Batoonka badiyaa waxa uu yaal geeska sare ee midig bogga.

steps.title: Dooro habka galitaanka
steps.description: Waad gali kartaa BankID telefoonka ama BankID koodhka qalabka. Dooro habka aad awood u leedahay.
steps.warning: Haddii aad haysan BankID, waa inaad xiriirtaa bangigaaga si aad uu kuugu siiyo.

steps.title: Gal BankID telefoonka
steps.description: Gal lambarka shakhsiga oo telefonnumberkaaga. Waad heli kartaa fariinta telefoonkaaga. Fur app-ka BankID oo ansix si fingerprint, wajiga ama koodhka.
steps.tip: Hubi in app-ka BankID ay cusbooneysiisan tahay.

steps.title: Noqo qof caasimud ah oo dulmar
steps.description: Markaad gasho, waad arki kartaa dulmar akoonkaaga. Halkan waad arki kartaa saldo (qadarka lacagta aad leedahay) akoon walba. Guji akoon si aad u aragto harakada (mid soo iyo mid baxba).
steps.tip: Badiyaa nettbanking-gu waxa kale oo ay tonton bilaalayaasha biilasha da'ida soo socota.

steps.title: Safaari menuyga
steps.description: Menu-ga waad ka heli kartaa adeegyo sida "Bixinta", "Wareejinta", "Kaadhka", "Amaah" iyo "Settings". Qaato waqti si aad u arkaad waxa jira.
steps.tip: Badiyaa bangiga waxa ay leedahay "Caawin" ama "Customer Service" batoon haddii aad taag joogtid.

steps.title: Xusuusnow inaad ka baxdo
steps.description: Markaaad dhameyso, guji "Bax" geeska sare ee midig. Tan waxay muhiim u tahay gaar ahaan haddii aad isticmaalayso kombiyuuter wadaag ah.
steps.warning: Qaado nettleserigu dhamaadkii markaad baxday.

nettbank.securityTitle: Talooyin badbaada ah oo banking-ga internetka
securityTips: Ha gali links e-postkaa ama SMS-kaaga
Isticmaal banking-ga internetka kombiyuuterkaaga keliya, mana isticmaallo kombinuuterka dadka
Hubi in cinwaanka ay bilaab https:// oo ay leedahay caasimud-ikon
nettbank.helpText: Dhammaan bankyada waxa ay leedahay customer service oo kuu caawin karta. Wici taleefonnada bangiga (waxa uu jira dhabarka kaadhka bangiga) ama soo booq fiyaal.

betaling.title: Bixinta biilasha
betaling.description: Sida loo bixiyo biilasha bangiga internetka
betaling.longDescription: Bixinta biilasha bangiga internetka waa dhaqso iyo fudud. Halkan waxaan kugu tusin doonaa tallaabo-tallaabo sida loo sameeyo.
betaling.termKIDDesc: Tirada dheer oo aqoonsiga bixinta kaagu. MUHIIM inaad saxdo!
betaling.termFristDesc: Maalinta ugu dambeeysa biilash ay in la bixiyo

steps.title: Gal nettbanking-ga
steps.description: Tag bogga bangiga oo gal BankID sidii caadi.

steps.title: Hel "Bixi" ama "Bixinta Cusub"
steps.description: Menu-ga waad ka heli kartaa "Bixi", "Bixinta" ama "Bixinta Cusub". Guji inuu bilaabo bixinta cusub.
steps.tip: Badiyaa bankyada waxa ay leedahay batoon weyn "Bixi" bogga hore.

steps.title: Dooro akoon laga bixi
steps.description: Dooro akoon lacagu lagu jaraa. Hubi inaad akoonka ku leedahay lacag oo filan.
steps.warning: Haddii aad akoonka ku haysan lacag oo filan, bixinta maayo oo guddoon.

steps.title: Gal lambarka akoonka
steps.description: Gal lambarka akoonka qaataa (11 tiro). Waad heli kartaa biilasha, badiyaa markay tahay "Gal Akoon" ama "Lambarka Akoonka".
steps.tip: Badiyaa biilasha waxa ay leedahay barcode - hadii ay sidaas tahay waad isticmaali kartaa app-ka bangiga si aad u iska scanesho.

steps.title: Gal lambarka KID
steps.description: Gal lambarka KID sidii ay biilasha ku yaalto. Tan waxay muhiim u tahay qaataa si uu ogsoon yahay waxa bixinta ku saabsan.
steps.warning: KID khalad ayaa dhici kara inaad bixinta si sax ah loogu naqaando!

steps.title: Gal qadarka
steps.description: Gal qadarka aad bixiso. Hubi inaad biilasha ku sameyso.
steps.tip: Isticmaal comma qaarka (tusaale: 1234,50). Badiyaa bankyada ay isticmaali jiraan dhibic.

steps.title: Dooro taariikhda bixinta
steps.description: Dooro goorta bixinta. Waad bixi kartaa hadda ama taarikhi yar ka dib. Xusuuso taariikhda dhicidda waa ugu dambeeysa deadline.
steps.tip: Bixi maalmo lammaane ka hor inta dhici si aad hubtid inay waqti jidi.

steps.title: Hubi iyo ansix
steps.description: Eeg dhammaan macluumaadka: lambarka akoonka, KID, qadarka iyo taarikh. Markaaad dhammaan sax tahay, guji "Bixi" ama "Ansix".
steps.warning: Labjooji-hubi KID iyo qadarka markaad ansixdo!

steps.title: Xaqiijinta
steps.description: Waad heli kartaa xaqiijinta bixinta ay naqaandaw. Bixinta ayaa laga jari doona akoonkaaga taariikhda la doorate.
steps.tip: Keydi risiipta ama samee screenshot dukumeentiga.

betaling.avtaleGiroText: Biilasha ay joogto (qas, caasimud, iwm.) waad setto kartaa AvtaleGiro. Markaas biilash ayaa si billi billi ah loogu bixi. Waad heli kartaa "AvtaleGiro" ama "Bixiyo Joogta" nettbanking-ga.
betaling.efakturaText: eFaktura macneyduhu biilash ay soo gal dhijital ahaan nettbanking-kaaga. Waad luntaato inaad lambarka KID iyo akoonka gaalto - ansix qadarka keliya. Shid eFaktura "Settings" nettbanking-ga.

vipps.title: Isticmaalka Vipps
vipps.description: Baro u dirista lacagta iyo bixinta Vipps
vipps.longDescription: Vipps waxay fududeysaa u dirista lacagta asxaabta, bixinta dukaannada iyo wadaagida biilasha. Halkan waxaad baranaysaa wax kasta oo aad u baahan tahay.
vipps.whatIsText1: Vipps waa app bixinta Norway ah oo ku ogolaanaysa inaad lacag u dirto qof kale, bixi dukaannada, iyo wax badan oo kale - dhammaan telefoonkaaga.
vipps.whatIsText2: In ka badan 4 milyan oo Norwejiyaan waxa ay isticmaali Vipps. Waxa ay badbaad u tahay sida ay la xiriirto BankID iyo akoonka bankiga.

steps.title: Soo Dejiso app-ka Vipps
steps.description: Fur App Store (iPhone) ama Google Play (Android). Raadi "Vipps" oo guji "Install" ama "Hel".
steps.tip: Hubi inaad soo dejiso Vipps-app saxda ah oo ay leedahay logo cas-orange.

steps.title: Fur app-ka oo bilaabo qeyd
steps.description: Fur Vipps oo guji "Bilaab" ama "Diiwaan Geli". Waad iska codsoon tahay inaad lambarka telefoonka gaalto.
steps.tip: Isticmaal lambarka isla ah ee ay BankID-ga qeydka ku yaal.

steps.title: Xaqiiji BankID-da
steps.description: Waa inaad aqoonsigaaga xaqiijiso BankID-da. Raac tallaabada - waxaad dirta app-ka BankID si aad ansixdo.
steps.warning: Haddii BankID aanay shaqeyn, hubi in app-ku cusbooneysiin.

steps.title: Ku xirir akoonka bangiga
steps.description: Vipps waxa ay si dhamaastuhu ka soo qaadataa akoonkaaga bangiga. Dooro akoon aad isticmaali lahayd inuu caadi ahaan Vipps-bixi.
steps.tip: Waad badali kartaa akoon dhallinta "Settings" app-ka.

steps.title: Ku dar kaadhka bixinta (optional)
steps.description: Waad sidoo kale ku dar kartaa kaadhka bixinta Vipps dukaannada isticmaali. Guji "Kaadhka" oo "Ku dar Kaadhka". Buuxi macluumaadka kaadhka.
steps.tip: Kaadhku waa inuu taageerayo bixinta hubka la'aan.

steps.title: Diri lacag qof
steps.description: Inuu diri lacag: Guji "Raadi" ama "+" batoon, gal magaca ama lambarka, gal qadarka, oo guji "Diri". Qaataa sidoo kale Vipps u baahan.
steps.tip: Waad ku dar kartaa fariin bixinta, tusaale: "Mahadsanid gacan caano!"

steps.title: Bixi dukaannada
steps.description: Dukaannada ay Vipps qaataa: Fur app-ka, guji "Bixi", oo telefoonka dhigga terminal bixinta. Ansix fingerprint ama koodhka.
steps.tip: Raadi logo Vipps kaashaada si aad ogsoon tahay haddii dukaanu Vipps qaataa.

steps.title: Wadaagi biilasha
steps.description: Ma aad bilaabay wax? Guji "Biilash" app-ka, gal qadarka guud iyo dooro ciyaari. Vipps waxa ay diri jidka nidaamiga ah dhammaan.
steps.tip: Wanaagsan wadaagista biilash restoora ama iibka wadaag.

vipps.featuresTitle: Wax kale aad ku sameeyn karto Vipps
vipps.featureInvoiceDesc: Aqbal iyo bixi faktuuraha si toos ah app-ka
vipps.featureOnlineDesc: Bixi si fudud dukaannada internetka Vipps taageeray
vipps.securityText: Vipps waxa ay badbaad u tahay sida ay dhammaan bixintahu ansixan fingerprint, wajiga ama PIN-kode. Cidkuna maayo inaad diri lacag akoonkaaga hadii aanad ansixin.

gjeld.title: Hel caawin deynta
gjeld.description: Halkan waxaad ka helaysaa caawin haddii aad dhibaato ku qabto bixinta biilasha
gjeld.longDescription: Qof walba wuxuu ku dhici karaa xaalad dhaqaale oo adag. Halkan waxaad ka helaysaa macluumaad halka aad caawin ka heli karto.
gjeld.importantText: Haddii aad dhibaataysantahay bixinta biilasha, waxay muhiim tahay inaad degdeg qab. Hore aad qaato tallaabo, horde ay noqon kartaa xalka. Ma adinoon kaliya - qofba badan ayaa jirtay xaaladi isla mid ah oo ay caawinta helaan.
signs: Du betaler bare minimumsbeløpet på kredittkort
Du bruker kredittkort til daglige utgifter som mat
Du tar opp nye lån for å betale gamle
Aad iswaciso inaad fur boostada iyo biilasha

steps.title: Hel dulmar dhaqaalaha
steps.description: Gal dhammaan dakhliga (mushaar, caasimud, iwm.) iyo dhammaan kharashyada (kirey, cunta, amaah, iwm.). Tani waxa ay ku siisaa dulmar xaaladda.
steps.tip: Isticmaal dulmar banking-ga internetka oo eeg waxa aad dhabta ah qaddiga ku isticmaalaysaa.

steps.title: Buuxi biilasha qaybka
steps.description: Badiyaa biilash waxa ay kala duwan yihiin muhiimada. Bixi marka hore: kirey/amaah guri, qas, cunta, iyo hadii ay jirto deyn carruurta. Amaahda isticmaalsiga iyo kaadhka credit waad suglan kartaa.
steps.warning: Haddii aad kirey bixinaysid, waxaad riskaynaysaa inaad guri miseeyso.

steps.title: Kontakt kreditorene dine
steps.description: Wici dadka aad lacag u dugato oo sheeg xaaladda. Badiyaa waxay dooran tahay inay karti bixinta samaystaan hadii ay soo diraan inkaso. Ka codsada jidha bixinta ama habka installment.
steps.tip: Badiwadoodii dadka aad lacag u dugato waxay leeyihiin hab gaar ah ee kuwa dhibaataysan. Waa inaad weyddiisaa renta yar ama wakhtiga lixinta dheer.

steps.title: Søk profesjonell hjelp
steps.description: Gjeldsrådgivere can hjalp iska cajiso dhakhliga oo sameeya fikirka. Waa libre magaalada iyo NAV.
steps.tip: Lama baahna inaad go'aansato wax ka hor intii aad xafiiska la soo foolnaato - waay gargaari doonaan inaad arktid imkadaha.

steps.title: Vurder refinansiering
steps.description: Haddii aad amaahdo yar oo badan leeyihiin, waxaa laga yaabaa inaad isku tirabogeysid amaah hal ah oo renta yar. Hadal bank-kaaga oo weydii imkadaha.
steps.warning: Ogow alaabta "amaah isku tiribogeysay" oo renta sareeya laga soo qaatay ururrada aan la aqoon.

steps.title: Søk økonomisk sosialhjelp hvis nødvendig
steps.description: Haddii aad lacag u leeyihiin cunta iyo karfaa muhiimada, waxaad codin kartaa caawin sosyal laga soo qaatay NAV. Tani waa caawin ku meel gaarka ah ilaa markii aad nidaamda dhigto dhakhligaaga.
steps.tip: Caawin sosyal waa xuq ee dadka u baahan - ha ka cabsin inaad codato.

gjeld.helpTitle: Halka aad ka heli kartaa caawinta bilaash?
gjeld.helpNAVDesc: Wici NAV 55 55 33 33 oo ka codsada inaad hadal ka hadlato caawin deynta, ama soo booq xafiiska NAV aagaaga.
gjeld.helpKommuneDesc: Badiyaa degmada ay leedahay caawin deynta oo bilaash. Wici serviceku degmada si aad u helo macluumaad la xiriirta.
gjeld.helpOkonomiradDesc: Bogga ay sheegaysaa ay qaybta macaamaraska leh qalab miisaaniyada iyo talooyin dhaqaalaha.
gjeld.helpGjeldsofferDesc: Wakaarada ay volunteers ah oo siiya caawinta iyo taageerada bilaash qofka ay dhibaato ku qabo deynta.
gjeld.avoidTitle: Waxan kamid ah ee aad ISWACAAN
avoidItems: Amaah cusub aad qaadataa si aad madibka qadiim u bixi (spiral deynta)
Katagoo indhahaa ka hor boosta iyo biilasha
Hah u odhan "amaah degdeg" oo renta sare
Masaafrida aad sugato halkii la codsaday caawinta

epost.title: Dejinta iimaylka
epost.longDescription: Iimaylku waa aasaaska xiriirka dhijitaalka ah. Halkan waxaad baranaysaa abuurista akoonta iimaylka iyo isticmaalkeeda.
epost.whatIsText1: E-postu (post elektronik) waa boosta dhijitaalka oo aad dirta oo helata internetka. Waa bilaash, degdeg, oo aad u diri kartaa cida walba adduunka.
epost.whatIsText2: Si aad u isticmaasho e-postu waa inaad haystaa cinwaan e-postka. Tani waxay u shaqeysaa cinwaankaaga dhijitaalka, tusaale: magaca@gmail.com.
epost.providerGmailDesc: Caasimudaha ugu caasimeysan, bilaash, shaqeeysa dhammaan qalab

steps.title: Tag Gmail
steps.description: Fur nettleseren oo tag gmail.com. Guji "Samee akoon" ama "Create account".

steps.title: Buuxi macluumaadka shakhsiga
steps.description: Gal magaca hore iyo magaca dambe. Tani waxay muuqataa markaad e-post dirto.
steps.tip: Isticmaal magacaaga saxda ah si ay curufu kuu aqbalon.

steps.title: Dooro cinwaanka e-postka
steps.description: Dooro cinwaanakaagu e-postka. Waa inuu unique yahay. Provo magaca.magaca@gmail.com ama ku dar tiro haddii cinwaanku qaangacday.
steps.warning: Cinwaanku maayo oo dhamaadkii loogu beddeli karo, sidaas sidii iska dhawaaq!

steps.title: Samee furaha sirta badbaad ah
steps.description: Samee furaha sirta oo ay leeyihiin 8 xarfo yar yar, qaas 12. Isticmaal xarfo weyn iyo xarfo yar, tiro iyo xarfo. Xaqiiji furaha sirta adiga iska gaalaadi.
steps.tip: Arka hagayashan furaha sirta ee talooyin lixan furaha sirta badbaad.

steps.title: Ku dar lambarka telefoonka (la taliyay)
steps.description: Ku dar lambarka telefoonka si aad u dib heli karto akoonka haddii aad ilaawdo furaha sirta. Waad sidoo kale u isticmaali kartaa badbaada dheeraad ah.
steps.tip: Tan waa optional, laakiin waxaa la taliyaa xoog.

steps.title: Ansix karti iyo privacy
steps.description: Akhriso iyo ansix Google karti iyo privacy statement adiga oo guji "Ansix" ama "I agree".

steps.title: E-postkaadu diyaar tahay!
steps.description: Mabrouk! Waad haystaa cinwaana e-postka hadda. Waad jaan kartaa inbox-kaagu halkaas oo e-posts cusub ay dhici doonto.
steps.tip: Keydi cinwaana e-postka iyo furaha sirta meel badbaad ah.

replySteps: Fur e-postka aad rabto inaad ka jawabto
epost.spamTitle: Waxa ay tahay spam (e-post aan la xushay)?
epost.spamText: Spam waa e-post aan laylagalagu dayin, badiyaa xayeysiis ama baaris iska mid. Gmail iyo adeegyada kale way filtrayaan badiyaa iyaxa oo automatikyada "Spam"-folder-ka. Ha raadi links e-postkaa aan xushanta.

digipost.title: Isticmaalka Digipost
digipost.description: Hel boostada dhijitaalka ee hay'adaha dawladda iyo kuwa gaarka ah
digipost.longDescription: Digipost waa sanduuqaaga boostada dhijitaalka ah halkaas oo aad ka hesho boosta dawladda iyo shirkadaha. Badbaado, fudud oo saaxiibtinimo deegaan.
digipost.whatIsText1: Digipost waa sanduuqa boostada dhijital badbaad ah halkaas oo aad ka hesho warqado hay'adaha dawladda (sida Hey'adda Canshuurta iyo NAV) iyo shirkado gaarka ah (sida bangiga iyo shirkadka caasimud).
digipost.whatIsText2: Iyada u beddelka boostada qaab-qaabta aad hestaa dhammaan dhijital, waxaana lagu keydhaa badbaada dhawr sanad.
benefits: Hel fariinta markaad boostada cusub yimaaddo

steps.title: Tag digipost.no
steps.description: Fur nettleseren oo tag digipost.no. Guji "Diiwaan geli" ama "Samee akoon".

steps.title: Gal BankID-da
steps.description: Waad diiwaan galin doonta BankID-da. Dooro BankID telefoonka ama koodhka qalabka iyo raac tallaabada.
steps.warning: Waa inaad BankID aad leedahay si aad Digipost-ta u isticmaasho.

steps.title: Xaqiiji macluumaadka
steps.description: Digipost waxa ay si dhamaastuhu ka soo qaadataa magaca iyo cinwaanka Diiwaanka Dadweynaha. Hubi in macluumaadku sax tahay.
steps.tip: Ku dar e-postka iyo lambarka telefoonka si aad heshid fariinta boostada cusub.

steps.title: Dooro cid aad diri lahayd boostada
steps.description: Waad doori kartaa cidda aad diri lahayd boostada dhijital. Hay'adaha dawladda waxay si dhamaastuhu u shaqeysi. Waad sidoo kale ku dar kartaa bankyada, shirkado caasimud iwm.
steps.tip: Waad beddeli kartaa tan marwalba "Settings" hoostiisa.

steps.title: Safaari sanduuqa boostada
steps.description: Sanduuqa boostada waad ku arki kartaa boosta oo dhammu waxaa la helayaa. Waad karti kartaa mapper si aad organize, iyo raadi warqado hore.
steps.tip: Boostada kay dawladda badiyaa waxay ku yaalaan "Dawladda" ama mapper gaarka ah.

steps.title: Soo dejiso app-ka (optional)
steps.description: Waad sidoo kale isticmaali kartaa Digipost telefoonka. Soo dejiso app-ka App Store ama Google Play.
steps.tip: App-ka waad heli kartaa push-fariinto boostada cusub yimaaddo.

tips: Hubi Digipost si joogto ah - boostada muhiimka ah way yimaan halkaas
Isticmaal raad function si aad helo warqado hore
Samee mapper si aad organize
Soo dejiso dukumenti muhiimka ah inay sidaas tahay backup

altinn.title: Isticmaalka Altinn
altinn.description: U dirista foomamka iyo xiriirka dawladda
altinn.longDescription: Altinn waa bogga aad ugu dirto foomamka dawladda oo aad ka hesho macluumaad ku saabsan xuquuqdaada iyo waajibaadkaaga.
altinn.whatIsText1: Altinn waa portal gaarka ah oo ay dawladdu isticmaasho si ay u isqu hadlaan dhijital. Halkan waad soo dir kartaa forms, hubin status u cases, iyo hel macluumaad hay'adaha 70 dawladda ka badan.
altinn.whatIsText2: Waad isticmaali kartaa Altinn waxyaabo sida warbixinta canshuurta, shatiga darawalnimada, codsashada dhismaha iyo wax badan oo kale.

steps.title: Tag altinn.no
steps.description: Fur nettleseren oo tag altinn.no.

steps.title: Gal
steps.description: Guji "Gal" geeska sare ee midig. Dooro BankID, MinID ama habka galinta kale. Raac tallaabada galigu.
steps.tip: BankID wuxuu siisaa tilang adeegyo baddan.

steps.title: Safaari "Bogagga Gaarka ah"
steps.description: Markaad gasho, waad arki kartaa "Bogagga Gaarka ah" ama "Dashboard-kaaga". Halkan waad arki kartaa fariinte, forms iyo status matter lagu soo diray.
steps.tip: Hubi "Inbox" fariinte dawladda.

steps.title: Hel form
steps.description: Si aad u helo form, isticmaal raad-box ama guji "Forms iyo Adeegyo". Gal waxa aad raadisayo, tusaale: "warbixinta canshuurta" ama "ogolaar lug-beddel".
steps.tip: Popular forms badiyaa waxay ku yaalaan bogga hore.

steps.title: Buuxi form-ka
steps.description: Fur form-ka iyo buuxi dhammaan fields. Badiyaa forms waxa ay leedahay macluumaad lagu buuxi hore. Hubi inaad dhammaan sax yahay.
steps.warning: Keydi habka form-ka yar yar - waad iska dawoosan kartaa dhallinta.

steps.title: Soo dir
steps.description: Markaad dhameyso form-ka, guji "Soo dir" ama "Gudbi". Waad yeelan lahayd inaad sign BankID-da.
steps.tip: Waad heli kartaa resiipta inay xaqiijiso. Keydi tani.

steps.title: Raaci status
steps.description: "Matters Gaarka ah" ama "Inbox" waad arki kartaa status waxa aad soo dirtay. Waad sidoo kale heli kartaa fariinta markaad matter-ka la falin.

tips: Hubi inbox-ka si joogto ah fariinte muhiimka ah
Isticmaal archive si aad helo forms lagu soo diro hore
Waad siisaa kartaa qof kale midho u shaqeyn
Badiyaa adeegyo degmada waxa ay u baahan Altinn-gal

minside.title: MinSide iyo adeegyada dawladda
minside.description: Dulmar ku saabsan adeegyada dawladda ee ugu muhiimsan
minside.longDescription: Waxaa jira adeegyo "Min side" badan oo hay'adaha dawladda ee kala duwan. Halkan waxaad ka helaysaa dulmar kuwa ugu muhiimsan.
minside.introText: "Bogagga Gaarka ah" ama "Profayl Gaarka ah" waa waxa aad arkayso markaad gashto hay'adaha dawladda. Halkan waad heli kartaa macluumaadka shakhsiga, codsashada, go'aan iyo fariinte.
minside.serviceNAVDesc: Codsashada, go'aan, kaadhka meldinta, lacag caabuun
minside.serviceSkattDesc: Warbixinta canshuurta, xisaabinta canshuurta, kaadhka canshuurta
minside.serviceDigipostDesc: Sanduuqa boostada dhijital oo publika iyo gaarka ah

steps.title: Tag netsida adeegyada
steps.description: Gal cinwaanka si toos ah nettleseren, tusaale: nav.no, skatteetaten.no ama helsenorge.no.
steps.warning: Ha guji links e-postkaa si aad gashto - gal hadii si toos ah netsida.

steps.title: Hel "Gal"
steps.description: Raadi "Gal", "Bogagga Gaarka ah" ama mid la mid ah. Batoon badiyaa waxa uu yaal geeska sare ee midig bogga.

steps.title: Dooro habka galitaanka
steps.description: Waad doori kartaa inta badan habka galitaanka. Iyada ugu caasaysa waa BankID telefoonka, BankID koodhka, ama MinID.
steps.tip: BankID waxa ay siisaa tilang adeegyo baddan. MinID waxa ay shaqeysa qaarabad.

steps.title: Xaqiiji aqoonasiga
steps.description: Raac tallaabada habka la dooro. BankID telefoonka waad heli kartaa fariinta aad ansix doonto.
steps.warning: Akhriso hadii waxa aad ansixayo ka hor inta aad ansixdo!

steps.title: Waad hadda gasho!
steps.description: Markaad gasho, waad joogta "Bogagga Gaarka ah" halkaas oo aad heli kartaa macluumaadka shakhsiga iyo adeegyo.
steps.tip: Xusuusnow inaad ka baxdo markaad dhameyso.

tips: Isticmaal habka galinta midka iyadoo fudud
Hubi inbox-ka si joogto ah - fariinte muhiimka ah way ku yimaaddan
Cusboonaysii macluumaadka la xiriirta haddii ay beddeshay
Badda ka bax markaaad isticmaalayso kompiyuuter wadaag

posten.title: Baastida iyo Kaabada
posten.description: Raadi kaabada, iska soo qaad xafiiska boostada iyo habsami dakhli
posten.longDescription: Baro sida loo isticmaalo adeegga boostada ee Norwegian - raadi kaabada, beddel cinwaan, iska soo qaad xafiiska boostada iyo habsami dakhli ee dhamaan caalamiga.
posten.whatIsText: Posten waxay leedahay adeegyo dhijitaalka faa'iido leh. Waad raadi kartaa kaabada, beddel cinwaanidda dhexinta, hel xafiiska boostada ugu dhow, iyo iska qaat dhegeysiyo marka kaabadu soo garto.

services.name: Raadi kaabada
services.description: Raac kaabadaaga laga bilaabo diriye ilaa gudbinta oo leh lambar raadin

services.name: Beddel cinwaanidda dhexinta
services.description: Diri kaabada cinwaan kale ama xafiiska boostada

services.name: Hel xafiiska boostada
services.description: Hel xafiiska boostada ugu dhow ama saxan kaabada

services.name: Beddel cinwaan muddo gaaban
services.description: Diri baastidaada cinwaan kale inta aad safro jirtahay

trackingSteps.title: Hel lambar raadinta
trackingSteps.description: Lambar raadinta waxaa ku jira ogoloow dalbashada xaaladka kaabada. Badiyaa waxay ahayd code dheer oo leh xarfood iyo lambar.
trackingSteps.tip: Hubi iimaylka xaaladka kaabada ee ka imanday meesha aad gadatay.

trackingSteps.title: Tag posten.no
trackingSteps.description: Fur browserkaaga oo tag posten.no. Waad sidoo kale isticmaali kartaa abka Posten ee telefoonkaaga.
trackingSteps.tip: Abka waxa ay soo dirti dhawysiyo marka kaabadu soo garto.

trackingSteps.title: Gal lambar raadinta
trackingSteps.description: Bogga hore ee posten.no waaxay ku jirta box raadin. Gal lambar raadinta oo riix Raadi.
trackingSteps.tip: Waad paste-i kartaa lambar haddii aad nuqul samaynaysid iimaylka.

trackingSteps.title: Arki xaalada kaabada
trackingSteps.description: Hadda waad arki kartaa halka kaabadu joogo iyo goorta ay imanayso. Waad sidoo kale arki kartaa dhacdooyin hore.
trackingSteps.tip: Riix "Oo iska soo qaad" si aad u hesho fariin marka kaabadu diyaar tahay.

posten.customsTitle: Dakhli kaabada laga soo dalba dibadda
posten.customsText: Marka aad ku dalbasho dibadda (dibadda EU/EEA), waxy jiri karaan dakhli iyo lacag. Halkan waxaa aad u baahan tahay inaad ogaato:
customsTips: Alaabta ka sareysa 350 NOK waxy lahayd VAT (25%)
Qaarkood alaabta waxy sidoo kale lahayd dakhli ala dhigto VAT
Posten waxa ay qaadataa lacag habsami dakhli
Waad naqli kartaa nafsiga iska joog toll.no si aad u hurato lacagta
Cuntada, khamriga iyo tumbako waxy lahayd xukuumno adag
posten.digipostText: Posten waxa ay ka dambeysa Digipost, safan baastida dhijitaalka. Halkan waad heli kartaa warqado ka soo imanday hay'adaha dawladda iyo shirkado dhijitaalka halka qoraalka.
posten.digipostLink: Akhri wax badan ku saabsan Digipost
posten.pickupTitle: Iska soo qaad kaabada xaaladka boostada
posten.pickupText: Marka kaabadu diyaar tahay, waad heli doontaa dhegeysi SMS ama abka Posten. Iska soo qaad kaabada xaaladka boostada ugu dhow ama safan kaabada.
posten.pickupRememberText: Keyd ID sax ah (pasboort, lahaanta motiska ama kaararka bangiga leh sawir) marka aad iska soo qaadayso kaabada.

bostotte.title: Codso taageerada guryaha
bostotte.description: Hel taageero dhaqaale si aad u bixiso kireynta ama kharashyada guryaha
bostotte.longDescription: Taageerada guryaha waa nidaam taageero dawladeed kuwa dakhligooda yar yahay oo kharashyada guryahoodu sarreeyo. Kireystayaasha iyo mulkiilayaashaba waxay codsan karaan.
bostotte.whatIsText1: Taageerada guryaha waa lacag ay Husbanken ka siisaa si aad ku caawin karto inaad bixi gurigaaga. Waxay ku xiran tahay baahida, taas macneyduhu inaan dakhligaaga iyo kharashyada gurigaagu go'aami tahay haddii aad taageero heshay.
bostotte.whatIsText2: Waad heli kartaa taageerada guryaha haddii aad kirey ama haystid gurigaaga. Taageeradu waxa ay bixisaa bilihii oo si toos ah akoonkaaga.
requirements: Waa inaad degto guriga aad taageero codsato
Gurigu waa inuu ansix yahay isticmaalkii sanadkeed oo dhan
Waa inaad joogtid lawlawee Norway
Dakhligaagu waa inuu hooseysan yahay xudud gaar ah
Kharashyadaagu waa inay sareeyan tahay xudud gaar ah

steps.title: Tag husbanken.no
steps.description: Fur nettleseren oo gal husbanken.no address-box-ka. Guji Enter.
steps.tip: Waad sidoo kale raadi kartaa Google "Husbanken taageerada guryaha".

steps.title: Hel form-ka codsashada
steps.description: Bogga hore waad ka heli kartaa "Taageerada guryaha" menu-ga. Guji "Codso taageerada guryaha" ama "Gal iyo codso".
steps.tip: Batoon-ka codsashada badiyaa waxaa lagu arki yahay bogga hore.

steps.title: Gal BankID-da
steps.description: Waa inaad gasho si aad codsato. Isticmaal BankID telefoonka ama koodhka. Raac tilmaamaha bogga.
steps.warning: Ma haystid BankID? Waad heli kartaa caawin degmada servicetorg.

steps.title: Buuxi codsashada
steps.description: Form-ka codsashada waxa ay si dhamaastuhu ka soo qaadataa macluumaadka. Hubi inaad dhammaan sax tahay. Buuxi kharashyada gurigaaga (kirey, cost lagu meelshareyste iwm).
steps.tip: Hayso contract-ka kirey ama caddeyn kharashyada gurigaaga diyaar.

steps.title: Caddeyn kharashyada gurigaaga
steps.description: Soo dejiso contract-ka kirey ama caddeyn kale kharashyada gurigaaga. Qaado sawir telefoonka haddii aadna haystid scanner.
steps.warning: Hadii aad caddeyn haysan, codsashada way noqon karaa go'an maya.

steps.title: Soo dir codsashada
steps.description: Safaari codsashada oo hubi inaad dhammaan sax tahay. Guji "Soo dir" markaad dhameyso.
steps.tip: Waad heli kartaa xaqiijinta e-postkaa ama sanduuqa boostada dhijital.

steps.title: Sug jawabta
steps.description: Husbanken waxa ay habaarin doonta codsashada. Jawaab badiyaa waxa ay timaadaa dhawr toddobaad. Waad raaci kartaa status portal-ka codsashada.
steps.tip: Taageerada guryaha waxa ay codsantahaa bilihii, laakiin maadama aad u baahan tahay codsashada cusub - way cusboonaysi doona si dhamaastuhu.

tips: Codso hadii ay hadhaad joog bilihii - deadline waa 25-ka bilihii
Waad heli kartaa jawaab qiyaastii 10-ka bilihii xiga
War geli isbeddelada dakhliga ama kharashyada gurigaaga
Waad codsan kartaa waqti hore haddii aad illoobay inaad codsato
Degmadu waad caawin kartaa codsashada haddii aad u baahan tahay
bostotte.helpText: Wac Husbanken lambarka 22 96 16 00 ama la xiriir xafiiska guryaha ee degmadaada.

startlan.title: Codso amaahda bilowga
startlan.description: Amaah degmada kuwa aan heli karin amaah bangiyada caadiga ah
startlan.longDescription: Amaahda bilowgu waa amaah degmada ee dadka ay dhibaato ku tahay helitaanka amaah bangiyada caadiga ah. Waxaa loo isticmaali karaa iibsashada guri ama dib u maalgelinta deyn qaali ah.
startlan.whatIsText1: Amaahda bilowgu waa amaah laga soo qaato degmadaadu oo ay Husbanken lacag siiso. Waxaa loo macneeyo qofka ay dakhli joogto leh, laakiin uu helin waayo amaah bangiga caadiga ah.
startlan.whatIsText2: Amaahda bilowgu waxa ay deksan karaa dhammaan ama qayb ka mida qiimaha iibka guri. Rente waxa ay wanaag u tahay waad heli kartaa waqti dheeraad ah oo bixinta.
requirements: Waa inaad dhibaato dheeraad ah u qabto helista amaah bangiga caadiga
Waa inaad awoodyahay inaad u bixi amaah waqti dheer
Waa inaad u baahan tahay guri (kuwa marka hore iibaya, qoyska carruurta, qof waalid oo keliya)
Waa inaad caddeys kartaa dakhligaagu
Waa inaad provo tahay helista amaah bangiga caadiga hore

steps.title: Barbar haan waad heli kartaa amaah bangiga
steps.description: Xiriir bangiga oo weydiis haddii ay ku siisaan amaah guri. Haddii ay yidhaahdu maya, ka codsada xaqiijinta caaban oo go'an maya.
steps.tip: Go'anka maya bangiga caddeyn muhiim ah oo codsashada.

steps.title: Hel form-ka codsashada degmada
steps.description: Tag netsida degmadaada iyo raadi "amaahda bilowga". Badiyaa degmadu waxa ay leedahay form-ka codsashada dhijital.
steps.tip: Badiyaa degmadu ay isticmaali husbanken.no ama altinn.no oo codsashada.

steps.title: Gal oo bilaab codsashada
steps.description: Gal BankID-da. Buuxi macluumaadka shakhsiga, dhaqaalahaa iyo nooca guri aad amaah u codsato.
steps.warning: Jees dhaqaalahaa - degmadu waxa ay hubinta macluumaadka.

steps.title: Caddeyn dhaqaalahaa
steps.description: Soo dejiso last payslip, warbixinta canshuurta, go'an bangiga, iyo hadii ay jirto caddeyn deynta.
steps.tip: Ka hadda caddeyn, ka dhakhso habaarintan.

steps.title: Sheeg baahida guriga
steps.description: Faariso waakaa aad u baahan guri iyo nooca guri aad raadsanayso. Haddii aad helayso guri, ku dar macluumaadka.
steps.tip: Degmadu waxa ay tilaarin tahay haddii gurigu gaar ahaan yahay dhaqaalahaa.

steps.title: Soo dir codsashada
steps.description: Safaari dhammaan macluumaadka iyo guji "Soo dir". Waad heli kartaa xaqiijinta inaad codsashada aqbalay.
steps.tip: Keydi risiipta iyo numbers tixraacaha.

steps.title: Sug jawabta
steps.description: Degmadu waxa ay habaarin doonta codsashada. Tani waxa ay noqon karaa dhawr toddobaad. Waxay kaa wici karaan macluumaad dheeraad.
steps.warning: Waqti habaarinta waxa ay kala duwan tahay degmo ilaa degmo.

tips: Bilaab habka habaarintan hore - waqti habaarinta way noqon karaa dheer
Xaqiiq u ah waxa aad arkaasho
Waad heli kartaa amaahda bilowga iyo taageero qaar-qaarka
Degmadu waad caawin kartaa helista guri gaar ah
Waad codsan kartaa jidha bixinta haddii dhaqaalaha ay beddeshay
startlan.helpText: La xiriir xafiiska guryaha ee degmadaada oo ku saabsan amaahda bilowga. Waad awoodi kartaa sidoo kale inaad wacdo Husbanken lambarka 22 96 16 00.

kommunalBolig.title: Codso guriga degmada
kommunalBolig.description: Kireysiga guriga degmada haddii aadan awoodin inaad adigu hesho guri
kommunalBolig.longDescription: Guriga degmadu waa bixinta dadka aan awoodin inay adigooda u helaan guri. Degmadu waxay leedahay guryaha waxayna u kireysaa qiimo la dhimay.
kommunalBolig.whatIsText1: Guriga degmadu waa guryaha degmadu owna tahay iyo ay kirey karaan qofka ay u baahan caawin helista guri. Kirey badiyaa waxa ay hoose u tahay suuqa gaar ah.
kommunalBolig.whatIsText2: Waxa ay jira xad qodar ah guriga degmada, sidaas sidii way noqon karaa standing list. Degmadu waxa ay gaari karaa kuwa ay sida ugu baddan u baahan.
requirements: Waa inaad guri aydna haysan ama aad taag ku qabatay inaad gurigaagu lumiso
Waa inaad provo tahay helista guri adigu keliya oo aanad la guulaysteen
Waa inaad joogtid lawlaw Norway
Badiyaa waa inaad degto degmada muddo gaar ah
Xaalado dhaqaale, bulshada ama caafimaad ayaa dhacisaa helista guri

steps.title: Finn kommunens søknadsskjema
steps.description: Kad magalooshiida ee internets. Raadi "guri degmada" ama "guri". Heliye foormka codsiga.
steps.tip: Waad sidoo kale wici kartaa magalooshiida servicetorg caawinta.

steps.title: Ururiya dukumeentiyadda
steps.description: Waa inaad haystaa dukumeentiyadda dakhliga, deynta la mid ah, iyo waagii aad u baahan tahay guri magalooshiida. Ururiya tani ka hor intaadan bilaabin codsiga.
steps.tip: Warqada doktor ama hadal NAV waxy itaagi karaan codsiga.

steps.title: Buuxi codsiga
steps.description: Buuxi dhammaan kobaca qorshaha codsiga. Sharax xaaladaada sidii ay suuratan u tahay.
steps.warning: Codsiga aan buuxi kahay waxay dhaafin kartaa habka iska dhexgelinta.

steps.title: Sharax baahida guriga
steps.description: Faariso nooca guri aad u baahan tahay (tirada qamarta, meesha, accessibility). Sharax baahida gaar ah haddii ay jiraan.
steps.tip: Haddii aad haystid caruur, sheeg cimirka iyo imkadaha laalinta.

steps.title: Soo dir dukumeentiyadda
steps.description: Soo dir dhammaan dukumeentiyadda ay taageeraan codsiga. Wixii badan dukumeentiyadda, waa haddii ay fudud tahay magalooshiida inaad qiimeeyso codsiga.
steps.warning: Dukumeentiyadda la lumiyay waxay noqon kartaa sababta colkanaanta.

steps.title: Soo dir codsiga
steps.description: Xaqiiji inaad buuxi kartaa dhammaan iyo soo dir codsiga. Waad heli kartaa xaqiijinta in la soo qaatay.
steps.tip: Qor maalintaad soo dirtay codsiga.

steps.title: Iska eg jawaab
steps.description: Magalooshiida ayaa walaac geliya codsiga. Wakhtiga walaacaha waxaa kala duwanaan. Waad noqon kartaa in loo yeedhiyay qoraal.
steps.tip: Waxaad xiriir kartaa magalooshiida si aad u ogsato waxa jira codsiga.

tips: Codso awal sida ay suurtan u tahay - waxaa jiri kara sug dheer
Ku habaarin magalooshiida hadii xaaladaadu ay beddelaan
Waad carcas kartaa colkaansaha magalooshiida carcaska
NAV way gacan qaadi kartaa guriga ku jira habka waaqta waad egsantahay
Waad codsan kartaa taageerada guriga si aad caawinta u hesho kirey
kommunalBolig.helpText: La xiriir xafiiska guryaha ama xarunta adeegga ee degmadaada si aad u hesho caawimaad codsiga guryaha degmada.

studielan.title: Codso amaahda waxbarasho
studielan.longDescription: Lånekassen waxay siisaa amaah iyo deeq ardayda. Halkan waxaad baranaysaa sida loo codsado iyo waxa aad u baahan tahay.
studielan.whatIsText1: Amaahda waxbarasho waa lacag aad laga soo qaadataa Lånekassen si aad deksan kharashyada inta aad wax baraysid. Waad dib u bixi doontaa markaad dhameyso waxbarasho.
studielan.whatIsText2: Qaybo amaahda waxa ay noqon karaan deeq haddii aad dhameyso waxbarasho iyo aadna iska taag dakhli xudud gaar ah.
requirements: Waa inaad aqbalay tahay waxbarasho la ansixiyay
Waa inaad qeydka gelinaysaa ardayska
Waa inaad qaatid study-points/ahaatid ardayska shaqaysanaya
Waa inaad haysan tahay ogolaansha joogga sax ah Norway (haddii aanad ahayn Norway nationality)

steps.title: Galitaanka lanekassen.no
steps.description: Fur nettleseren oo gal lanekassen.no. Guji "Gal" geeska sare ee midig.
steps.tip: Waad sidoo kale raadi kartaa Google "Lånekassen codso amaah".

steps.title: Gal BankID-da
steps.description: Dooro BankID telefoonka ama koodhka. Raac tilmaamaha galitaanka.
steps.warning: Ma haystid BankID? Waad ogolow kartaa bangigaaga.

steps.title: Hel form-ka codsashada
steps.description: Markaad gasho, guji "Codso amaah iyo deeq" ama "Codsashada". Dooro sannadka saxda ah ee waxbarasho.
steps.tip: Codsashadu badiyaa waxay fur isagaa katanin bisho bishan laga bilaab semester-ka sonkor.

steps.title: Dooro waxbarasho
steps.description: Raadi dugsiga iyo waxbarashaaka. Nidaamku waxa ay muuqataa waxa aad heli kartaa amaah iyo deeq.
steps.tip: Haddii waxbarasho anay muuqato, hubi inaad dooro sannadka saxda.

steps.title: Buuxi macluumaadka shakhsiga
steps.description: Hubi inaad macluumaadka la xiriirta saxda tahay. Sheeg lambarka akoonka bixinta.
steps.warning: Lambarka akoonka khalad macneyduhu jidha bixinta!

steps.title: Dooro qadarka aad rabto inaad laan
steps.description: Waad doori kartaa inaad laan qadarka dhammaan ama yar yar. Hubi waxa ay noqon karaan deeq.
steps.tip: Laan halka aad u baahan - waad dib u bixi doontaa dhallinta.

steps.title: Soo dir codsashada
steps.description: Safaari codsashada iyo guji "Soo dir". Waad heli kartaa xaqiijinta e-postkaa.
steps.tip: Waad raaci kartaa status "Bogagga Gaarka ah" Lånekassen.

tips: Codso waqti qabya joogtid semester-ka bilowga
War geli isbeddelada (tusaale: joog waxbarasho, shaqo dhintii)
Xaqiiji waqtiga dhammaada beddelka deeq
Waad codsan kartaa taageero safarka aadna waxbarasho ka fog
Haddii aad degto ardayska kale waad wada-qaybsan kartaa kharashyada guri
studielan.helpText: Wac Lånekassen lambarka 21 49 60 00 (maalmaha shaqada 08:00-15:00) ama isticmaal chat-ka lanekassen.no.

stipend.title: Codso deeqda
stipend.description: Hel qayb amaahda loo beddelo deeq
stipend.longDescription: Lånekassen waxay u beddeli kartaa qaybo amaahda deeq. Halkan waxaad baranaysaa sida ay u shaqeyso.
stipend.whatIsText1: Deeqdu waa lacag aad hesho oo aanad u baahin inaad dib u bixi. Lånekassen waxay marka hore siisaa amaah, kaas oo noqon karaa deeq haddii aad buufisid talabada.
stipend.whatIsText2: Beddelka deeqdu waxay si automatikyada noqotaa haddii aad buufisid studiepoeng oo aanad kasbin wax badan.
requirements: Waa inaad buufisid studiepoeng-ka aad taageerada helay
Aanad kasbin xadka dakhliga
Aanad haystid fal badan
Waxbarashaddu waa inay ansax tahay Lånekassen

steps.title: Codso amaah sidii caadi
steps.description: Waad marka hore codsataa amaah iyo deeq. Lacagga waxa loo bixiyaa amaah marka hore.
steps.tip: Waa isku codsiga amaah iyo deeq.

steps.title: Buufi studiepoeng-ka
steps.description: Qaado imtixaanka oo kama-warana kuraska aad taageerada helay. Lånekassen way si automatikyada xaqiiftaa dugsiga.
steps.warning: Haddii aad aan guuleysan, amaahdu waa noqon doontaa amaah oo kaliya.

steps.title: Hadhiga xadka dakhliga hoostiisa
steps.description: Waxaad shaqeyn kartaa dhinaca waxbarashada, laakiin ha kasbin wax ka badan xadka. Ka eeg xadadka jira lanekassen.no.
steps.tip: Xadku waa qiyaastii 200,000 kr sannadkiiba (ka eeg qadarka la cusbooneysiiyay).

steps.title: Beddelku waxay si automatikyada noqotaa
steps.description: Markaad Lånekassen ay helay natiijadaada, way si automatikyada beddeli amaahda deeq.
steps.tip: Waad arki kartaa status "Bogagga Gaarka ah" Lånekassen.

steps.title: Xaqiiji natiijada
steps.description: Galitaanka lanekassen.no oo eeg waxa ay beddeli weyday. Waad sidoo kale heli kartaa fariin inbox-kaaga.
steps.warning: Hadii wax ay khaldan tahay, xiriir Lånekassen awal sida ay suurtan u tahay.

tips: Beddelku waxay noqotaa sannadkii ka dib ee aad imtixaanka qaadatay
Hadii aad kasbaad wax badan sannad qof, waad codsan kartaa beddel xaalado gaar ah
Deeq-guriga waad heli kartaa aanad la egin dakhligaaga hadii aad degsatid walaalooyinka
Hadii aad buufiso waqti nidaam ah, waad heli kartaa amaah xataa oo beddeli deeq
stipend.helpText: Wac Lånekassen lambarka 21 49 60 00 (maalmaha shaqada 08:00-15:00) ama isticmaal chat-ka lanekassen.no.

tilbakebetaling.title: Dib u bixinta amaahda waxbarasho
tilbakebetaling.description: Dib u bixi amaahda waxbarasho iyo codsashada dib u dhigista
tilbakebetaling.longDescription: Markaad dhameyso waxbarasho, amaahda waa in la dib u bixiyaa. Halkan waxaad baranaysaa sida ay u shaqeyso iyo waxa aad samayn karto haddii aad dhibaato ku qabto.
tilbakebetaling.whatIsText1: Waad bilaab bixinta dib amaahda waxbarasho qiyaastii 7 bilood ka dib ee aad dhamaystay waxbarasho. Waad heli kartaa warqad Lånekassen leh qorsha bixinta.
tilbakebetaling.whatIsText2: Amaahdu waxaa lagu bixi kartaa badiyaa 20 sano leh qadarka joogteysan ee bilirnimo. Waad doori kartaa inaad degdeg bixi ama waad codsan kartaa wacan.
options: Codso wacan bixinta hadii aad dhibaataysantahay
Codso billow renta hadii dakhligaagu ay hoostiisa tahay

steps.title: Iska eg faturada
steps.description: Ku dhow 7 bilood oo ka dib intii dhamaystay waxbarasho waxaad helaysaa faturada ugu horeysa. Waxay imaan kartaa Digipost ama warqad.
