steps.tip: Hubo in Lånekassen ay leeyihiin cinwaan sax iyo iimaylka.

steps.title: Samee AvtaleGiro
steps.description: Galitaanka lanekassen.no oo dooro "Bixinta". Samee AvtaleGiro bixinta automatikyada.
steps.tip: AvtaleGiro-ga waad ilows cartaa inaad xusuusto inaad bilir bixid.

steps.title: Xaqiiji qorsha bixinta
steps.description: Eeg waxa aad bixin doontaa iyo mudada. Waad beddeli kartaa waqtiga bixinta hadii aad rabto.
steps.warning: Waqti dheer bixinta = renta badan oo dhamaastir.

steps.title: Bial halkaa
steps.description: Bial faturada kahor inta lagu yaalo. Haddii aad matan biilan, waad ku biid doonaysaa renta iyo lacagta.
steps.warning: Bilaayada oo laga maqan waxay noqon kartaa sababta inkasso.

steps.title: Codso wacan hadii loo baahdo
steps.description: Miyaad dhibaataysantahay? Galitaanka oo codsada iska wacan. Waxaad heli kartaa ilaa 36 bilood iska wacsan.
steps.tip: Codso KAHOR intii la bixi lahaa si aad u iswacdo kharashka.

tips: Waad heli kartaa billow renta hadii aad kasbaad xad gaar ah hoostiisa
Markaad daaq shaqo ama caabuq, waad codsan kartaa wacan
Waad bixin kartaa badan waad heshaa lacag
Lånekassen way soo dirtaa xusuusin kahor markii lagu baxayo - xaqiiji inbox
Xiriir Lånekassen awal hadii aad dhibaataysantahay bixinta
tilbakebetaling.helpText: Wac Lånekassen lambarka 21 49 60 00 (maalmaha shaqada 08:00-15:00) ama isticmaal chat-ka lanekassen.no.

betalingsutsettelse.title: Codso hakinta lacag bixinta
betalingsutsettelse.description: Dib u dhig bixinta deyntaada waxbarashada
betalingsutsettelse.longDescription: Baro sida loo codsado hakinta lacag bixinta ee Lånekassen haddii aad u baahan tahay nasasho bixinta.
betalingsutsettelse.whatIsText1: Hakinta lacag bixinta waxay ka dhigan tahay in aad si ku meel gaar ah aadan u bixin deyntaada waxbarashada. Waxaad heli kartaa hakinta ilaa 36 bilood guud ahaan intii lagu jiray waqtiga bixinta.
betalingsutsettelse.whatIsText2: Ogsoonow in renta weli ay sii socoto xitaa markaad haysato hakinta lacag bixinta, sidaa darteed deyntaadu way kori doontaa xilligaas. Sidaa darteed, waxay noqon kartaa mid caqli ah in aad bixiso marka aad awood u yeelatid.
betalingsutsettelse.requirementsTitle: Goorma ayaad heli kartaa hakinta lacag bixinta?
requirements: Waxaad bilaawday inaad ku celiso deyntaada waxbarashada
Kama isticmaalin dhammaan 36 bilood ee hakinta
Kuma jirto waxbarasho firfircoon (markaas waxaad haysataa cafis lacag bixin oo toos ah)
betalingsutsettelse.stepsTitle: Sida loo codsado hakinta lacag bixinta

steps.title: Ku soo gal lanekassen.no
steps.description: Tag lanekassen.no oo ku soo gal adoo isticmaalaya BankID ama MinID. Waxaad sidoo kale isticmaali kartaa app-ka Lånekassen.
steps.tip: App-ku waa mid sahlan in loo isticmaalo isbeddelada degdega ah.

steps.title: Tag Bixinta
steps.description: Ka hel menu-ga 'Bixinta' menu-ga ugu weyn. Ka dib dooro 'Codso hakinta lacag bixinta'.

steps.title: Dooro xilliga hakinta
steps.description: Dooro immisa bilood oo hakinta ah aad rabto. Waxaad codsan kartaa ilaa 12 bilood hal mar.
steps.tip: Kaliya codso waqtiga aad u baahan tahay - renta weli way sii socotaa.

steps.title: Soo gudbi codsiga
steps.description: Xaqiiji doorashooyinkaaga oo soo gudbi codsiga. Waxaad heli doontaa jawaab isla markiiba, isbeddelkuna wuxuu dhaqan geli doonaa isla markiiba.

betalingsutsettelse.helpText: Wac Lånekassen 22 00 22 00 (maalmaha shaqada 08-15) ama isticmaal chat-ka lanekassen.no. Waxaad sidoo kale u diri kartaa fariin bogga galitaanka.

pass.title: Dalbo baasaboor
pass.description: Sida loo dalbo mid cusub ama loo cusbooneysiiyo baasaboorkaaga
pass.longDescription: Baasaboorku waa dukumenti ID oo muhiim ah. Halkan waxaad baranaysaa sida loo dalbo baasaboor cusub ama loo cusbooneysiiyo kii hore.
pass.whatIsText1: Baasaboorku waa dukumenti safar oo xaqiijiya aqoonsigaaga. Waxaad u baahan tahay baasaboor si aad ugu safarto wadamada ka baxsan Waqooyiga.
pass.whatIsText2: Baasaboorka Norweyjiyan wuxuu ansax yahay 10 sano dadka waaweyn iyo 5 sano carruurta ka yar 16 sano.
requirements: Aqoonsi sax ah (baasaboor hore, shatiga darawalnimada ama kaadhka bangiga ee leh sawir)
Lacag bixin (qiyaastii 570 kr dadka waaweyn, 270 kr carruurta)
Ballan booliiska
Baasaboorka hore (haddii aad haysato)

steps.title: Ballan ka qabso booliiska
steps.description: Tag politiet.no oo dooro "Ballan qabso". Dooro "Baasaboor" oo raadi waqti bannaan xafiiska baasaboorka ugu dhow.
steps.tip: Xilliga fasaxa waxaa jiri kara sug dheer - hore u ballan qabso!

steps.title: Tag waqtiga la ballamay
steps.description: La tag aqoonsi sax ah iyo baasaboorka hore. Booliiska waxay qaadayaan sawir cusub iyo faraha rasmiga ah.
steps.warning: Haddii aad daahdid, waxaad lumineysaa ballanka oo waa inaad mid cusub qabsato.

steps.title: Bixi baasaboorka
steps.description: Waxaad ku bixisaa kaadhka xafiiska baasaboorka. Qiimaha waa qiyaastii 570 kr dadka waaweyn.
steps.tip: Ka eeg qiimayaasha cusbooneysiiyay politiet.no.

steps.title: Sug baasaboorka
steps.description: Baasaboorka waxaa laguu soo diraa gurigaaga boostada. Waxay caadi ahaan qaadataa 10-14 maalmood.
steps.tip: Waxaad ka raad raaci kartaa shixnadda politiet.no lambarka tixraacaaga.

steps.title: Qaado baasaboorka
steps.description: Dadka badankood waxay helaan baasaboorka boostada. Meelaha qaarkood waxaad ka qaadan kartaa xafiiska baasaboorka.
steps.warning: Hubi in dhammaan macluumaadku sax yihiin markaad hesho baasaboorka!

tips: Hore u ballan qabso - gaar ahaan ka hor xagaaga waxaa jira sug dheer
Carruurta waa inay la yimaadaan labada waalid ama oggolaansho
Baasaboorku waa inuu ansax yahay ugu yaraan 6 bilood meelo badan
Baasaboorka lumo waa in loo war geliyaa booliiska ka hor inta aadan helin mid cusub
Waxaad heli kartaa baasaboor degdeg ah maalintaas kiisaska gaarka ah
pass.helpText: Wac Booliska lambarka 02800 ama booqo politiet.no si aad u hesho macluumaad ku saabsan baasaboorka.

forerkort.title: Cusbooneysii shatiga darawalnimada
forerkort.description: Sida loo cusbooneysiiyo ama loo dalbo shatiga darawalnimada
forerkort.longDescription: Shatiga darawalnimada waa in la cusbooneysiiyaa ka dib muddo cayiman. Halkan waxaad baranaysaa sida loo sameeyo.
forerkort.whatIsText1: Shatiga darawalnimada waa caddeyn in aad xaq u leedahay inaad waddo iyo kaadhka aqoonsiga ee sax ah. Waa in la cusbooneysiiyo si joogto ah.
forerkort.whatIsText2: Shatiga darawalnimada ee gaariiga shakhsiga ah (fasalka B) wuxuu ansax yahay 15 sano kuwa ka yar 65 sano. Kuwa ka weyn 65 sano, wuxuu ansax yahay ilaa maalinta ka horeysa 80 jirka. Ka dib 80 sano, waa inaad ku cusbooneysiisaa caddayn caafimaad (ugu badnaan 3 sano mar kasta).
requirements: Aqoonsi sax ah
Shahaadada caafimaadka haddii aad ka weyn tahay 80 sano
Lacag bixin (qiyaastii 250-400 kr)
Sawir baasaboor cusub (waa la qaadan karaa saldhigga taraafikada)

steps.title: Ballan ka qabso Statens vegvesen
steps.description: Tag vegvesen.no oo dooro "Ballan qabso". Raadi "Shatiga darawalnimada" oo dooro saldhigga taraafikada ugu dhow.
steps.tip: Waad sidoo kale wici kartaa 22 07 30 00 si aad ballan u qabsato.

steps.title: Tag oo wado aqoonsigaaga
steps.description: La tag aqoonsi sax ah. Sawir cusub ayaa laga qaadayaa saldhigga.
steps.warning: Shatiga darawalnimada duuggaa waa in la soo dhiibaa.

steps.title: Bixi lacagta
steps.description: Waxaad ku bixisaa kaadhka saldhigga taraafikada. Qiimaha way kala duwan yihiin nooca shatiga.
steps.tip: Ka eeg qiimayaasha vegvesen.no ka hor intaadan iman.

steps.title: Sug shatiga darawalnimada cusub
steps.description: Shatiga cusub waxaa lagu soo diraa boostada. Waxay qaadataa qiyaastii 1-2 toddobaad.
steps.tip: Waxaad heleysaa shatiga ku meel gaarka ah ee shaqeeya inta aad sugeyso.

steps.title: Firfircoi shatiga darawalnimada
steps.description: Marka aad hesho shatiga, wuu diyaar yahay in la isticmaalo. Hubi in dhammaan macluumaadku sax yihiin.
steps.warning: War geli khaladaadka markiiba!

tips: Cusbooneysii shatiga ka hor inta uusan dhicin - lama oggola in lagu wado shati dhacay
Haddii aad ka weyn tahay 80 sano, waxaad u baahan tahay shahaadada caafimaadka ee dhakhtarka
Shatiga lumo waxaa lagu beddeli karaa lacag
Waxaad ka hubin kartaa ansaxnimada vegvesen.no
Shatiga darawalnimada EU-da wuxuu ku shaqeeyaa Yurub oo dhan
forerkort.helpText: Wac Vegvesen lambarka 22 07 30 00 (maalmaha shaqada 08:00-15:30) ama booqo vegvesen.no.

idKort.title: Kaadhka ID-ga qaranka
idKort.description: Dalbo kaadhka ID-ga qaranka oo leh ama la'aan xaqa safarka
idKort.longDescription: Kaadhka ID-ga qaranka waa badal baasaboorka iyo shatiga darawalnimada aqoonsiga. Waxaa sidoo kale loo isticmaali karaa dukumenti safar Yurub.
idKort.whatIsText1: Kaadhka ID-ga qaranka waa dukumenti ID rasmi ah oo ay soo saarto booliiska. Wuxuu ku jiraa laba nooc: leh iyo la'aan xaqa safarka.
idKort.whatIsText2: Leh xaqa safarka waxaad u isticmaali kartaa kaadhka bedelka baasaboorka aagga EEA. Kaadhku wuxuu ansax yahay 5 sano.
idKort.typesTitle: Laba nooc oo kaadhka ID-ga ah
types: Leh xaqa safarka (qiyaastii 570 kr) - waxaa loo isticmaali karaa dukumenti safar EEA
La'aan xaqa safarka (qiyaastii 490 kr) - aqoonsi Norway oo keliya

steps.title: Ballan ka qabso booliiska
steps.description: Tag politiet.no oo dooro "Ballan qabso". Dooro "Kaadhka ID-ga" oo raadi saldhigga booliiska ugu dhow ee soo saara kaadhyada ID-ga.
steps.tip: Ma aha dhammaan saldhigyada booliiska oo soo saara kaadhyada ID-ga - ka eeg liiska politiet.no.

steps.title: Tag waqtiga la ballamay
steps.description: La tag aqoonsi sax ah (baasaboor, shatiga darawalnimada ama ID kale oo la ansixiyay). Booliiska waxay qaadayaan sawir iyo faraha rasmiga ah.
steps.warning: Kaadhka ID-ga leh xaqa safarka waa inaad haysataa lambarka shakhsiga Norweyjiyan.

steps.title: Dooro nooca kaadhka ID-ga
steps.description: Dooro haddii aad rabto kaadhka ID-ga leh ama la'aan xaqa safarka. Leh xaqa safarka waxaad ku safri kartaa EEA oo aan baasaboor lahayn.
steps.tip: Xaqa safarka waa la talinayaa haddii aad safarto Yurub.

steps.title: Bixi lacagta
steps.description: Ku bixi kaadhka halkaas. Qiimaha wuxuu ku xiran yahay nooca kaadhka ID-ga.
steps.tip: Ka eeg qiimayaasha cusbooneysiiyay politiet.no.

steps.title: Sug kaadhka ID-ga
steps.description: Kaadhka ID-ga waxaa lagu soo diraa boostada. Waxay caadi ahaan qaadataa 10-14 maalmood.
steps.tip: Waxaad ka raad raaci kartaa shixnadda lambarka tixraacaaga.

tips: Kaadhka ID-gu waa ka yar yahay baasaboorka oo wuxuu ku habboonyahay jeebaaga
Waxaad haysan kartaa baasaboor iyo kaadhka ID-ga labadaba
Kaadhka ID-ga leh xaqa safarka waxaa loo aqbalaa aqoonsi meel kasta Norway
Carruurta ayaa sidoo kale heli kara kaadhka ID-ga
Lumitaanka waa in loo war geliyaa booliiska
idKort.helpText: Wac Booliska lambarka 02800 ama booqo politiet.no si aad u hesho macluumaad ku saabsan kaararka aqoonsiga.

smarttelefon.title: Isticmaalka telefoonka casriga
smarttelefon.description: Baro isticmaalka aasaasiga ee telefoonada iPhone iyo Android
smarttelefon.longDescription: Telefoonka casrigu waa furaha Norway dhijitaalka ah. Halkan waxaad baranaysaa waxa ugu aasaasisan - laga bilaabo shidista telefoonka ilaa isticmaalka app-yada.
smarttelefon.beforeYouStartText: Telefoon casri waa kompiyuuter yar oo aad gacantaada ku qaaban karto. Waxaa loo isticmaali karaa inaad wicisid, fariinto dirto, sawir sameyso, iyo isticmaal apps (programmo) sida BankID, Vipps iyo wax badan oo kale.

steps.title: Shid telefoonka
steps.description: Qaado batoon-ka weyn geeska telefoonka dhawr ilbiriqsi. Skreen-ka waxa ay ifbaacaa. Haddii telefoonku hadii hore la shugo, way taag tahay waqti yar.
steps.tip: Badiyaa telefoonadu ay leedahay shido/kaaga-batoon midig.

steps.title: Fur telefoonka
steps.description: Markaa telefoonku waa shidkan, waa inaad fur kartaa. Sila kor skreen-ka (tuulo qodka kor). Waad yeelan lahayd inaad kood gaalto ama fingerprint.
steps.tip: Koodu badiyaa waa 4 ama 6 tiro aad dooran karto adigu.

steps.title: Fahom bogga hore
steps.description: Bogga hore waa waxa marka hore aad arkayso. Halkan waxa ay yaallaan apps (programmo) sidii ikonada yar yar oo square. Guji ikonada si aad app-ka fur.
steps.tip: Sila midig ama hoose si aad arkaad boogo kale oo apps.

steps.title: Wici qofka
steps.description: Hel ikonada telefoonka (badiyaa cagaaran oo ay leedahay telefoon yar). Gal lambarka aad rabto inaad wicisid. Guji batoon-ka cagaaran si aad wiciso. Guji cas si aad kuuxoojiso.
steps.tip: Waad keydi kartaa lambarro "Contacts" sidii aanad xusuusin.

steps.title: Diri SMS
steps.description: Hel ikonada fariinta (badiyaa waxaa muuqata kuwa hadal). Guji plus ama "Fariinto Cusub". Gal lambarka ama dooro contact. Gal fariintaaga oo guji diri.
steps.tip: Qalabka galkuna waxa ay soo baxaa markaad galaynaysid. Guji xarfada hal hal.

steps.title: Samee sawir
steps.description: Hel ikonada camera-ka. Poin telefoonka waxa aad rabto inaad sawir sameyso. Guji batoon-ka weyn oo raasle bogga. Sawirka waxa ay keydhaa si dhamaastuhu.
steps.tip: Sawirka waad heli kartaa app-ka "Sawiro" ama "Gallery".

steps.title: Ku xirir Wi-Fi (internet guri)
steps.description: Tag Settings (giraraf-ikonad). Guji Wi-Fi. Dooro network-kaaga (badiyaa waxay yaal magaca router-kaaga). Gal password-ka.
steps.tip: Wi-Fi password badiyaa waxa ay kaaxo router/box internetten provider-ka.

steps.title: Soo dejiso app
steps.description: Fur App Store (iPhone) ama Google Play (Android). Raadi app aad rabto, tusaale: "BankID" ama "Vipps". Guji "Hel" ama "Install". Sug ilaa app-ku loadkan.
steps.warning: Iska dhawaaq waxa aad soo dejiso. Sugal apps caasimud oo ay siido ay jira badbaad.

tips: Shuqla telefoonka maalintii - markaas waxa uu diyaar yahay
Haddii wax taag tahay, provo shido telefoonka iyo shid
Ha cabsan inaad provo - waad yareye kahaar karto
Ka codsada qoyska ama saaxiibo si ay caawin kuugu diyaarinaan telefoonka
Setto xarfo weyn settings haddii aad fikirto xarfu yar yar
smarttelefon.helpText: Wac Seniornett lambarka 22 42 96 26 si aad u hesho caawimaad bilaash ah oo ku saabsan taleefanada, ama booqo maktabada deegaanka.

nettleser.title: Isticmaalka browserka
nettleser.description: Baro furista bogagga iyo helitaanka macluumaadka internetka
nettleser.longDescription: Browserku waa daaqaddaada internetka. Halkan waxaad baranaysaa sida aad ugu isticmaasho booqashada bogagga, raadinta macluumaadka iyo marista si badbaado leh.
nettleser.whatIsText: Browser waa programmo ku ogolaanaysa inaad booga internetka arad. Iyada ugu caasaysa waa Safari (iPhone), Chrome (Android iyo kompiyuuterka) iyo Edge (Windows-kompiyuuterka).

steps.title: Fur browser-ka
steps.description: Hel ikonada browser telefoonka ama kompiyuutarkaaga. Safari ay leedahay compass-ikon, Chrome ay leedahay circle colourful, iyo Edge ay leedahay "e" blue.
steps.tip: Telefoonka waad badiyaa heli kartaa browser bogga hore.

steps.title: Fahom address-field
steps.description: Kor browser waxa ay jirta address-field - boos weyn oo cagaaran. Halkan waxa aad galin kartaa cinwaana netsida aad rabto inaad soo booqdo, tusaale: "nav.no" ama "helsenorge.no".
steps.tip: Waadan u baahan inaad gaalto "www." cinwaana hore.

steps.title: Soo booq netsida
steps.description: Guji address-field. Gal cinwaana netsida aad rabto inaad soo booqdo, tusaale: "vg.no". Guji Enter-key (ama "Gal" telefoonka).
steps.tip: Jees cinwaana - khalad yar way kuu gudin karaa bogga khalad.

steps.title: Raadi Google-da
steps.description: Waad sidoo kale raadi kartaa wax. Gal waxa aad raadsanayso address-field, tusaale: "furitaanka nav" ama "hawo Mogadishu". Guji Enter. Google waxa ay muuqi doontaa natiijooyinka.
steps.tip: Gal hadii su'aal buuxa, tusaale: "qiimaha renewal pass"

steps.title: Guji links
steps.description: Netsidu waxa ay leedahay links - xarfo blue iyo u underlined. Markaad guji (ama guji) link, waad soo bi doontaa bogga cusub.
steps.tip: Si aad u noqoto bogga hore, guji pila midig (back-button).

steps.title: Isticmaal back-button
steps.description: Kor midig waxa ay jirta pila midig. Guji si aad u noqoto bogga aad hadii ku jiray. Waad guji kartaa dhawr jeer si aad u noqoto bogga fog.
steps.tip: Telefoonka waad badiyaa sila kartaa xagga midig si aad u noqoto.

steps.title: Xir browser-ka
steps.description: Telefoonka: Sila kor bunka (iPhone) ama guji square-button (Android) si aad xirid. Kompiyuutarkaaga: Guji X-n kor hoose midig.

safetyTips: Eeg hadii cinwaanu kor - real nav.no waxa ay leedahay cinwaana sax, ma ahan "nav-login.com" ama mid la mid ah
Gal cinwaan adigu adigu iska hadii guji links e-postkaa
Raadi padlock-icon cinwaana - macneyduhu boggu badbaad yahay
Haddii wax aad arag oo khalad ama waax jiro, jees
nettleser.helpText: Wac Seniornett lambarka 22 42 96 26 si aad u hesho caawimaad bilaash ah oo ku saabsan browser-ka, ama booqo maktabada deegaanka.

videosamtale.title: Isticmaalka wicitaanka fiidiyowga
videosamtale.description: Baro isticmaalka Zoom, Teams iyo FaceTime si aad ula hadashao qoyska iyo dhakhtarka
videosamtale.longDescription: Wicitaanka fiidiyowgu wuxuu kuu ogolaanayaa inaad aragto oo aad la hadashao dadka xitaa haddii ay meel fog joogaan. Hagaagsan in la la xiriiro qoyska ama lala yeesho ballan dhakhtar gurigaaga.
whyUseList: Arki caruurtaada gaarka ah iyo qoyska ay fog ku degaan
Yeesha aqoon-daraystaha ama NAV hadal gurigaaga
Ka qaybgal korsiga iyo dhacdooyinka aanad u safri
Hel caawin qoyska masala teknikal - way arkin karaan screen-kaaga

apps.name: FaceTime
apps.desc: Sida ay ka jiraan iPhone/iPad. Ugu fudud isticmaalsiga kuwa Apple-ka.

apps.name: Zoom
apps.desc: App popular meeting-ka. Isticmaali badiyaa degmada iyo caafimaad-service.

apps.name: Teams
apps.desc: App Microsoft-ka. Isticmaali badiyaa NAV iyo shaqooyinka.

apps.name: WhatsApp
apps.desc: Video fudud qoyska iyo saaxiibo. Badiyaa ay leedahay hadii.

steps.title: Hel raadiga ku yimidda
steps.description: Waad badiyaa helaysaa xisaab e-postkaa ama SMS. Xisaabu waxa uu u eg yahay cinwaan internetka oo badiyaa bilaabma "zoom.us" ama "teams.microsoft.com".
steps.tip: Kaydi e-postka ama fariin si aad helloosho xisaabu dib.

steps.title: Guji xisaabada marka ay jirto wakhtiga
steps.description: Daqiiqo qaarkood ka hor intii ay bilowdo kulanku, guji xisaabada. Waad weydiin doontaa haddii aad rabtid in aad furayso apo ama browsers. Dooro "Fur" ama "Biir".
steps.tip: Tijaabi lyd iyo sawir kahor kulanku adoo guji xisaabada yar oo halkaa.

steps.title: Si access kamarada iyo microphone-ka
steps.description: Apo waxay weydiin doontaa ogollada si ay isticmaasho kamarada iyo microphone-ka. Calaamad "Ogol" labadaba. Iyada oo aan taban waad noqon kartaa kuwa kale oo ay ku arkaan ama og.
steps.warning: Haddii aad soo gali karto, hubo in aad siisay ogollada settings-ka.

steps.title: Sjekk at du ser deg selv
steps.description: Ka hor aad gudubiso kulan-ka, waxaad iska arki doontaa naftaada dirbaaxka yar. Hubo in iftinka wanaagsan tahay iyo kaamiradu wajigaaga qabtay.
steps.tip: Fadhiiso dhinaca caasiraha ama lambada hore, maan dib - markaa ay kuwa kale ku arki doonaan si wanaagsam.

steps.title: Gå inn i møtet
steps.description: Guji "Ka qabso" ama "Join Meeting". Waxaad gudub galaysaa kulan-ka oo arki kartaa kulan-galayaal kale.
steps.tip: Haddii aad jiri tahay bidaar, waxaa laga yaabaa inaad sugaysid ilaa inta xerigii waxii bilaabay kulan-ka.

steps.title: Gudub/buuxi hadii ama saw
steps.description: Hoose shaashada waxaad ka heli doontaa batan u dhow microphone-ka iyo kamarada. Calaamad ikonka microphone-ka si aad u gudubiso hadii/buuxi. Calaamad ikonka kamarada si aad u gudubiso sawir/buuxi.
steps.tip: Gudub microphone-ka marka aad hadli weydaan - markaas kuwa kale way ka sugaan hadal dhaaf.

steps.title: Avslutte samtalen
steps.description: Markaa hadalkii dhamaadee, guji batan cas "Jooji" ama "Leave". Waad ka xiraysaa kulan-ka.
steps.tip: Xusuuso inaad tidin "galan" kahor intii aad joojiso!

troubleshooting.problem: Cid kale way isuma maqli jiraan
troubleshooting.solution: Xaqiiji in mikrafoonka aanad wacan (walal la jirin xarfiga ikonka). Xaqiiji carfiga.
Xaqiiji xiriiriyaha internetka. Isku day inaad xidho adeegyo kale.
Tag meel u dhow router-ka Wi-Fi ama jeex camera-gaaga si aad u hesho flow wanaagsan.
Isku day inaad guji xisaabda dib. Xaqiiji in app-ku ay cusbooneysiin la'yahay.

passordHjelp.title: Furaha sirta iyo galitaanka
passordHjelp.description: Baro samaynta furaha sirta wanaagsan iyo waxa aad sameyso markaad ilaawdo
passordHjelp.longDescription: Furaha sirtu wuxuu ilaaliyaa macluumaadkaaga shakhsiga ah. Halkan waxaad baranaysaa samaynta furaha sirta badbaado leh iyo waxa aad sameyso haddii aad ilaawdo.
passordHjelp.whyImportantTitle: Maxaad muhiim u tahay furaha sirta?
passordHjelp.whyImportantText: Furaha sirta waa sida furahada gurigaaga - waxa uu hadda xoraaga. Furaha sirta khalad ayaa fudud ka dhigaya lagu xiiso qofka uu milmaano lacagta ama aqoonsiga.
goodPasswordTips: Isticmaal 12 xarfo yar yar - ka dheer, ka wanaag
Wada islaa xarfo weyn iyo yar yar, tiro iyo xarfo
Isticmaal furaha sirta kala duwan adeegyo muhiimka (bangiga, NAV, e-postka)

steps.title: Hel "Illaawday furaha sirta"-link
steps.description: Bogga galinta waad badiyaa heli kartaa link yidhaah "Illaawday furaha sirta?", "Reset furaha sirta" ama "Ma u baahan tahay caawin?". Guji tan.
steps.tip: Link badiyaa waxa ay jirta box-ka aad furaha sirta galaysid.

steps.title: Gal e-postka ama lambarka telefoonka
steps.description: Waad iska codsoon tahay inaad e-postka ama lambarka telefoonka aad qeyd galinay gaalto. Gal saxda.
steps.tip: Hubi inaad e-postka saxda u isticmaalaysid - midka aad badiyaa gashaysid.

steps.title: Hubi e-postka
steps.description: Waad heli kartaa e-post ama SMS link lagu sameeya furaha sirta cusub. Way taag tahay ilbiriqsi. Hubi spam haddii aanad helin.
steps.warning: Link waxay ansax tahay waqti gaaban - badiyaa 1 saac keliya. Isticmaal si dhakhso.

steps.title: Samee furaha sirta cusub
steps.description: Guji link e-postkaa. Gal furaha sirta cusub iyo badbaad ah. Waa inaad labaad gaalto si aad xaqiijiso.
steps.tip: Gal furaha sirta cusub meelka badbaad ah ilaa aad xusuustid.

steps.title: Gal furaha sirta cusub
steps.description: Noqo bogga galinta oo gal furaha sirta cusub. Hadda waad gadh hadii!
steps.tip: Tirtir furaha sirta notatbook-ka aad guriga badbaad ah kaydin.

passordHjelp.bankidNoteTitle: Ogow: BankID waxay kala duwan tahay
passordHjelp.bankidNoteText: BankID furaha sirta maayo inaad adigu reset karto internetka. Haddii aad ilaawday BankID-kode, waa inaad bangigaaga xiriirtaa si aad cusub hesho. Way caawin doontaa.

faHjelp.title: Halka laga helo caawin
faHjelp.description: Ka hel meelaha bixiya caawin kombiyuutar oo bilaash ah aagaaga
faHjelp.longDescription: Uma baahna inaad keligaa la tacaashao dhijitaalka. Halkan waxaad ka helaysaa dulmar meelaha iyo dadka ku caawin kara - badanaa oo dhan bilaash.
faHjelp.introText: Badiyaa wakaarado iyo volunteers waxa ay bixiyaan caawin bilaash qofka ay dhib ku qabo dhijitalka. Halkan waxa ay jira meelaha wanaagsan si aad bilawdo:

helpSources.name: Seniornett Norway
helpSources.description: Wakaarada volunteers oo caawinaya senioro dhijitalka. Waxa ay leedahay kooxo lokal wadamadu oo leh korsiga iyo caawin.

helpSources.name: Maktabadaaga Lokal
helpSources.description: Badiyaa maktabadu waxa ay bixiyaan caawin computer bilaash. Qaaraba waxa ay leedahay "jaamacaddo" aad heshid caawin.
helpSources.howToContact: Wici ama soo booq maktabadaaga oo weydiis haddii ay caawin computer bixiyaan

helpSources.name: Xarunta Volunteers
helpSources.description: Xarunada lokal waxa ay badiyaa leedahay volunteers oo kaala caawin kara computers iyo telefoon gurigaaga.

helpSources.name: Qoyska iyo Saaxiibo
helpSources.description: Badiyaa ay leedahay caruur, xaarfo-caruur, agabo ama saaxiibo kaala caawin kara. Badiyaa waxay ku faraxsan yihiin inaay caawinaan!
helpSources.howToContact: Iska weydiiso - badiyaa waxa ay yidhaahdu hah iyaad faxaa

helpSources.name: NAV
helpSources.description: Haddii aad u baahan tahay caawin isticmaalka adeegyo NAV, waad heli kartaa tilmaan xafiiska NAV lokal.
helpSources.howToContact: Wici 55 55 33 33 ama soo booq xafiiska NAV

tips: Gal su'aalahaaga ka hor intaad caawinshaa aragto
Ka codsada inaad tilo u muujiyaan hadhaad - adigu waad baraneysaa, kama ahan oo aragnid keliya
Ha cabsan - dhammaan waxa ay ahaayeen qof bilaab hadii marka hore
Gal xogta ama ka codsada inaad tilmaamaha galaynto
Weydiis haddii aad karrami karto haddii aad ilaawdo sida aad sameyso

folkeregisteret.title: Diiwaangelinta Diiwaanka Dadweynaha
folkeregisteret.description: Baro sida aad u diiwaangelisid Diiwaanka Dadweynaha oo aad u hesho lambarka shaqsiga Norway ama lambarka D
folkeregisteret.longDescription: Lambarka shaqsiga ama lambarka D waa fure u gadi u ah wax walba ee Norway. Waxaad u baahan tahay si aad u furayso akoonka bangiga, hesho shaqo, oo isticmaasho adeegyada dadweynaha.
folkeregisteret.whatIsText: Diiwaanka Dadweynaha waa diiwaanka rasmiga ah ee Norway kuwaas oo ku nool dalka. Marka aad diiwaangelisid, waxaad hesho lambarka gaarka ah oo lagu isticmaali karaa aqoontska.
folkeregisteret.typesText: Waxaa jira laba nau lambhar oo shaqsiga oo ku jira Norway:

types.description: Kuwaa ay joogaan Norway inta lagu yaalo 6 bilood. Kun waa lambarka shaqsiga caadi ah.
Kuwaa ay joogaan Norway inta ka yar 6 bilood, ama ay u baahan aqoontska iyada oo lagu joogaan halkan ba'anaan.

steps.title: Ururi dokumeenti la baahan
steps.description: Waxaad u baahan tahay pasboort ah sax ah, hantida shaqada ama caddayn qaydka dugsiga, iyo inta lagu yaalo visa. Keyd asalka, mana ay copies.
steps.tip: Hubka udi.no si aad u hesho liiska cusboonaysiiyay ee dokumeentiga aad u baahan adiga.

steps.title: Book ogol leh poliska ama xafiiska canshuuraha
steps.description: Shacabka EEA ah waxay diiwaangeliyaan poliska (politiet.no). Kuwa kale waxay diiwaangeliyaan Xafiiska Canshuuraha (skatteetaten.no).
steps.tip: Book ogalka onlayn si fiican hore - waxaa jiri kara joogitaan dheer.

steps.title: Kathib ogalka
steps.description: Keyd dokumeentiga oo dhan. Waxay samaynayaan sawir iyo markaax. Aadka awgeed waxaa qaadanaya 30-60 daqiiqo.
steps.warning: Haddii aad misten ogalka, waxaad u baahan tahay in aad book tiro cusub.

steps.title: Iska eg jawaab
steps.description: Waxaad helaysaa warqad ku jirta baraha emailka ama U.S. Mail leh lambarka shaqsiga ama lambarka D. Awgeed waxaa qaadanaya 1-3 juma.
steps.tip: Waxaad sidoo kale tixi kari kartaa halista skatteetaten.no marka aad helaysid access.

folkeregisteret.tipText: Lambarka shaqsiga waa kuwo gaarka ah oo hadal ah. Hadii ay dheeran bal walba ay sheekaydaan dawladda, shaqaalaha iyo bangiga. Hana daarin goob online ama ha siisan kuwa qaar.

mobilnummer.title: Hel lambarka howlgalka Norway
mobilnummer.description: Baro sida aad u iibsato kardi SIM oo aad u doorantid tilmaamaha howlgalka ee Norway
mobilnummer.longDescription: Lambarka howlgalka Norway waa muhiim si aad u hesho SMS koodiyada, isticmaasha BankID, iyo sahay la jiraa shaqaalaha iyo hay'adaha.
mobilnummer.optionsText: Ee Norway waxaad leedahay laba nau doorashada u weyn ee howlgalka:

options.pros: Fudud in la iibsado, waa la'aanta dhacdooyin, wanaagsan muddada yar
options.cons: Loo baahan yahay in lagu daaro lacag mar walba, inta badan si qiimo badan oo qamadi/data

options.pros: Data badan oo waqti qamadi u dheehan lacagaada, bilaayada la hubiye leh
options.cons: Inta badan loo baahan yahay akoonka bangiga ee Norway, inta lagu yaalo ay lahayd xad xakameed

mobilnummer.stepsTitle: Sida aad u hesho lambarka howlgalka Norway

steps.title: Dooro howlgal
steps.description: Howlgalada ugu badan ee Norway waa Telenor, Telia iyo Ice. Waxaa sidoo kale jira badan lacag yar sida Fjordkraft, Happybytes iyo MyCall.
steps.tip: Berbeerkaar qiimaha telepriser.no ama tek.no.

steps.title: Iibso kardi SIM
steps.description: Lacag hore: Iib dukaannada cuntada (Kiwi, Rema, Coop) ama istadka gaasida. Tilmaamaha: Tag dukaanka howlgalka ama iyad order.
steps.warning: Waxaad musan tahay aqoontska sax ah (pasboort) marka aad iibsataan kardi SIM ee Norway.

steps.title: Abuur kardi SIM
steps.description: Raaci tilmaamaha iska jira kardi SIM. Awgeed waxaad u baahan tahay in aad soo diid SMS ama tag bogga howlgalka.
steps.tip: Joog leh WiFi taasi oo ahaan haddii aad u baahan tahay internet si aad u abuurid.

steps.title: Daaro (lacag hore) ama bial (tilmaamaha)
steps.description: Lacag hore waxaa lagu dari karaa dukaannada ama onlayn. Tilmaamaha waxaa bial looga yahay akoonka bangiga.
steps.tip: Badan howlgalka waxay leeyihiin apps halkaas oo aad si fudud ugu dari kartaa ama aood tibaax.

mobilnummer.tipText: Bilow kardi lacag hore marka aad ugu horraysid galayso ee Norway. Marka aad hesho akoonka bangiga iyo lambarka shaqsiga, waxaad si fudud ugu bedeli kartaa tilmaamaha qiimo yar.

bankkonto.title: Fur akoonka bangiga ee Norway
bankkonto.description: Baro sida aad u furayso akoonka bangiga ee bangiga Norway
bankkonto.longDescription: Akoonka bangiga ee Norway ayaa la baahan si aad u hesho mushaharka, bial bilaayada, iyo isticmaasha bangiga onlayn iyo Vipps.
requirements: Lambarka shaqsiga ama lambarka D (ka Diiwaanka Dadweynaha)
Pasboort ah sax ah ama aqoontska kale
Caddayn halka aad ku nool tahay (hantida kira ama kuwa la midka)
Bangiga qaarkood loo baahan yahay hantida shaqada

banks.name: DNB
banks.description: Bangiga ugu badan ee Norway. Waxay leeyihiin kalaanta badan iyo bangiga onlayn oo fiican. Waxaa inta badan ahaan qiimo yar ah.

banks.name: Nordea
banks.description: Bangiga weyn ee Nordic leh adeeg macaamiisha oo fiican. Inta badan waxay bixiyaan qaab wanaagsan kuwa cusub.

banks.name: SpareBank 1
banks.description: Isku xidhka bangiga kaydiinta yar. Qiimo fiican iyo halka joog.

banks.name: Sbanken
banks.description: Bangiga onlayn oo iyada oo lagu aanan kalaanta. Awgeed qiimo yar, wax walba waxaa lagu sameeya dijitaalka.

bankkonto.stepsTitle: Sida aad u furayso akoonka bangiga

steps.title: Dooro bangiga
steps.description: Berbeerkaar bangiga finansportalen.no. Dajijo qiimaha akoonka, kaardta iyo gurnigu. Sidoo kale hubo haddii ay leeyihiin kalaanta u dhow haddii aad jeclaan lahayd caawin shaqsi ah.
steps.tip: Weydii shaqalaha - qaarkood shirkado ay leeyihiin iska xidhka bangiga gaar.

steps.title: Book ogol ama gadaal onlayn
steps.description: Badan bangiga waxay iska ogaysiisan kartaa ogow onlayn. Qaarkood waxay u baahan tahay in aad tag shaqsi ah si aad aqoontska.
steps.warning: Mabang ay aqbalan karaan lambarka D. Hubo horey.

steps.title: Dir dokumeenti
steps.description: Keyd pasboort, caddayn lambarka shaqsiga ee Norway, iyo caddayn halka. Bangiga waxay kopiyin iyo aqoontska.
steps.tip: Dokumeenti asalka ayaa had iyo jeer ugu wanaagsan. Keyd wax walba oo aad leeyihiin.

steps.title: Iska eg kaardta bangiga iyo koodiyada
steps.description: Kaardta bangiga waxaa la diraa ku dhow, awgeed 1-2 juma. Koodiga PIN iyo koodiga bangiga onlayn waxaa lagu diraa kala goob.
steps.tip: Abuur kaardta marka aad hesho, iyada oo onlayn ama bangiga.

steps.title: Abuur bangiga onlayn iyo BankID
steps.description: Soo dag apo bangiga oo ku gal. Waxaad hesho caawin abuur BankID oo lagu isticmaali karaa login ammaan leh meelo kasta ee Norway.
steps.tip: BankID waa muhiim! Waxaa lagu isticmaali karaa in loo galo NAV, Xafiiska Canshuuraha, iyo adeegyada badan.

bankkonto.tipText: BankID waa aqoontska dijitaalka ugu badan oo loo isticmaalo ee Norway. Leh BankID waxaad ku gali kartaa adeegyada dadweynaha, axtiyad dokumeenti dijitaalka, iyo isticmaasha Vipps. Hubo in aad abuuriyaan marka aad furayso akoonka bangiga.

epost.title: Abuur iimaylka
epost.description: Baro sida aad u abuurid akoonka iimaylka oo bilaash si aad isticmaasho adeegyada Norway
epost.longDescription: Iimaylka waa muhiim si aad u hesho caddeyminta, xiriirka hay'adaha, iyo kaydka ogalada iyo dokumeenti.
epost.whyText: Ee Norway, badan shirkado iyo hay'ado waxay soo diidaan macluumaad iimaylka. Waxaad u baahan tahay iimaylka si aad:
whyList: Xiriir doktarka, dugsiyada iyo kuwa kale

providers.name: Gmail (Google)
providers.description: Ugu caanka badan. Fudud in la isticmaalo, fariin fiican oo raadin, is xirka adeegyada Google.

providers.name: Outlook (Microsoft)
providers.description: Ka Microsoft. Is xirka fiican leh Windows iyo Office.

epost.stepsTitle: Sida aad u abuurid akoonka Gmail

steps.title: Tag gmail.com
steps.description: Fur browserka oo qor gmail.com ku jira baarka cinwaanka. Guji 'Abuur akoonka'.
steps.tip: Waxaad doori kartaa luqadda Norway hoose ee bogga.

steps.title: Buuxi foermka
steps.description: Gal magacaa hormarinta, magacaa danbe, iyo dooro username. Username waxaa noqon karaa cinwaanka iimaylka (tusaale, yourname@gmail.com).
steps.warning: Dooro username ah oo shaqo leh - waxaad isticmaali doontaa leh shaqaalaha iyo hay'adaha.

steps.title: Abuur walwalka adag
steps.description: Walwalka waa inuu lahaad inta lagu yaalo 8 xarfood, iyada oo ay jiraan xarfood yar iyo weyn, lambar iyo xarfood gaar ah.
steps.tip: Qor walwalka oo keydi ammaan. Hana isticmaasho walwal iska mid ah kuwa kale.

steps.title: Daaro lambarka telefoonka
steps.description: Waxaa loo isticmaali karaa si aad u celbiso akoonka haddii aad illawdo walwalka. Waxaad isticmaali kartaa lambarka howlgalka ee Norway.
steps.tip: Lambarka telefoonka ayaa sidoo kale u fiican ammaan dheeraad ah (laba-jibbaaran dheebaaca).

steps.title: Aqbal sharti iyo dhammee
steps.description: Akhriso sharti oo guji 'Aqbal'. Akoonka iimaylka waxaa lagu diyaar tahay in la isticmaalo!
steps.tip: Soo dag apo Gmail ee telefoonka si aad u hesho access fudud iimaylka.

epost.tipText: Ha furi lahayn fillaanta ama xisaabada ka qaar ah kuwa lagu wada diidan. Hay'adaha Norway way wax hayaan u diraan walwal iimaylka dharkii. Haddii aad shakiga jiraan, xiriir diriyaha si toos ah xisaabada rasmiga ah.

ordbok.title: Qaamuuska
ordbok.description: Qaamuus leh sharaxaadaha erayada adag iyo odhaahyada websaydhyada dawladda Norway. Faham NAV, canshuuraha, caafimaadka iyo adeegyada dijitaalka.
ordbok.subtitle: Halkan waxaan ku sharaxaynaa erayada adag iyo odhaahyada aad ka hesho websaydhyada dawladda.
ordbok.missingWordText: Noo soo dir iimaylka kontakt@lettdigital.no haddii ay jirto eray aad jeclaan lahayd in la sharaxo, waanan ku dari doonaa!
ordbok.clickLetter: Guji xaraf si aad ugu boodddo

terms.definition: Digital identification used to log in to public services and banks.
Money from NAV when you lose your job or are laid off.
Annual overview of your income, deductions and taxes.
Your regular doctor that you are assigned to in Norway.
Form you submit to NAV every 14 days to receive benefits.

faq.title: Su'aalaha Badanaa La Isweydiiyo
faq.description: Ka hel jawaabaha su'aalaha ugu badan ee ku saabsan NAV, Xafiiska Canshuuraha, Helsenorge iyo adeegyada kale ee dhijitaalka.
faq.subtitle: Halkan waxaad ka heli doontaa jawaabaha su'aalaha ugu badan ee ku saabsan adeegyada dhijitaalka ee dawladda.
faq.contactAgencies: Waxaad si toos ah ula xiriiri kartaa hay'adaha si aad u hesho caawin dheeraad ah:

items.question: Maxaad samaynaa haddii aad lumisay shaqadaada?
items.answer: Marka hore, waa inaad ku diiwaangeysato iska joog raadi shaqo ee nav.no. Kadib waad codsata faa'iidooyinka la'aanta hadii aad buuxi kartid waxyaabaha loo baahan yahay.

items.question: Goorma ayay qaadataa jawaab codsiga NAV?
items.answer: Wakhtiga hawlgelinta way beddeli kartaa: Faa'iidooyinka la'aanta badiyaa waxy qaadataa ilaa 5 toddobaad. Bicnaha xanuunka waxy qaadataa 2-4 toddobaad.

items.question: Goorma ayaa warbixinta canshuurta soo gadataa?
items.answer: Warbixinta canshuurta badiyaa waxa ay soo gadataa Marsa. Wakhtiga ugu dambeeya ee hubinta iyo gudbinta isbeddelada waa 30-kii Abriil.

items.question: Sida loo beddelsho dhakhtarka gaarka ah?
items.answer: Gal helsenorge.no, tag dhakhtar iyo dooro Beddel Dhakhtar. Waad beddeli kartaa 2 jeer sanac ah.

items.question: Maan haysan BankID - maxaad samaynaa?
items.answer: Waxaad la xiriiri kartaa bangigaaga si aad u hesho BankID. Waad sidoo kale isticmaali kartaa MinID adeegyo qaarkood.

favorites.title: Kuwa aan jeclaahay
favorites.description: Kaydi hagayaashaada jeclaahay si aad u hesho degdeg. Ururkaaga gaarka ah ee hagayaasha caawinta dhijitaalka.
favorites.subtitle: Halkan waxaad ka heli doontaa hagayaashii aad u keydisay sida kuwa jeclaahay.
favorites.emptyText: Guji xiddigta ku taal hagaha si aad halkan ugu keydsato.
favorites.tipText: Kuwa aad jeceshahay waxaa lagu keydinayaa qalabkan. Haddii aad isticmaasho qalabka kale ama aad tirtirto xogta browserka, way lumayaan.

about.title: Ku saabsan LettDigital
about.description: Wax badan ka baro LettDigital - aynu nahay, howlgalkeena iyo sida aan u caawino dadka waayeelka ah iyo kuwa cusub ee Norway adeegyada dhijitaalka.
about.founderBio: Waxaan u xiiseenahay in qof walba ka qayb qaadan karo bulshada dhijitaalka, iyadoon loo eegin da'da ama aqoonta tignoolajiyada.
about.forElderlyDesc: Kuwaas oo laga yaabo inay u arkaan adeegyada dhijitaalka inay adag yihiin, laakiin rabaan inay iska maamulaan.
about.forNewcomersDesc: Kuwaas oo u baahan caawimaad si ay u fahmaan nidaamyada iyo adeegyada Norway.
about.forHelpersDesc: Qoys, saaxiibo ama mutadawiciin ka caawiya dadka kale howlaha dhijitaalka.
about.missionIntro: Dad badan oo ku nool Norway, Norwayjiiyiin iyo dadka cusub ee soo gala, ayaa dhibaato u qaba adeegyada dhijitaalka ee dawladda. Waxay khatar ugu jiraan in laga saaro adeegyo muhiim ah sida NAV, Xafiiska Canshuuraha, iyo Helsenorge.
about.missionText: LettDigital waxaa loo sameeyay si ay ugu fududaato qof walba in uu fahmo oo isticmaalo adeegyadan. Waxaan ku sharaxnaa habab adag oo erayyo fudud, xarfaha waaweyn, iyo hagayo tallaabo-tallaabo.
about.whoAreWeText1: LettDigital waa mashruuc madax-bannaan oo raba in uu caawiyo kuwa ka baxsan bulshada dhijitaalka. Kuma xirna NAV, Xafiiska Canshuuraha, ama Helsenorge, laakiin waxaan u qabnaa ixtiraam weyn shaqada ay hay'adahani qabtaan.
about.whoAreWeText2: Macluumaadkeena wuxuu ku salaysan yahay macluumaadka rasmiga ah ee hay'adaha khuseeya, laakiin waxaan had iyo jeer ku talineynaa in la hubiyo bogagga rasmiga ah si loo helo macluumaadka ugu dambeeyay.
about.accessibilityIntro: Waxaan u naqshadeynay LettDigital adoo tixgelinaya dhammaan isticmaalayaasha:

accessibilityFeatures.fontSize: Cabbirka qoraalka la hagaajin karo - Ka dhig qoraalka in uu weyn yahay badhanka ku yaal xagga midig ee hoose
accessibilityFeatures.contrast: Habka isbarbardhigga sare - Si fiican loo akhriyi karo
accessibilityFeatures.simpleLanguage: Luqad fudud - Waxaan ka fogaanaynaa erayyo adag iyo luqadda xirfadlayaasha
accessibilityFeatures.keyboard: Marista keyboard-ka - Dhammaan hawlaha waxaa loo isticmaali karaa la'aanta mouse-ka
accessibilityFeatures.screenReader: U saaxiib akhristaha shaashada - Waafaqsan aaladaha caawinta

about.sourcesIntro: Dhammaan macluumaadka LettDigital waxay ku salaysan yihiin ilaha rasmiga ah:
about.contactText: Ma qabtaa su'aalo, talooyinka hagaajinta, ama ma heshay qalad? Aad ayaan u qiimeynaa jawaab-celinta!
about.importantInfoText: LettDigital wuxuu bixiyaa hage guud oo maahan adeeg rasmi ah. Si aad u hesho macluumaad xiran oo ku saabsan xuquuqdaada iyo waajibaadkaaga, had iyo jeer hubi bogagga rasmiga ah: nav.no, skatteetaten.no, iyo helsenorge.no. Marka shakiga jiro, si toos ah ula xiriir hay'adda khuseeya.

search.placeholder: Raadi hagayaasha... (tusaale, shaqo la'aan, warshadda, cashuur)
search.tryOther: Isku day erayo kale oo raadi ama arag qaybahayaga

privacy.title: Qorshaynta Asturnaanta
privacy.description: Baro sida LettDigital u maamusho xogahaaga, cookies-ka iyo asturnaanta. Waxaan ururinaa xog yar.

whoAreWe.title: Waa kuwee?
whoAreWe.text1: LettDigital waa adeeg macluumaad oo ka caawiya dadka isticmaalka adeegyada dhijitaalka ee dawladda. Ma ahan qayb ka mid ah NAV, Hey'adda Canshuurta ama Caafimaadka Norway, laakiin waxaan bixinaa hage ku salaysan macluumaadka dadweynaha.

dataCollection.title: Xogta aan soo uruurinno?
dataCollection.intro: Waxaan soo uruurinaa xog yar, kaliya wixii lagama maarmaan u ah bogga:
dataCollection.localSettings: Goobaha maxaliga ah: Cabbirka qoraalka, qaabka kala duwanaanshaha iyo kuwa jeclaahay waxaa kaliya lagu kaydiyaa browserkaaga (localStorage)
dataCollection.cookieConsent: Ogolaanshaha cookies: Waxaan xasuusnaa haddii aad aqbashay ama diidday cookies
dataCollection.serviceUsage: Macluumaad ku saabsan isticmaalkaaga adeegyada dawladda
dataCollection.thirdPartyData: Xog la wadaago dhinacyada saddexaad xayeysiis

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.intro: Waxaan kaliya isticmaalnaa cookies lagama maarmaanka ah oo lagu kaydiyay browserkaaga:

favorites.name: favorites
favorites.purpose: Kuwa aad jeclaahay ee la kaydiyay

cookies.noAnalytics: Ma isticmaalno cookies falanqayn (sida Google Analytics) ama xayaysiis.
cookies.analyticsInfo: Waxay naga caawiyaan inaan fahano sida aad u isticmaasho websaytka si aan u hagaajino.

ga.name: _ga
ga.purpose: Google Analytics - kala ku tilmaamaan istikdaameyaasha

gid.name: _gid
gid.purpose: Google Analytics - kala ku tilmaamaan istikdaameyaasha

thirdParties.title: Wadaagista dhinacyada saddexaad
thirdParties.noSharing: Ma wadaagno wax xog ah dhinacyada saddexaad. Dhammaan macluumaadka waxay ku hadhaan browserkaaga.
thirdParties.hosting: Bogga waxaa martigeliya Vercel, oo laga yaabo inay diiwaangeliyaan macluumaad farsamayneed (cinwaanka IP, nooca browserka) ujeedooyin amni.
thirdParties.vercelLink: Eeg siyaasadda asturnaanta Vercel si aad macluumaad badan u hesho.
thirdParties.noAds: Kama isticmaalno adeeg xayeysiis ah, xogtaadana ma iibinaynno.

yourRights.title: Xuquuqdaada
yourRights.intro: Sida ku qoran GDPR iyo sharciga asturnaanta Norway, waxaad xaq u leedahay:
yourRights.delete: Tirtirka xogta: Nadiifi kaydka maxaliga ah ee browserka si aad u tirtirto dhammaan settings-ka
yourRights.access: Helitaan: Dhammaan xogta waxaa lagu kaydiyaa browserkaaga maxaliga ah waxayna kuu muuqataa
yourRights.withdraw: Ka noqoshada ogolaanshaha: Waad tirtiri kartaa cookies waqti kasta settings-ka browserka

security.title: Amniga
security.text: Bogga wuxuu isticmaalaa encrypt-ka HTTPS xiriir ammaan ah. Maadaama aanan soo uruurin xog shaqsi, khatarta daadinta xogtu waa yar tahay.

contactUs.title: Nala soo xiriir
contactUs.text: Ma qabtaa su'aalo ku saabsan asturnaanta? Nala soo xiriir:

updates.title: Isbedelada siyaasadda asturnaanta
updates.text: Waxaan cusboonaysiin karnaa siyaasaddan marka loo baahdo. Isbedellada muhiimka ah waxaa lagu ogeysiini doonaa bogga.

cities.title: Adeegga bulshada ee magalooshiida
cities.subtitle: Hel xafiisada NAV ee halista, adeegga caafimaadka iyo wax kale
cities.description: Dooro magalooshiida si aad u helisid xafiisada NAV ee goleyga, tacadiyada hoolka iyo adeegga kale oo shaaha leh alaab, wakhtiga furitaanka iyo macluumaadka xiriirka.
cities.digitalServices: Adeegga badan ayaa lagu heli karaa digitally ah skatteetaten.no
cities.taxCard: Kaararka canbirta iyo canbirta hordhac ah
cities.faqAbout: Su'aalaha caadi ah oo ku saabsan adeegga bulshada ee {city}

oslo.name: Oslo
oslo.description: Magalooyinka madaxtinimada ay leh xafiisada NAV ee degmada oo dhan
oslo.intro: Oslo waa magalooyinka madaxtinimada leh in ka badan 700 000 oo dadka . Halkaan waad helaysaa faahfaahin ku saabsan adeegga bulshada oo dhan ee Oslo, oo ay ku jiraan xafiisada NAV ee degmada oo dhan, Skatteetaten iyo adeegga caafimaadka. Isticmaal bogga si aad u heliso cinwaannada, wakhtiga furitaanka iyo macluumaadka xiriirka.
oslo.faq1q: Halkan ayaan ku heli karaa xafiiska NAV ee Oslo?
oslo.faq1a: Oslo waxay leedahay xafiisada NAV ee degmada oo dhan. Waad helaysaa xafiiska halista ah salka meydka aad ku nool tahay: NAV Gamle Oslo, NAV Grünerløkka, NAV Sagene, NAV St. Hanshaugen, NAV Frogner, NAV Ullern, NAV Vestre Aker, NAV Nordre Aker, NAV Bjerke, NAV Grorud, NAV Stovner, NAV Alna, NAV Østensjø, NAV Nordstrand iyo NAV Søndre Nordstrand.
oslo.faq2q: Maxaa yeelay waqtiga furitaanka NAV ee Oslo?
oslo.faq2a: Xafiisada NAV ee Oslo ayaa guud ahaan furan maalinta shaqada 09:00-15:00. Drop-in ayaa caadi ahaan 10:00-14:30. Wac 55 55 33 33 si aad u barato waqtiga furitaanka xafiiska halista ah, sida qaar ka mid ah xafiisada ay yeelan karaan wakhtiga kala duwan.
oslo.faq3a: Skatteetaten waxay leedahay xafiisada ee labka qalfsanaa. Waad isticmaali kartaa adeegga digital ee skatteetaten.no oo kale si uu u abuuqo hawshaha badan sida wararka canbirta, kaararka canbirta iyo wararka guurka.
oslo.faq4q: Halkan ayaan ku heli karaa xarunta degdega ee Oslo?
oslo.faq4a: Xarunta degdega ee Oslo waxay ku taal Aker sykehus, Trondheimsveien 233. Furan 24 saac. Telefon: 116 117. Halkii ay jiraan xaalad lagu baladda khatar: wac 113. Waxa jira oo dhan xaruntada degdega ee degmada badan.
oslo.faq5q: Sidee baad booki karta waqti u dhow dhakhtarka ee Oslo?
oslo.faq5a: Waad booki karta waqti u dhow dhakhtarka adiga oo ah Helsenorge.no. Gelid BankID, dooro 'Timeavtaler', hel dhakhtarka. Waad diriri kartaa xafiiska dhakhtarka si toos ah. Ma haysan dhakhtarka? Codsad dhakhtarka Helsenorge.no.

bergen.name: Bergen
bergen.description: Magalooyinka madaxtinimada Vestlandets leh afar xafiisad NAV
bergen.intro: Bergen waa laba magalooyinka ugu weyn ee Norway leh hu dhow 290 000 oo dadka. Halkaan waad helaysaa faahfaahin ku saabsan xafiisada NAV, Skatteetaten iyo adeegga caafimaadka ee Bergen. Bergen waxay leedahay afar xafiisad NAV oo adeegga u leh qolooyinka kala duwan ee magalooyinka.
bergen.faq1q: Halkan ayaa xafiisada NAV ee Bergen?
bergen.faq1a: Bergen waxay leedahay afar xafiisad NAV: NAV Bergenhus, NAV Årstad, NAV Fana iyo NAV Åsane. Xafiiska halista ah waxa xiisuusan ninka qolka magalooyinka ah uu ku nool tahay.
bergen.faq2q: Halkan ayaan ku heli karaa xarunta degdega ee Bergen?
bergen.faq2a: Xarunta degdega ee Bergen waxay ku taal Solheimsgaten 9. Furan 24 saac. Telefon: 116 117. Halkii ay jiraan xaalad lagu baladda khatar: wac 113.
bergen.faq3q: Sidee baad gaadhaysaa Skatteetaten ee Bergen?
bergen.faq3a: Adeegga badan ayaa lagu heli karaa digitally ah skatteetaten.no. Si jidhaaf ah, barato skatteetaten.no si aad u heliso waqtiga furitaanka hadda jira iyo cinwaan ee Bergen.

trondheim.name: Trondheim
trondheim.intro: Trondheim waa saddexaad magalooyinka ugu weyn ee Norway leh hu dhow 210 000 oo dadka isagoo caanka ah inuu yahay magalooyinka tekinoloojiyada. Halkaan waad helaysaa macluumaadka ku saabsan xafiisada NAV, Skatteetaten iyo adeegga caafimaadka ee Trondheim.
trondheim.faq1q: Halkan ayaa xafiisada NAV ee Trondheim?
trondheim.faq1a: Trondheim waxay leedahay badan oo xafiisada NAV: NAV Midtbyen, NAV Østbyen, NAV Lerkendal iyo NAV Heimdal. Xafiiska halista ah waxa xiisuusan meydka aad ku nool tahay ee magalooyinka.
trondheim.faq2q: Halkan ayaa xarunta degdega ee Trondheim?
trondheim.faq2a: Xarunta degdega ee Trondheim waxay ku taal Mauritz Hansens gate 4. Furan 24 saac. Telefon: 116 117. Halkii ay jiraan xaalad lagu baladda khatar: wac 113.
trondheim.faq3q: Maxay jiraan qaybta dadka u qaadka ee Trondheim?
trondheim.faq3a: Trondheim waxay leedahay buskaar iyo trikk (Gråkallbanen) oo loo diray AtB. Waad karti kartaa qorsheynta safarka adiga oo ah atb.no ama AtB-ka app.

stavanger.name: Stavanger
stavanger.description: Magaloweynta saliida oo leh shan xafiis NAV
stavanger.intro: Stavanger waa afraad magalooyinka ugu weyn ee Norway leh hu dhow 145 000 oo dadka isagoo caanka ah inuu yahay magalooyinka saliida. Halkaan waad helaysaa macluumaadka ku saabsan xafiisada NAV, Skatteetaten iyo adeegga caafimaadka ee Stavanger iyo dusha.
stavanger.faq1q: Halkan ayaa xafiisada NAV ee Stavanger?
stavanger.faq1a: Stavanger waxay leedahay xafiisada NAV ee Stavanger, Sandnes, Sola, Randaberg iyo baladiyada ku dhow. Xafiiska halista ah waxa xiisuusan halka aad lagu qeyddiisan tahay folkeregistrert.
stavanger.faq2q: Halkan ayaan ku heli karaa xarunta degdega ee Stavanger?
stavanger.faq2a: Xarunta degdega ee Stavanger waxay ku taal Armauer Hansens vei 30. Furan 24 saac. Telefon: 116 117. Halkii ay jiraan xaalad lagu baladda khatar: wac 113.
stavanger.faq3q: Maxay jiraan qaybta dadka u qaadka ee Stavanger?
stavanger.faq3a: Stavanger waxay leedahay buskaar iyo Bybanen oo loo diray Kolumbus. Waad karti kartaa qorsheynta safarka adiga oo ah kolumbus.no ama Kolumbus-ka app.

kristiansand.name: Kristiansand
kristiansand.description: Sørlandets magalooyinka madaxtinimada leh xafiis NAV ee labka
kristiansand.intro: Kristiansand waa magalooyinka ugu weyn ee Sørlandets leh hu dhow 115 000 oo dadka. Halkaan waad helaysaa macluumaadka ku saabsan xafiisada NAV, Skatteetaten iyo adeegga caafimaadka ee Kristiansand.
kristiansand.faq1q: Halkan ayaa xafiiska NAV ee Kristiansand?
kristiansand.faq1a: Kristiansand waxay leedahay xafiis NAV ee labka ee labka oo adeegga u leh dadka oo dhan. Waxa jira oo dhan xafiisada ee baladiyada ku dhow.
kristiansand.faq2q: Halkan ayaan ku heli karaa xarunta degdega ee Kristiansand?
kristiansand.faq2a: Xarunta degdega ee Kristiansand waxay ku taal Eg. Furan 24 saac. Telefon: 116 117. Halkii ay jiraan xaalad lagu baladda khatar: wac 113.
kristiansand.faq3q: Maxay jiraan qaybta dadka u qaadka ee Kristiansand?
kristiansand.faq3a: Kristiansand waxay leedahay buskaar oo loo diray AKT. Waad karti kartaa qorsheynta safarka adiga oo ah akt.no ama AKT-ka app.

feedback.title: Sii waxaan maamuus
feedback.ratingLabel: Waa maxay aragtidaa ku saabsan LettDigital?
feedback.messagePlaceholder: Noo sheeg wax aad jeceshahay, wax aad u baahan, ama talooyin su'nida...
feedback.thankYouMessage: Waxaan aad uga mahadsannahay inaad waqtigaaga qadatid oo naga caaway si nala su'no.
feedback.error: Wax baa dhacdday. Isku day mar kale.
